GE07mbh_14_u:12: 14,001.002c papāta tīre gaṅgāyā vyādhaviddha iva dvipaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:13: 14,001.003a taṃ sīdamānaṃ jagrāha bhīmaḥ kṛṣṇena coditaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:14: 14,001.003c maivam ity abravīc cainaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ parabalārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:15: 14,001.004a tam ārtaṃ patitaṃ bhūmau niśvasantaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:19: 14,001.006a rājā ca dhṛtarāṣṭras tam upāsīno mahābhujaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:23: 14,001.008a tāṃ bhuṅkṣva bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ suhṛdbhiś ca janeśvara
GE07mbh_14_u:24: 14,001.008c na śocitavyaṃ paśyāmi tvayā dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_14_u:25: 14,001.009a śocitavyaṃ mayā caiva gāndhāryā ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_14_u:29: 14,001.011a uktavān eṣa māṃ pūrvaṃ dharmātmā divyadarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:31: 14,001.012a svasti ced icchase rājan kulasyātmana eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:32: 14,001.012c vadhyatām eṣa duṣṭātmā mando rājā suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:33: 14,001.013a karṇaś ca śakuniś caiva mainaṃ paśyatu karhi cit
GE07mbh_14_u:36: 14,001.014c sa pālayiṣyati vaśī dharmeṇa pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_14_u:38: 14,001.015b*0004_01 vināśam upayāsyanti tava putrā na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:44: 14,001.018a aśrutvā hy asya vīrasya vākyāni madhurāṇy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:45: 14,001.018c phalaṃ prāpya mahad duḥkhaṃ nimagnaḥ śokasāgare
GE07mbh_14_u:46: 14,001.019a vṛddhau hi te svaḥ pitarau paśyāvāṃ duḥkhitau nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:49: 14,002.001a evam uktas tu rājñā sa dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa dhīmatā
GE07mbh_14_u:50: 14,002.001c tūṣṇīṃ babhūva medhāvī tam uvācātha keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:54: 14,002.003c devāṃs tarpaya somena svadhayā ca pitṝn api
GE07mbh_14_u:57: 14,002.004c viditaṃ veditavyaṃ te kartavyam api te kṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:58: 14,002.005a śrutāś ca rājadharmās te bhīṣmād bhāgīrathīsutāt
GE07mbh_14_u:60: 14,002.006a nemām arhasi mūḍhānāṃ vṛttiṃ tvam anuvartitum
GE07mbh_14_u:62: 14,002.007a yuktaṃ hi yaśasā kṣatraṃ svargaṃ prāptum asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_14_u:63: 14,002.007c na hi kaś cana śūrāṇāṃ nihato 'tra parāṅmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:64: 14,002.008a tyaja śokaṃ mahārāja bhavitavyaṃ hi tat tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:65: 14,002.008c na śakyās te punar draṣṭuṃ tvayā hy asmin raṇe hatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:68: 14,002.010a govinda mayi yā prītis tava sā viditā mama
GE07mbh_14_u:69: 14,002.010c sauhṛdena tathā premṇā sadā mām anukampase
GE07mbh_14_u:70: 14,002.011a priyaṃ tu me syāt sumahat kṛtaṃ cakragadādhara
GE07mbh_14_u:72: 14,002.012a yadi mām anujānīyād bhavān gantuṃ tapovanam
GE07mbh_14_u:73: 14,002.012b*0006_01 kṛtakṛtyo bhaviṣyāmi iti me niścitā matiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:74: 14,002.012c na hi śāntiṃ prapaśyāmi ghātayitvā pitāmaham
GE07mbh_14_u:76: 14,002.013a karmaṇā yena mucyeyam asmāt krūrād ariṃdama
GE07mbh_14_u:77: 14,002.013c karmaṇas tad vidhatsveha yena śudhyati me manaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:78: 14,002.014a tam evaṃvādinaṃ vyāsas tataḥ provāca dharmavit
GE07mbh_14_u:80: 14,002.015a akṛtā te matis tāta punar bālyena muhyase
GE07mbh_14_u:81: 14,002.015c kim ākāśe vayaṃ sarve pralapāma muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:82: 14,002.016a viditāḥ kṣatradharmās te yeṣāṃ yuddhena jīvikā
GE07mbh_14_u:84: 14,002.017a mokṣadharmāś ca nikhilā yāthātathyena te śrutāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:85: 14,002.017b*0007_01 yathā vai kāmajāṃ māyāṃ parityaktuṃ tvam arhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:86: 14,002.017c asakṛc caiva saṃdehāś chinnās te kāmajā mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:88: 14,002.018c maivaṃ bhava na te yuktam idam ajñānam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_14_u:90: 14,002.019c yuddhadharmāś ca te sarve dānadharmāś ca te śrutāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:92: 14,002.020c parimuhyasi bhūyas tvam ajñānād iva bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:94: 14,003.001a yudhiṣṭhira tava prajñā na samyag iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:95: 14,003.001c na hi kaś cit svayaṃ martyaḥ svavaśaḥ kurute kriyāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:96: 14,003.002a īśvareṇa niyukto 'yaṃ sādhv asādhu ca mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:97: 14,003.002c karoti puruṣaḥ karma tatra kā paridevanā
GE07mbh_14_u:99: 14,003.003c śṛṇu tatra yathā pāpam apakṛṣyeta bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:100: 14,003.004a tapobhiḥ kratubhiś caiva dānena ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:101: 14,003.004b*0008_01 pūyante tu narā rājaṃs tasmād yajñāḥ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:102: 14,003.004c taranti nityaṃ puruṣā ye sma pāpāni kurvate
GE07mbh_14_u:103: 14,003.005a yajñena tapasā caiva dānena ca narādhipa
GE07mbh_14_u:105: 14,003.006a asurāś ca surāś caiva puṇyahetor makhakriyām
GE07mbh_14_u:107: 14,003.007a yajñair eva mahātmāno babhūvur adhikāḥ surāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:110: 14,003.008c naramedhaṃ ca nṛpate tvam āhara yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:113: 14,003.010a yathā ca bharato rājā dauḥṣantiḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:117: 14,003.011c abhiprāyas tu me kaś cit taṃ tvaṃ śrotum ihārhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:119: 14,003.012c dānam alpaṃ na śakyāmi dātuṃ vittaṃ ca nāsti me
GE07mbh_14_u:120: 14,003.013a na ca bālān imān dīnān utsahe vasu yācitum
GE07mbh_14_u:130: 14,003.018a na ca pratinidhiṃ kartuṃ cikīrṣāmi tapodhana
GE07mbh_14_u:131: 14,003.018c atra me bhagavan samyak sācivyaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:133: 14,003.019a evam uktas tu pārthena kṛṣṇadvaipāyanas tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:136: 14,003.020a vidyate draviṇaṃ pārtha girau himavati sthitam
GE07mbh_14_u:138: 14,003.020e tad ānayasva kaunteya paryāptaṃ tad bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:140: 14,003.021a kathaṃ yajñe maruttasya draviṇaṃ tat samācitam
GE07mbh_14_u:141: 14,003.021c kasmiṃś ca kāle sa nṛpo babhūva vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_14_u:143: 14,003.022a yadi śuśrūṣase pārtha śṛṇu kāraṃdhamaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_14_u:144: 14,003.022c yasmin kāle mahāvīryaḥ sa rājāsīn mahādhanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:149: 14,004.002a āsīt kṛtayuge pūrvaṃ manur daṇḍadharaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:150: 14,004.002c tasya putro maheṣvāsaḥ prajātir iti viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:151: 14,004.003a prajāter abhavat putraḥ kṣupa ity abhiviśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:152: 14,004.003c kṣupasya putras tv ikṣvākur mahīpālo 'bhavat prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:154: 14,004.004c tāṃs tu sarvān mahīpālān ikṣvākur akarot prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:155: 14,004.005a teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhas tu viṃśo 'bhūt pratimānaṃ dhanuṣmatām
GE07mbh_14_u:156: 14,004.005c viṃśasya putraḥ kalyāṇo viviṃśo nāma bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:157: 14,004.006a viviṃśasya sutā rājan babhūvur daśa pañca ca
GE07mbh_14_u:160: 14,004.007c teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ khanīnetraḥ sa tān sarvān apīḍayat
GE07mbh_14_u:161: 14,004.008a khanīnetras tu vikrānto jitvā rājyam akaṇṭakam
GE07mbh_14_u:162: 14,004.008c nāśaknod rakṣituṃ rājyaṃ nānvarajyanta taṃ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:163: 14,004.009a tam apāsya ca tad rāṣṭraṃ tasya putraṃ suvarcasam
GE07mbh_14_u:165: 14,004.010a sa pitur vikriyāṃ dṛṣṭvā rājyān nirasanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:171: 14,004.013a sa pīḍyamāno bahubhiḥ kṣīṇakośas tv avāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:172: 14,004.013c ārtim ārchat parāṃ rājā saha bhṛtyaiḥ pureṇa ca
GE07mbh_14_u:174: 14,004.014c samyagvṛtto hi rājā sa dharmanityo yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:175: 14,004.015a yadā tu paramām ārtiṃ gato 'sau sapuro nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:176: 14,004.015c tataḥ pradadhmau sa karaṃ prādurāsīt tato balam
GE07mbh_14_u:177: 14,004.016a tatas tān ajayat sarvān prātisīmān narādhipān
GE07mbh_14_u:178: 14,004.016c etasmāt kāraṇād rājan viśrutaḥ sa karaṃdhamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:182: 14,004.017c indrād anavaraḥ śrīmān devair api sudurjayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:183: 14,004.018a tasya sarve mahīpālā vartante sma vaśe tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:184: 14,004.018c sa hi samrāḍ abhūt teṣāṃ vṛttena ca balena ca
GE07mbh_14_u:189: 14,004.021a karmaṇā manasā vācā damena praśamena ca
GE07mbh_14_u:190: 14,004.021c manāṃsy ārādhayām āsa prajānāṃ sa mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:191: 14,004.022a ya īje hayamedhānāṃ śatena vidhivat prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:192: 14,004.022c yājayām āsa yaṃ vidvān svayam evāṅgirāḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:199: 14,004.025c kāñcanaḥ sumahān pādas tatra karma cakāra saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:200: 14,004.026a tataḥ kuṇḍāni pātrīś ca piṭharāṇy āsanāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:201: 14,004.026c cakruḥ suvarṇakartāro yeṣāṃ saṃkhyā na vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:202: 14,004.027a tasyaiva ca samīpe sa yajñavāṭo babhūva ha
GE07mbh_14_u:203: 14,004.027c īje tatra sa dharmātmā vidhivat pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:206: 14,005.001a kathaṃvīryaḥ samabhavat sa rājā vadatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:207: 14,005.001c kathaṃ ca jātarūpeṇa samayujyata sa dvija
GE07mbh_14_u:208: 14,005.002a kva ca tat sāṃprataṃ dravyaṃ bhagavann avatiṣṭhate
GE07mbh_14_u:209: 14,005.002c kathaṃ ca śakyam asmābhis tad avāptuṃ tapodhana
GE07mbh_14_u:211: 14,005.003a asurāś caiva devāś ca dakṣasyāsan prajāpateḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:215: 14,005.005a tāv api spardhinau rājan pṛthag āstāṃ parasparam
GE07mbh_14_u:216: 14,005.005c bṛhaspatiś ca saṃvartaṃ bādhate sma punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:217: 14,005.006a sa bādhyamānaḥ satataṃ bhrātrā jyeṣṭhena bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:219: 14,005.007a vāsavo 'py asurān sarvān nirjitya ca nihatya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:220: 14,005.007c indratvaṃ prāpya lokeṣu tato vavre purohitam
GE07mbh_14_u:222: 14,005.008a yājyas tv aṅgirasaḥ pūrvam āsīd rājā karaṃdhamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:223: 14,005.008c vīryeṇāpratimo loke vṛttena ca balena ca
GE07mbh_14_u:225: 14,005.009a vāhanaṃ yasya yodhāś ca dravyāṇi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:226: 14,005.009b*0012_01 śayanāni ca mukhyāni mahārhāṇi ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:228: 14,005.010a sa guṇaiḥ pārthivān sarvān vaśe cakre narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:229: 14,005.010c saṃjīvya kālam iṣṭaṃ ca saśarīro divaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:230: 14,005.011a babhūva tasya putras tu yayātir iva dharmavit
GE07mbh_14_u:231: 14,005.011c avikṣin nāma śatrukṣit sa vaśe kṛtavān mahīm
GE07mbh_14_u:232: 14,005.011e vikrameṇa guṇaiś caiva pitevāsīt sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:235: 14,005.013a spardhate satataṃ sa sma devarājena pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:237: 14,005.014a śuciḥ sa guṇavān āsīn maruttaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:238: 14,005.014c yatamāno 'pi yaṃ śakro na viśeṣayati sma ha
GE07mbh_14_u:241: 14,005.016a bṛhaspate maruttasya mā sma kārṣīḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:242: 14,005.016c daivaṃ karmātha vā pitryaṃ kartāsi mama cet priyam
GE07mbh_14_u:243: 14,005.017a ahaṃ hi triṣu lokeṣu surāṇāṃ ca bṛhaspate
GE07mbh_14_u:244: 14,005.017c indratvaṃ prāptavān eko maruttas tu mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:245: 14,005.018a kathaṃ hy amartyaṃ brahmaṃs tvaṃ yājayitvā surādhipam
GE07mbh_14_u:247: 14,005.019a māṃ vā vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te maruttaṃ vā mahīpatim
GE07mbh_14_u:248: 14,005.019c parityajya maruttaṃ vā yathājoṣaṃ bhajasva mām
GE07mbh_14_u:249: 14,005.020a evam uktaḥ sa kauravya devarājñā bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:251: 14,005.021a tvaṃ bhūtānām adhipatis tvayi lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:252: 14,005.021c namucer viśvarūpasya nihantā tvaṃ balasya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:253: 14,005.022a tvam ājahartha devānām eko vīra śriyaṃ parām
GE07mbh_14_u:254: 14,005.022c tvaṃ bibharṣi bhuvaṃ dyāṃ ca sadaiva balasūdana
GE07mbh_14_u:257: 14,005.024a samāśvasihi deveśa nāhaṃ martyāya karhi cit
GE07mbh_14_u:258: 14,005.024c grahīṣyāmi sruvaṃ yajñe śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama
GE07mbh_14_u:260: 14,005.025c bhāsaṃ ca na raviḥ kuryān matsatyaṃ vicaled yadi
GE07mbh_14_u:262: 14,005.026c praśasyainaṃ viveśātha svam eva bhavanaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:265: 14,006.001c bṛhaspateś ca saṃvādaṃ maruttasya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:267: 14,006.002c śrutvā marutto nṛpatir manyum āhārayat tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:270: 14,006.004a bhagavan yan mayā pūrvam abhigamya tapodhana
GE07mbh_14_u:272: 14,006.005a tam ahaṃ yaṣṭum icchāmi saṃbhārāḥ saṃbhṛtāś ca me
GE07mbh_14_u:273: 14,006.005c yājyo 'smi bhavataḥ sādho tat prāpnuhi vidhatsva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:275: 14,006.006a na kāmaye yājayituṃ tvām ahaṃ pṛthivīpate
GE07mbh_14_u:276: 14,006.006c vṛto 'smi devarājena pratijñātaṃ ca tasya me
GE07mbh_14_u:278: 14,006.007a pitryam asmi tava kṣetraṃ bahu manye ca te bhṛśam
GE07mbh_14_u:279: 14,006.007c na cāsmy ayājyatāṃ prāpto bhajamānaṃ bhajasva mām
GE07mbh_14_u:282: 14,006.008c marutta gaccha vā mā vā nivṛtto 'smy adya yājanāt
GE07mbh_14_u:283: 14,006.009a na tvāṃ yājayitāsmy adya vṛṇu tvaṃ yam ihecchasi
GE07mbh_14_u:284: 14,006.009c upādhyāyaṃ mahābāho yas te yajñaṃ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:286: 14,006.010a evam uktas tu nṛpatir marutto vrīḍito 'bhavat
GE07mbh_14_u:287: 14,006.010c pratyāgacchac ca saṃvigno dadarśa pathi nāradam
GE07mbh_14_u:291: 14,006.012c kva gato 'si kuto vedam aprītisthānam āgatam
GE07mbh_14_u:292: 14,006.013a śrotavyaṃ cen mayā rājan brūhi me pārthivarṣabha
GE07mbh_14_u:294: 14,006.014a evam ukto maruttas tu nāradena maharṣiṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:297: 14,006.015c yajñārtham ṛtvijaṃ draṣṭuṃ sa ca māṃ nābhyanandata
GE07mbh_14_u:298: 14,006.016a pratyākhyātaś ca tenāhaṃ jīvituṃ nādya kāmaye
GE07mbh_14_u:299: 14,006.016c parityaktaś ca guruṇā dūṣitaś cāsmi nārada
GE07mbh_14_u:300: 14,006.017a evam uktas tu rājñā sa nāradaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE07mbh_14_u:302: 14,006.018a rājann aṅgirasaḥ putraḥ saṃvarto nāma dhārmikaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:303: 14,006.018c caṅkramīti diśaḥ sarvā digvāsā mohayan prajāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:304: 14,006.019a taṃ gaccha yadi yājyaṃ tvāṃ na vāñchati bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:308: 14,006.020c paśyeyaṃ kva nu saṃvartaṃ śaṃsa me vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_14_u:309: 14,006.021a kathaṃ ca tasmai varteyaṃ kathaṃ māṃ na parityajet
GE07mbh_14_u:310: 14,006.021c pratyākhyātaś ca tenāpi nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe
GE07mbh_14_u:316: 14,006.023a tasyā dvāraṃ samāsādya nyasethāḥ kuṇapaṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_14_u:317: 14,006.023c taṃ dṛṣṭvā yo nivarteta sa saṃvarto mahīpate
GE07mbh_14_u:318: 14,006.024a taṃ pṛṣṭhato 'nugacchethā yatra gacchet sa vīryavān
GE07mbh_14_u:319: 14,006.024c tam ekānte samāsādya prāñjaliḥ śaraṇaṃ vrajeḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:320: 14,006.025a pṛcchet tvāṃ yadi kenāhaṃ tavākhyāta iti sma ha
GE07mbh_14_u:321: 14,006.025c brūyās tvaṃ nāradeneti saṃtapta iva śatruhan
GE07mbh_14_u:323: 14,006.026c śaṃsethā vahnim ārūḍhaṃ mām api tvam aśaṅkayā
GE07mbh_14_u:325: 14,006.027a sa tatheti pratiśrutya pūjayitvā ca nāradam
GE07mbh_14_u:327: 14,006.028a tatra gatvā yathoktaṃ sa puryā dvāre mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:328: 14,006.028c kuṇapaṃ sthāpayām āsa nāradasya vacaḥ smaran
GE07mbh_14_u:329: 14,006.029a yaugapadyena vipraś ca sa purīdvāram āviśat
GE07mbh_14_u:330: 14,006.029c tataḥ sa kuṇapaṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasā sa nyavartata
GE07mbh_14_u:331: 14,006.030a sa taṃ nivṛttam ālakṣya prāñjaliḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt
GE07mbh_14_u:333: 14,006.031a sa enaṃ vijane dṛṣṭvā pāṃsubhiḥ kardamena ca
GE07mbh_14_u:334: 14,006.031c śleṣmaṇā cāpi rājānaṃ ṣṭhīvanaiś ca samākirat
GE07mbh_14_u:336: 14,006.032c anvagād eva tam ṛṣiṃ prāñjaliḥ saṃprasādayan
GE07mbh_14_u:340: 14,007.001a katham asmi tvayā jñātaḥ kena vā kathito 'smi te
GE07mbh_14_u:341: 14,007.001c etad ācakṣva me tattvam icchase cet priyaṃ mama
GE07mbh_14_u:342: 14,007.002a satyaṃ te bruvataḥ sarve saṃpatsyante manorathāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:343: 14,007.002c mithyā tu bruvato mūrdhā saptadhā te phaliṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:345: 14,007.003a nāradena bhavān mahyam ākhyāto hy aṭatā pathi
GE07mbh_14_u:346: 14,007.003c guruputro mameti tvaṃ tato me prītir uttamā
GE07mbh_14_u:348: 14,007.004a satyam etad bhavān āha sa māṃ jānāti satriṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:349: 14,007.004c kathayasvaitad ekaṃ me kva nu saṃprati nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:355: 14,007.006a śrutvā tu pārthivasyaitat saṃvartaḥ parayā mudā
GE07mbh_14_u:356: 14,007.006c etāvad aham apy enaṃ kuryām iti tadābravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:357: 14,007.007a tato maruttam unmatto vācā nirbhartsayann iva
GE07mbh_14_u:358: 14,007.007c rūkṣayā brāhmaṇo rājan punaḥ punar athābravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:361: 14,007.009a bhrātā mama samarthaś ca vāsavena ca satkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:362: 14,007.009c vartate yājane caiva tena karmāṇi kāraya
GE07mbh_14_u:363: 14,007.010a gṛhaṃ svaṃ caiva yājyāś ca sarvā gṛhyāś ca devatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:364: 14,007.010c pūrvajena mamākṣiptaṃ śarīraṃ varjitaṃ tv idam
GE07mbh_14_u:365: 14,007.011a nāhaṃ tenānanujñātas tvām āvikṣita karhi cit
GE07mbh_14_u:366: 14,007.011c yājayeyaṃ kathaṃ cid vai sa hi pūjyatamo mama
GE07mbh_14_u:367: 14,007.012a sa tvaṃ bṛhaspatiṃ gaccha tam anujñāpya cāvraja
GE07mbh_14_u:368: 14,007.012c tato 'haṃ yājayiṣye tvāṃ yadi yaṣṭum ihecchasi
GE07mbh_14_u:370: 14,007.013a bṛhaspatiṃ gataḥ pūrvam ahaṃ saṃvarta tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:371: 14,007.013c na māṃ kāmayate yājyam asau vāsavavāritaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:372: 14,007.014a amaraṃ yājyam āsādya mām ṛṣe mā sma mānuṣam
GE07mbh_14_u:374: 14,007.014d*0015_01 śakreṇa pratiṣiddho 'haṃ maruttaṃ mā sma yājayeḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:375: 14,007.014d*0016_01 na māṃ rocayate rājyam ayājyaṃ mām amānuṣam
GE07mbh_14_u:376: 14,007.015a spardhate ca mayā vipra sadā vai sa hi pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:377: 14,007.015c evam astv iti cāpy ukto bhrātrā te balavṛtrahā
GE07mbh_14_u:378: 14,007.016a sa mām abhigataṃ premṇā yājyavan na bubhūṣati
GE07mbh_14_u:382: 14,007.018a na hi me vartate buddhir gantuṃ brahman bṛhaspatim
GE07mbh_14_u:385: 14,007.019a cikīrṣasi yathākāmaṃ sarvam etat tvayi dhruvam
GE07mbh_14_u:386: 14,007.019c yadi sarvān abhiprāyān kartāsi mama pārthiva
GE07mbh_14_u:389: 14,007.021a sthairyam atra kathaṃ te syāt sa tvaṃ niḥsaṃśayaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_14_u:390: 14,007.021c kupitas tvāṃ na hīdānīṃ bhasma kuryāṃ sabāndhavam
GE07mbh_14_u:392: 14,007.022a yāvat tapet sahasrāṃśus tiṣṭheraṃś cāpi parvatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:393: 14,007.022c tāval lokān na labheyaṃ tyajeyaṃ saṃgataṃ yadi
GE07mbh_14_u:394: 14,007.023a mā cāpi śubhabuddhitvaṃ labheyam iha karhi cit
GE07mbh_14_u:395: 14,007.023c samyag jñāne vaiṣaye vā tyajeyaṃ saṃgataṃ yadi
GE07mbh_14_u:397: 14,007.024a āvikṣita śubhā buddhir dhīyatāṃ tava karmasu
GE07mbh_14_u:398: 14,007.024c yājanaṃ hi mamāpy evaṃ vartate tvayi pārthiva
GE07mbh_14_u:399: 14,007.025a saṃvidhāsye ca te rājann akṣayaṃ dravyam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:401: 14,007.026a na tu me vartate buddhir dhane yājyeṣu vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:402: 14,007.026c vipriyaṃ tu cikīrṣāmi bhrātuś cendrasya cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:403: 14,007.027a gamayiṣyāmi cendreṇa samatām api te dhruvam
GE07mbh_14_u:404: 14,007.027c priyaṃ ca te kariṣyāmi satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_14_u:406: 14,008.001a girer himavataḥ pṛṣṭhe muñjavān nāma parvataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:407: 14,008.001c tapyate yatra bhagavāṃs tapo nityam umāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:412: 14,008.004a tatra rudrāś ca sādhyāś ca viśve 'tha vasavas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:413: 14,008.004c yamaś ca varuṇaś caiva kuberaś ca sahānugaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:414: 14,008.005a bhūtāni ca piśācāś ca nāsatyāv aśvināv api
GE07mbh_14_u:416: 14,008.006a ādityā marutaś caiva yātudhānāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:422: 14,008.008a na rūpaṃ dṛśyate tasya saṃsthānaṃ vā kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:423: 14,008.008c nirdeṣṭuṃ prāṇibhiḥ kaiś cit prākṛtair māṃsalocanaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:424: 14,008.009a noṣṇaṃ na śiśiraṃ tatra na vāyur na ca bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:425: 14,008.009c na jarā kṣutpipāse vā na mṛtyur na bhayaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:426: 14,008.010a tasya śailasya pārśveṣu sarveṣu jayatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_14_u:430: 14,008.011d*0018_01 tatra gatvā tvam anvāsya mahāyogeśvaraṃ śivam
GE07mbh_14_u:431: 14,008.011d*0018_02 kuru praṇāmaṃ rājarṣe bhaktyā paramayā yutaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:432: 14,008.012a tasmai bhagavate kṛtvā namaḥ śarvāya vedhase
GE07mbh_14_u:433: 14,008.012b*0019_01 ebhis tvaṃ nāmabhir devaṃ sarvavidyādhipaṃ stuhi
GE07mbh_14_u:436: 14,008.013c tryakṣṇe pūṣṇo dantabhide vāmanāya śivāya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:449: 14,008.019a paśūnāṃ pataye caiva bhūtānāṃ pataye tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:467: 14,008.027a īśānaṃ śaṃkaraṃ sarvaṃ śivaṃ viśveśvaraṃ bhavam
GE07mbh_14_u:471: 14,008.028c ugraṃ sthāṇuṃ śivaṃ ghoraṃ śarvaṃ gaurīśam īśvaram
GE07mbh_14_u:472: 14,008.029a śitikaṇṭham ajaṃ śukraṃ pṛthuṃ pṛthuharaṃ haram
GE07mbh_14_u:479: 14,008.030d*0024_04 praṇamya prāñjaliḥ śarvaṃ prayāmi śaraṇaṃ haram
GE07mbh_14_u:482: 14,008.030d*0024_07 yasya nityaṃ viduḥ sthānaṃ mokṣam adhyātmacintakāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:486: 14,008.030d*0024_11 asṛjad yas tu bhūtādīn sapta lokān sanātanān
GE07mbh_14_u:487: 14,008.030d*0024_12 sthitaḥ satyopari sthāṇus taṃ prapadye sanātanam
GE07mbh_14_u:488: 14,008.030d*0024_13 bhaktānāṃ sulabhaṃ taṃ hi durlabhaṃ dūrapātinām
GE07mbh_14_u:489: 14,008.030d*0024_14 adūrastham ajaṃ devaṃ prakṛteḥ parataḥ sthitam
GE07mbh_14_u:491: 14,008.031a evaṃ kṛtvā namas tasmai mahādevāya raṃhase
GE07mbh_14_u:493: 14,008.031d*0025_01 labhante gāṇapatyaṃ ca tadekāgrā hi mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:494: 14,008.031d*0025_02 kiṃ punaḥ svarṇabhāṇḍāni tasmāt tvaṃ gaccha mā ciram
GE07mbh_14_u:495: 14,008.031d*0025_03 mahattaraṃ hi te lābhaṃ hastyaśvoṣṭrādibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_14_u:496: 14,008.031e suvarṇam āhariṣyantas tatra gacchantu te narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:498: 14,008.032a ity uktaḥ sa vacas tasya cakre kāraṃdhamātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:502: 14,008.032e sauvarṇāni ca bhāṇḍāni saṃcakrus tatra śilpinaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:504: 14,008.033a bṛhaspatis tu tāṃ śrutvā maruttasya mahīpateḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:505: 14,008.033c samṛddhim ati devebhyaḥ saṃtāpam akarod bhṛśam
GE07mbh_14_u:506: 14,008.034a sa tapyamāno vaivarṇyaṃ kṛśatvaṃ cāgamat param
GE07mbh_14_u:507: 14,008.034c bhaviṣyati hi me śatruḥ saṃvarto vasumān iti
GE07mbh_14_u:511: 14,009.001a kaccit sukhaṃ svapiṣi tvaṃ bṛhaspate; kaccin manojñāḥ paricārakās te
GE07mbh_14_u:512: 14,009.001c kaccid devānāṃ sukhakāmo 'si vipra; kaccid devās tvāṃ paripālayanti
GE07mbh_14_u:514: 14,009.002a sukhaṃ śaye 'haṃ śayane mahendra; tathā manojñāḥ paricārakā me
GE07mbh_14_u:515: 14,009.002c tathā devānāṃ sukhakāmo 'smi śakra; devāś ca māṃ subhṛśaṃ pālayanti
GE07mbh_14_u:517: 14,009.003a kuto duḥkhaṃ mānasaṃ dehajaṃ vā; pāṇḍur vivarṇaś ca kutas tvam adya
GE07mbh_14_u:518: 14,009.003c ācakṣva me tad dvija yāvad etān; nihanmi sarvāṃs tava duḥkhakartṝn
GE07mbh_14_u:521: 14,009.004c taṃ saṃvarto yājayiteti me śrutaṃ; tad icchāmi na sa taṃ yājayeta
GE07mbh_14_u:523: 14,009.005a sarvān kāmān anujāto 'si vipra; yas tvaṃ devānāṃ mantrayase purodhāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:524: 14,009.005c ubhau ca te janmamṛtyū vyatītau; kiṃ saṃvartas tava kartādya vipra
GE07mbh_14_u:526: 14,009.006a devaiḥ saha tvam asurān saṃpraṇudya; jighāṃsase 'dyāpy uta sānubandhān
GE07mbh_14_u:527: 14,009.006c yaṃ yaṃ samṛddhaṃ paśyasi tatra tatra; duḥkhaṃ sapatneṣu samṛddhabhāvaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:528: 14,009.007a ato 'smi devendra vivarṇarūpaḥ; sapatno me vardhate tan niśamya
GE07mbh_14_u:529: 14,009.007c sarvopāyair maghavan saṃniyaccha; saṃvartaṃ vā pārthivaṃ vā maruttam
GE07mbh_14_u:531: 14,009.008a ehi gaccha prahito jātavedo; bṛhaspatiṃ paridātuṃ marutte
GE07mbh_14_u:532: 14,009.008c ayaṃ vai tvā yājayitā bṛhaspatis; tathāmaraṃ caiva kariṣyatīti
GE07mbh_14_u:534: 14,009.009a ayaṃ gacchāmi tava śakrādya dūto; bṛhaspatiṃ paridātuṃ marutte
GE07mbh_14_u:535: 14,009.009c vācaṃ satyāṃ puruhūtasya kartuṃ; bṛhaspateś cāpacitiṃ cikīrṣuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:537: 14,009.010a tataḥ prāyād dhūmaketur mahātmā; vanaspatīn vīrudhaś cāvamṛdnan
GE07mbh_14_u:538: 14,009.010c kāmād dhimānte parivartamānaḥ; kāṣṭhātigo mātariśveva nardan
GE07mbh_14_u:540: 14,009.011a āścaryam adya paśyāmi rūpiṇaṃ vahnim āgatam
GE07mbh_14_u:541: 14,009.011c āsanaṃ salilaṃ pādyaṃ gāṃ copānaya vai mune
GE07mbh_14_u:544: 14,009.012c indreṇa tu samādiṣṭaṃ viddhi māṃ dūtam āgatam
GE07mbh_14_u:546: 14,009.013a kaccic chrīmān devarājaḥ sukhī ca; kaccic cāsmān prīyate dhūmaketo
GE07mbh_14_u:547: 14,009.013c kaccid devāś cāsya vaśe yathāvat; tad brūhi tvaṃ mama kārtsnyena deva
GE07mbh_14_u:549: 14,009.014a śakro bhṛśaṃ susukhī pārthivendra; prītiṃ cecchaty ajarāṃ vai tvayā saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:550: 14,009.014c devāś ca sarve vaśagās tasya rājan; saṃdeśaṃ tvaṃ śṛṇu me devarājñaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:551: 14,009.015a yadarthaṃ māṃ prāhiṇot tvatsakāśaṃ; bṛhaspatiṃ paridātuṃ marutte
GE07mbh_14_u:552: 14,009.015c ayaṃ gurur yājayitā nṛpa tvāṃ; martyaṃ santam amaraṃ tvāṃ karotu
GE07mbh_14_u:554: 14,009.016a saṃvarto 'yaṃ yājayitā dvijo me; bṛhaspater añjalir eṣa tasya
GE07mbh_14_u:555: 14,009.016c nāsau devaṃ yājayitvā mahendraṃ; martyaṃ santaṃ yājayann adya śobhet
GE07mbh_14_u:557: 14,009.017a ye vai lokā devaloke mahāntaḥ; saṃprāpsyase tān devarājaprasādāt
GE07mbh_14_u:558: 14,009.017c tvāṃ ced asau yājayed vai bṛhaspatir; nūnaṃ svargaṃ tvaṃ jayeḥ kīrtiyuktaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:559: 14,009.018a tathā lokā mānuṣā ye ca divyāḥ; prajāpateś cāpi ye vai mahāntaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:560: 14,009.018c te te jitā devarājyaṃ ca kṛtsnaṃ; bṛhaspatiś ced yājayet tvāṃ narendra
GE07mbh_14_u:562: 14,009.019a māsmān evaṃ tvaṃ punar āgāḥ kathaṃ cid; bṛhaspatiṃ paridātuṃ marutte
GE07mbh_14_u:563: 14,009.019c mā tvāṃ dhakṣye cakṣuṣā dāruṇena; saṃkruddho 'haṃ pāvaka tan nibodha
GE07mbh_14_u:565: 14,009.020a tato devān agamad dhūmaketur; dāhād bhīto vyathito 'śvatthaparṇavat
GE07mbh_14_u:566: 14,009.020c taṃ vai dṛṣṭvā prāha śakro mahātmā; bṛhaspateḥ saṃnidhau havyavāham
GE07mbh_14_u:567: 14,009.021a yat tvaṃ gataḥ prahito jātavedo; bṛhaspatiṃ paridātuṃ marutte
GE07mbh_14_u:568: 14,009.021c tat kiṃ prāha sa nṛpo yakṣyamāṇaḥ; kaccid vacaḥ pratigṛhṇāti tac ca
GE07mbh_14_u:570: 14,009.022a na te vācaṃ rocayate marutto; bṛhaspater añjaliṃ prāhiṇot saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:571: 14,009.022c saṃvarto māṃ yājayitety abhīkṣṇaṃ; punaḥ punaḥ sa mayā procyamānaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:572: 14,009.023a uvācedaṃ mānuṣā ye ca divyāḥ; prajāpater ye ca lokā mahāntaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:573: 14,009.023c tāṃś cel labheyaṃ saṃvidaṃ tena kṛtvā; tathāpi neccheyam iti pratītaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:575: 14,009.024a punar bhavān pārthivaṃ taṃ sametya; vākyaṃ madīyaṃ prāpaya svārthayuktam
GE07mbh_14_u:576: 14,009.024c punar yady ukto na kariṣyate vacas; tato vajraṃ saṃprahartāsmi tasmai
GE07mbh_14_u:578: 14,009.025a gandharvarāḍ yātv ayaṃ tatra dūto; bibhemy ahaṃ vāsava tatra gantum
GE07mbh_14_u:579: 14,009.025c saṃrabdho mām abravīt tīkṣṇaroṣaḥ; saṃvarto vākyaṃ caritabrahmacaryaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:580: 14,009.026a yady āgaccheḥ punar evaṃ kathaṃ cid; bṛhaspatiṃ paridātuṃ marutte
GE07mbh_14_u:581: 14,009.026c daheyaṃ tvāṃ cakṣuṣā dāruṇena; saṃkruddha ity etad avaihi śakra
GE07mbh_14_u:583: 14,009.027a tvam evānyān dahase jātavedo; na hi tvad anyo vidyate bhasmakartā
GE07mbh_14_u:584: 14,009.027c tvatsaṃsparśāt sarvaloko bibhety; aśraddheyaṃ vadase havyavāha
GE07mbh_14_u:586: 14,009.028a divaṃ devendra pṛthivīṃ caiva sarvāṃ; saṃveṣṭayes tvaṃ svabalenaiva śakra
GE07mbh_14_u:587: 14,009.028c evaṃvidhasyeha satas tavāsau; kathaṃ vṛtras tridivaṃ prāg jahāra
GE07mbh_14_u:589: 14,009.029a na caṇḍikā jaṅgamā no kareṇur; na vārisomaṃ prapibāmi vahne
GE07mbh_14_u:590: 14,009.029c na durbale vai visṛjāmi vajraṃ; ko me 'sukhāya praharen manuṣyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:591: 14,009.030a pravrājayeyaṃ kālakeyān pṛthivyām; apākarṣaṃ dānavān antarikṣāt
GE07mbh_14_u:592: 14,009.030c divaḥ prahrādam avasānam ānayaṃ; ko me 'sukhāya prahareta martyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:594: 14,009.031a yatra śaryātiṃ cyavano yājayiṣyan; sahāśvibhyāṃ somam agṛhṇad ekaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:595: 14,009.031c taṃ tvaṃ kruddhaḥ pratyaṣedhīḥ purastāc; charyātiyajñaṃ smara taṃ mahendra
GE07mbh_14_u:596: 14,009.032a vajraṃ gṛhītvā ca puraṃdara tvaṃ; saṃprāhārṣīś cyavanasyātighoram
GE07mbh_14_u:597: 14,009.032c sa te vipraḥ saha vajreṇa bāhum; apāgṛhṇāt tapasā jātamanyuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:598: 14,009.033a tato roṣāt sarvato ghorarūpaṃ; sapatnaṃ te janayām āsa bhūyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:599: 14,009.033c madaṃ nāmāsuraṃ viśvarūpaṃ; yaṃ tvaṃ dṛṣṭvā cakṣuṣī saṃnyamīlaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:600: 14,009.034a hanur ekā jagatīsthā tathaikā; divaṃ gatā mahato dānavasya
GE07mbh_14_u:601: 14,009.034c sahasraṃ dantānāṃ śatayojanānāṃ; sutīkṣṇānāṃ ghorarūpaṃ babhūva
GE07mbh_14_u:602: 14,009.035a vṛttāḥ sthūlā rajatastambhavarṇā; daṃṣṭrāś catasro dve śate yojanānām
GE07mbh_14_u:603: 14,009.035c sa tvāṃ dantān vidaśann abhyadhāvaj; jighāṃsayā śūlam udyamya ghoram
GE07mbh_14_u:604: 14,009.036a apaśyas tvaṃ taṃ tadā ghorarūpaṃ; sarve tv anye dadṛśur darśanīyam
GE07mbh_14_u:605: 14,009.036c yasmād bhītaḥ prāñjalis tvaṃ maharṣim; āgacchethāḥ śaraṇaṃ dānavaghna
GE07mbh_14_u:606: 14,009.037a kṣatrād evaṃ brahmabalaṃ garīyo; na brahmataḥ kiṃ cid anyad garīyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:607: 14,009.037c so 'haṃ jānan brahmatejo yathāvan; na saṃvartaṃ gantum icchāmi śakra
GE07mbh_14_u:609: 14,010.001a evam etad brahmabalaṃ garīyo; na brahmataḥ kiṃ cid anyad garīyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:610: 14,010.001c āvikṣitasya tu balaṃ na mṛṣye; vajram asmai prahariṣyāmi ghoram
GE07mbh_14_u:611: 14,010.002a dhṛtarāṣṭra prahito gaccha maruttaṃ; saṃvartena sahitaṃ taṃ vadasva
GE07mbh_14_u:612: 14,010.002c bṛhaspatiṃ tvam upaśikṣasva rājan; vajraṃ vā te prahariṣyāmi ghoram
GE07mbh_14_u:614: 14,010.003a tato gatvā dhṛtarāṣṭro narendraṃ; provācedaṃ vacanaṃ vāsavasya
GE07mbh_14_u:615: 14,010.003c gandharvaṃ māṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ nibodha; tvām āgataṃ vaktukāmaṃ narendra
GE07mbh_14_u:616: 14,010.004a aindraṃ vākyaṃ śṛṇu me rājasiṃha; yat prāha lokādhipatir mahātmā
GE07mbh_14_u:617: 14,010.004c bṛhaspatiṃ yājakaṃ tvaṃ vṛṇīṣva; vajraṃ vā te prahariṣyāmi ghoram
GE07mbh_14_u:618: 14,010.004e vacaś ced etan na kariṣyase me; prāhaitad etāvad acintyakarmā
GE07mbh_14_u:622: 14,010.005a tvaṃ caivaitad vettha puraṃdaraś ca; viśvedevā vasavaś cāśvinau ca
GE07mbh_14_u:623: 14,010.005c mitradrohe niṣkṛtir vai yathaiva; nāstīti lokeṣu sadaiva vādaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:624: 14,010.006a bṛhaspatir yājayitā mahendraṃ; devaśreṣṭhaṃ vajrabhṛtāṃ variṣṭham
GE07mbh_14_u:625: 14,010.006c saṃvarto māṃ yājayitādya rājan; na te vākyaṃ tasya vā rocayāmi
GE07mbh_14_u:627: 14,010.007a ghoro nādaḥ śrūyate vāsavasya; nabhastale garjato rājasiṃha
GE07mbh_14_u:628: 14,010.007c vyaktaṃ vajraṃ mokṣyate te mahendraḥ; kṣemaṃ rājaṃś cintyatām eṣa kālaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:630: 14,010.008a ity evam ukto dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa rājā; śrutvā nādaṃ nadato vāsavasya
GE07mbh_14_u:631: 14,010.008c taponityaṃ dharmavidāṃ variṣṭhaṃ; saṃvartaṃ taṃ jñāpayām āsa kāryam
GE07mbh_14_u:633: 14,010.009a imam aśmānaṃ plavamānam ārād; adhvā dūraṃ tena na dṛśyate 'dya
GE07mbh_14_u:634: 14,010.009c prapadye 'haṃ śarma viprendra tvattaḥ; prayaccha tasmād abhayaṃ vipramukhya
GE07mbh_14_u:635: 14,010.010a ayam āyāti vai vajrī diśo vidyotayan daśa
GE07mbh_14_u:636: 14,010.010c amānuṣeṇa ghoreṇa sadasyās trāsitā hi naḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:638: 14,010.011a bhayaṃ śakrād vyetu te rājasiṃha; praṇotsye 'haṃ bhayam etat sughoram
GE07mbh_14_u:639: 14,010.011c saṃstambhinyā vidyayā kṣipram eva; mā bhais tvam asmād bhava cāpi pratītaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:640: 14,010.012a ahaṃ saṃstambhayiṣyāmi mā bhais tvaṃ śakrato nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:641: 14,010.012c sarveṣām eva devānāṃ kṣapitāny āyudhāni me
GE07mbh_14_u:642: 14,010.013a diśo vajraṃ vrajatāṃ vāyur etu; varṣaṃ bhūtvā nipatatu kānaneṣu
GE07mbh_14_u:643: 14,010.013c āpaḥ plavantv antarikṣe vṛthā ca; saudāminī dṛśyatāṃ mā bibhas tvam
GE07mbh_14_u:644: 14,010.014a atho vahnis trātu vā sarvatas te; kāmaṃ varṣaṃ varṣatu vāsavo vā
GE07mbh_14_u:645: 14,010.014c vajraṃ tathā sthāpayatāṃ ca vāyur; mahāghoraṃ plavamānaṃ jalaughaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:647: 14,010.015a ghoraḥ śabdaḥ śrūyate vai mahāsvano; vajrasyaiṣa sahito mārutena
GE07mbh_14_u:648: 14,010.015c ātmā hi me pravyathate muhur muhur; na me svāsthyaṃ jāyate cādya vipra
GE07mbh_14_u:650: 14,010.016a vajrād ugrād vyetu bhayaṃ tavādya; vāto bhūtvā hanmi narendra vajram
GE07mbh_14_u:651: 14,010.016c bhayaṃ tyaktvā varam anyaṃ vṛṇīṣva; kaṃ te kāmaṃ tapasā sādhayāmi
GE07mbh_14_u:653: 14,010.017a indraḥ sākṣāt sahasābhyetu vipra; havir yajñe pratigṛhṇātu caiva
GE07mbh_14_u:654: 14,010.017c svaṃ svaṃ dhiṣṇyaṃ caiva juṣantu devāḥ; sutaṃ somaṃ pratigṛhṇantu caiva
GE07mbh_14_u:656: 14,010.018a ayam indro haribhir āyāti rājan; devaiḥ sarvaiḥ sahitaḥ somapīthī
GE07mbh_14_u:657: 14,010.018c mantrāhūto yajñam imaṃ mayādya; paśyasvainaṃ mantravisrastakāyam
GE07mbh_14_u:659: 14,010.019a tato devaiḥ sahito devarājo; rathe yuktvā tān harīn vājimukhyān
GE07mbh_14_u:660: 14,010.019c āyād yajñam adhi rājñaḥ pipāsur; āvikṣitasyāprameyasya somam
GE07mbh_14_u:661: 14,010.020a tam āyāntaṃ sahitaṃ devasaṃghaiḥ; pratyudyayau sapurodhā maruttaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:662: 14,010.020c cakre pūjāṃ devarājāya cāgryāṃ; yathāśāstraṃ vidhivat prīyamāṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:664: 14,010.021a svāgataṃ te puruhūteha vidvan; yajño 'dyāyaṃ saṃnihite tvayīndra
GE07mbh_14_u:665: 14,010.021c śośubhyate balavṛtraghna bhūyaḥ; pibasva somaṃ sutam udyataṃ mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:667: 14,010.022a śivena māṃ paśya namaś ca te 'stu; prāpto yajñaḥ saphalaṃ jīvitaṃ me
GE07mbh_14_u:668: 14,010.022c ayaṃ yajñaṃ kurute me surendra; bṛhaspater avaro janmanā yaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:670: 14,010.023a jānāmi te gurum enaṃ tapodhanaṃ; bṛhaspater anujaṃ tigmatejasam
GE07mbh_14_u:671: 14,010.023c yasyāhvānād āgato 'haṃ narendra; prītir me 'dya tvayi manuḥ pranaṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:673: 14,010.024a yadi prītas tvam asi vai devarāja; tasmāt svayaṃ śādhi yajñe vidhānam
GE07mbh_14_u:674: 14,010.024c svayaṃ sarvān kuru mārgān surendra; jānātv ayaṃ sarvalokaś ca deva
GE07mbh_14_u:676: 14,010.025a evam uktas tv āṅgirasena śakraḥ; samādideśa svayam eva devān
GE07mbh_14_u:677: 14,010.025c sabhāḥ kriyantām āvasathāś ca mukhyāḥ; sahasraśaś citrabhaumāḥ samṛddhāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:678: 14,010.026a kḷptasthūṇāḥ kurutārohaṇāni; gandharvāṇām apsarasāṃ ca śīghram
GE07mbh_14_u:679: 14,010.026c yeṣu nṛtyerann apsarasaḥ sahasraśaḥ; svargoddeśaḥ kriyatāṃ yajñavāṭaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:680: 14,010.027a ity uktās te cakrur āśu pratītā; divaukasaḥ śakravākyān narendra
GE07mbh_14_u:681: 14,010.027c tato vākyaṃ prāha rājānam indraḥ; prīto rājan pūjayāno maruttam
GE07mbh_14_u:682: 14,010.028a eṣa tvayāham iha rājan sametya; ye cāpy anye tava pūrve narendrāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:683: 14,010.028c sarvāś cānyā devatāḥ prīyamāṇā; havis tubhyaṃ pratigṛhṇantu rājan
GE07mbh_14_u:684: 14,010.029a āgneyaṃ vai lohitam ālabhantāṃ; vaiśvadevaṃ bahurūpaṃ virājan
GE07mbh_14_u:685: 14,010.029c nīlaṃ cokṣāṇaṃ medhyam abhyālabhantāṃ; calac chiśnaṃ matpradiṣṭaṃ dvijendrāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:686: 14,010.030a tato yajño vavṛdhe tasya rājño; yatra devāḥ svayam annāni jahruḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:687: 14,010.030c yasmiñ śakro brāhmaṇaiḥ pūjyamānaḥ; sadasyo 'bhūd dharimān devarājaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:688: 14,010.031a tataḥ saṃvartaś cityagato mahātmā; yathā vahniḥ prajvalito dvitīyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:689: 14,010.031c havīṃṣy uccair āhvayan devasaṃghāñ; juhāvāgnau mantravat supratītaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:690: 14,010.032a tataḥ pītvā balabhit somam agryaṃ; ye cāpy anye somapā vai divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:691: 14,010.032c sarve 'nujñātāḥ prayayuḥ pārthivena; yathājoṣaṃ tarpitāḥ prītimantaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:692: 14,010.033a tato rājā jātarūpasya rāśīn; pade pade kārayām āsa hṛṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:693: 14,010.033c dvijātibhyo visṛjan bhūri vittaṃ; rarāja vitteśa ivārihantā
GE07mbh_14_u:694: 14,010.034a tato vittaṃ vividhaṃ saṃnidhāya; yathotsāhaṃ kārayitvā ca kośam
GE07mbh_14_u:695: 14,010.034c anujñāto guruṇā saṃnivṛtya; śaśāsa gām akhilāṃ sāgarāntām
GE07mbh_14_u:696: 14,010.035a evaṃguṇaḥ saṃbabhūveha rājā; yasya kratau tat suvarṇaṃ prabhūtam
GE07mbh_14_u:697: 14,010.035c tat tvaṃ samādāya narendra vittaṃ; yajasva devāṃs tarpayāno vidhānaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:699: 14,010.036a tato rājā pāṇḍavo hṛṣṭarūpaḥ; śrutvā vākyaṃ satyavatyāḥ sutasya
GE07mbh_14_u:700: 14,010.036c manaś cakre tena vittena yaṣṭuṃ; tato 'mātyair mantrayām āsa bhūyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:709: 14,011.004a sarvaṃ jihmaṃ mṛtyupadam ārjavaṃ brahmaṇaḥ padam
GE07mbh_14_u:711: 14,011.005a naiva te niṣṭhitaṃ karma naiva te śatravo jitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:714: 14,011.006c indrasya saha vṛtreṇa yathā yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_14_u:715: 14,011.007a vṛtreṇa pṛthivī vyāptā purā kila narādhipa
GE07mbh_14_u:716: 14,011.007c dṛṣṭvā sa pṛthivīṃ vyāptāṃ gandhasya viṣaye hṛte
GE07mbh_14_u:719: 14,011.008c vṛtrasya sa tataḥ kruddho vajraṃ ghoram avāsṛjat
GE07mbh_14_u:722: 14,011.010a vyāptāsv athāpsu vṛtreṇa rase ca viṣaye hṛte
GE07mbh_14_u:725: 14,011.011c viveśa sahasā jyotir jagrāha viṣayaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:726: 14,011.012a vyāpte jyotiṣi vṛtreṇa rūpe 'tha viṣaye hṛte
GE07mbh_14_u:729: 14,011.013c viveśa sahasā vāyuṃ jagrāha viṣayaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:730: 14,011.014a vyāpte vāyau tu vṛtreṇa sparśe 'tha viṣaye hṛte
GE07mbh_14_u:734: 14,011.016a ākāśe vṛtrabhūte ca śabde ca viṣaye hṛte
GE07mbh_14_u:737: 14,011.017c viveśa sahasā śakraṃ jagrāha viṣayaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:743: 14,011.020c ṛṣibhiś ca mama proktaṃ tan nibodha narādhipa
GE07mbh_14_u:745: 14,012.001a dvividho jāyate vyādhiḥ śārīro mānasas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:747: 14,012.002a śarīre jāyate vyādhiḥ śārīro nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:748: 14,012.002c mānaso jāyate vyādhir manasy eveti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:749: 14,012.003a śītoṣṇe caiva vāyuś ca guṇā rājañ śarīrajāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:750: 14,012.003c teṣāṃ guṇānāṃ sāmyaṃ cet tad āhuḥ svasthalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:751: 14,012.003e uṣṇena bādhyate śītaṃ śītenoṣṇaṃ ca bādhyate
GE07mbh_14_u:752: 14,012.003f*0029_01 ubhābhyāṃ badhyate vāyur vidhānam idam ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:753: 14,012.004a sattvaṃ rajas tamaś ceti trayas tv ātmaguṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:754: 14,012.004c teṣāṃ guṇānāṃ sāmyaṃ cet tad āhuḥ svasthalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:756: 14,012.005a harṣeṇa bādhyate śoko harṣaḥ śokena bādhyate
GE07mbh_14_u:757: 14,012.005b*0030_01 ubhābhyāṃ vadhyate moho vidhānam idam ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:758: 14,012.005c kaś cid duḥkhe vartamānaḥ sukhasya smartum icchati
GE07mbh_14_u:759: 14,012.005e kaś cit sukhe vartamāno duḥkhasya smartum icchati
GE07mbh_14_u:760: 14,012.006a sa tvaṃ na duḥkhī duḥkhasya na sukhī susukhasya vā
GE07mbh_14_u:761: 14,012.006c smartum icchasi kaunteya diṣṭaṃ hi balavattaram
GE07mbh_14_u:762: 14,012.007a atha vā te svabhāvo 'yaṃ yena pārthāvakṛṣyase
GE07mbh_14_u:764: 14,012.007e miṣatāṃ pāṇḍaveyānāṃ na tat saṃsmartum icchasi
GE07mbh_14_u:765: 14,012.008a pravrājanaṃ ca nagarād ajinaiś ca vivāsanam
GE07mbh_14_u:766: 14,012.008c mahāraṇyanivāsaś ca na tasya smartum icchasi
GE07mbh_14_u:768: 14,012.009c saindhavāc ca parikleśo na tasya smartum icchasi
GE07mbh_14_u:770: 14,012.010c yājñasenyās tadā pārtha na tasya smartum icchasi
GE07mbh_14_u:771: 14,012.011a yac ca te droṇabhīṣmābhyāṃ yuddham āsīd ariṃdama
GE07mbh_14_u:772: 14,012.011c manasaikena yoddhavyaṃ tat te yuddham upasthitam
GE07mbh_14_u:775: 14,012.012c yatra naiva śaraiḥ kāryaṃ na bhṛtyair na ca bandhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:776: 14,012.012e ātmanaikena yoddhavyaṃ tat te yuddham upasthitam
GE07mbh_14_u:777: 14,012.013a tasminn anirjite yuddhe kām avasthāṃ gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_14_u:778: 14,012.013c etaj jñātvā tu kaunteya kṛtakṛtyo bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_14_u:779: 14,012.014a etāṃ buddhiṃ viniścitya bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim
GE07mbh_14_u:782: 14,013.001a na bāhyaṃ dravyam utsṛjya siddhir bhavati bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:783: 14,013.001c śārīraṃ dravyam utsṛjya siddhir bhavati vā na vā
GE07mbh_14_u:785: 14,013.002c yo dharmo yat sukhaṃ caiva dviṣatām astu tat tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:786: 14,013.003a dvyakṣaras tu bhaven mṛtyus tryakṣaraṃ brahma śāśvatam
GE07mbh_14_u:787: 14,013.003c mameti dvyakṣaro mṛtyur na mameti ca śāśvatam
GE07mbh_14_u:788: 14,013.004a brahma mṛtyuś ca tau rājann ātmany eva vyavasthitau
GE07mbh_14_u:793: 14,013.006c mamatvaṃ yasya naiva syāt kiṃ tayā sa kariṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:794: 14,013.007a atha vā vasataḥ pārtha vane vanyena jīvataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:795: 14,013.007c mamatā yasya dravyeṣu mṛtyor āsye sa vartate
GE07mbh_14_u:797: 14,013.008c yan na paśyati tad bhūtaṃ mucyate sa mahābhayāt
GE07mbh_14_u:798: 14,013.009a kāmātmānaṃ na praśaṃsanti loke; na cākāmāt kā cid asti pravṛttiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:803: 14,013.009c dānaṃ hi vedādhyayanaṃ tapaś ca; kāmena karmāṇi ca vaidikāni
GE07mbh_14_u:804: 14,013.010a vrataṃ yajñān niyamān dhyānayogān; kāmena yo nārabhate viditvā
GE07mbh_14_u:805: 14,013.010c yad yad dhy ayaṃ kāmayate sa dharmo; na yo dharmo niyamas tasya mūlam
GE07mbh_14_u:808: 14,013.012a nāhaṃ śakyo 'nupāyena hantuṃ bhūtena kena cit
GE07mbh_14_u:809: 14,013.012c yo māṃ prayatate hantuṃ jñātvā praharaṇe balam
GE07mbh_14_u:810: 14,013.012e tasya tasmin praharaṇe punaḥ prādurbhavāmy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:811: 14,013.013a yo māṃ prayatate hantuṃ yajñair vividhadakṣiṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:812: 14,013.013c jaṅgameṣv iva karmātmā punaḥ prādurbhavāmy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:813: 14,013.014a yo māṃ prayatate hantuṃ vedair vedāntasādhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:814: 14,013.014c sthāvareṣv iva śāntātmā tasya prādurbhavāmy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:815: 14,013.015a yo māṃ prayatate hantuṃ dhṛtyā satyaparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:816: 14,013.015c bhāvo bhavāmi tasyāhaṃ sa ca māṃ nāvabudhyate
GE07mbh_14_u:817: 14,013.016a yo māṃ prayatate hantuṃ tapasā saṃśitavrataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:818: 14,013.016c tatas tapasi tasyātha punaḥ prādurbhavāmy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:819: 14,013.017a yo māṃ prayatate hantuṃ mokṣam āsthāya paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:820: 14,013.017c tasya mokṣaratisthasya nṛtyāmi ca hasāmi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:822: 14,013.018a tasmāt tvam api taṃ kāmaṃ yajñair vividhadakṣiṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:823: 14,013.018c dharmaṃ kuru mahārāja tatra te sa bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:825: 14,013.019c anyaiś ca vividhair yajñaiḥ samṛddhair āptadakṣiṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:826: 14,013.020a mā te vyathāstu nihatān bandhūn vīkṣya punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:827: 14,013.020c na śakyās te punar draṣṭuṃ ye hatāsmin raṇājire
GE07mbh_14_u:828: 14,013.021a sa tvam iṣṭvā mahāyajñaiḥ samṛddhair āptadakṣiṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:829: 14,013.021c loke kīrtiṃ parāṃ prāpya gatim agryāṃ gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_14_u:831: 14,014.001a evaṃ bahuvidhair vākyair munibhis tais tapodhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:838: 14,014.004c vyajahāc chokajaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃtāpaṃ caiva mānasam
GE07mbh_14_u:839: 14,014.005a arcayām āsa devāṃś ca brāhmaṇāṃś ca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:840: 14,014.005c kṛtvātha pretakāryāṇi bandhūnāṃ sa punar nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:843: 14,014.006c vyāsaṃ ca nāradaṃ caiva tāṃś cānyān abravīn nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:845: 14,014.007c na sūkṣmam api me kiṃ cid vyalīkam iha vidyate

GE07mbh_14_u:930: 14,015.001a vijite pāṇḍaveyais tu praśānte ca dvijottama
GE07mbh_14_u:933: 14,015.002a vijite pāṇḍaveyais tu praśānte ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_14_u:935: 14,015.003a vijahrāte mudā yuktau divi deveśvarāv iva
GE07mbh_14_u:936: 14,015.003c tau vaneṣu vicitreṣu parvatānāṃ ca sānuṣu
GE07mbh_14_u:940: 14,015.005c praviśya tāṃ sabhāṃ ramyāṃ vijahrāte ca bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:941: 14,015.006a tatra yuddhakathāś citrāḥ parikleśāṃś ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_14_u:944: 14,015.007a ṛṣīṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca vaṃśāṃs tāv āhatus tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:947: 14,015.008c niścayajñaḥ sa pārthāya kathayām āsa keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:949: 14,015.009c kathābhiḥ śamayām āsa pārthaṃ śaurir janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:950: 14,015.010a sa tam āśvāsya vidhivad vidhānajño mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:952: 14,015.011a tataḥ kathānte govindo guḍākeśam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_14_u:953: 14,015.011c sāntvayañ ślakṣṇayā vācā hetuyuktam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:958: 14,015.014a dharmeṇa rājñā dharmajña prāptaṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam
GE07mbh_14_u:959: 14,015.014c dharmeṇa nihataḥ saṃkhye sa ca rājā suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:963: 14,015.016c bhuṅkte dharmasuto rājā tvayā guptaḥ kurūdvaha
GE07mbh_14_u:964: 14,015.017a rame cāhaṃ tvayā sārdham araṇyeṣv api pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:965: 14,015.017c kim u yatra jano 'yaṃ vai pṛthā cāmitrakarśana
GE07mbh_14_u:966: 14,015.018a yatra dharmasuto rājā yatra bhīmo mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:967: 14,015.018c yatra mādravatīputrau ratis tatra parā mama
GE07mbh_14_u:970: 14,015.020a kālo mahāṃs tv atīto me śūraputram apaśyataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:972: 14,015.021a so 'haṃ gantum abhīpsāmi purīṃ dvāravatīṃ prati
GE07mbh_14_u:974: 14,015.022a ukto bahuvidhaṃ rājā tatra tatra yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:975: 14,015.022c sa ha bhīṣmeṇa yady uktam asmābhiḥ śokakārite
GE07mbh_14_u:976: 14,015.023a śiṣṭo yudhiṣṭhiro 'smābhiḥ śāstā sann api pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:977: 14,015.023c tena tac ca vacaḥ samyag gṛhītaṃ sumahātmanā
GE07mbh_14_u:979: 14,015.024c satyaṃ dharmo matiś cāgryā sthitiś ca satataṃ sthirā
GE07mbh_14_u:980: 14,015.025a tad gatvā taṃ mahātmānaṃ yadi te rocate 'rjuna
GE07mbh_14_u:982: 14,015.026a na hi tasyāpriyaṃ kuryāṃ prāṇatyāge 'py upasthite
GE07mbh_14_u:983: 14,015.026c kuto gantuṃ mahābāho purīṃ dvāravatīṃ prati
GE07mbh_14_u:984: 14,015.027a sarvaṃ tv idam ahaṃ pārtha tvatprītihitakāmyayā
GE07mbh_14_u:985: 14,015.027c bravīmi satyaṃ kauravya na mithyaitat kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:986: 14,015.028a prayojanaṃ ca nirvṛttam iha vāse mamārjuna
GE07mbh_14_u:988: 14,015.029a pṛthivī ca vaśe tāta dharmaputrasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:991: 14,015.030a dharmeṇa rājā dharmajñaḥ pātu sarvāṃ vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_14_u:994: 14,015.031a tan mayā saha gatvādya rājānaṃ kuruvardhanam
GE07mbh_14_u:996: 14,015.032a idaṃ śarīraṃ vasu yac ca me gṛhe; niveditaṃ pārtha sadā yudhiṣṭhire
GE07mbh_14_u:997: 14,015.032c priyaś ca mānyaś ca hi me yudhiṣṭhiraḥ; sadā kurūṇām adhipo mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:998: 14,015.033a prayojanaṃ cāpi nivāsakāraṇe; na vidyate me tvad ṛte mahābhuja
GE07mbh_14_u:999: 14,015.033c sthitā hi pṛthvī tava pārtha śāsane; guroḥ suvṛttasya yudhiṣṭhirasya ha
GE07mbh_14_u:1000: 14,015.034a itīdam uktaṃ sa tadā mahātmanā; janārdanenāmitavikramo 'rjunaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1001: 14,015.034c tatheti kṛcchrād iva vācam īrayaj; janārdanaṃ saṃpratipūjya pārthiva
GE07mbh_14_u:1004: 14,016.001c keśavārjunayoḥ kā nu kathā samabhavad dvija
GE07mbh_14_u:1006: 14,016.002a kṛṣṇena sahitaḥ pārthaḥ svarājyaṃ prāpya kevalam
GE07mbh_14_u:1007: 14,016.002c tasyāṃ sabhāyāṃ ramyāyāṃ vijahāra mudā yutaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1008: 14,016.003a tataḥ kaṃ cit sabhoddeśaṃ svargoddeśasamaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:1011: 14,016.004c nirīkṣya tāṃ sabhāṃ ramyām idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:1013: 14,016.005c māhātmyaṃ devakīmātas tac ca te rūpam aiśvaram
GE07mbh_14_u:1014: 14,016.006a yat tu tad bhavatā proktaṃ tadā keśava sauhṛdāt
GE07mbh_14_u:1015: 14,016.006c tat sarvaṃ puruṣavyāghra naṣṭaṃ me naṣṭacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1016: 14,016.007a mama kautūhalaṃ tv asti teṣv artheṣu punaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:1017: 14,016.007c bhavāṃś ca dvārakāṃ gantā nacirād iva mādhava
GE07mbh_14_u:1018: 14,016.008a evam uktas tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ phalgunaṃ pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_14_u:1020: 14,016.009a śrāvitas tvaṃ mayā guhyaṃ jñāpitaś ca sanātanam
GE07mbh_14_u:1021: 14,016.009c dharmaṃ svarūpiṇaṃ pārtha sarvalokāṃś ca śāśvatān
GE07mbh_14_u:1022: 14,016.010a abuddhvā yan na gṛhṇīthās tan me sumahad apriyam
GE07mbh_14_u:1023: 14,016.010b*0034_01 na ca sādya punar bhūyaḥ smṛtir me saṃbhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:1025: 14,016.010d*0035_01 na ca śakyaḥ punar vaktum aśeṣeṇa dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_14_u:1026: 14,016.011a sa hi dharmaḥ suparyāpto brahmaṇaḥ padavedane
GE07mbh_14_u:1027: 14,016.011c na śakyaṃ tan mayā bhūyas tathā vaktum aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1028: 14,016.012a paraṃ hi brahma kathitaṃ yogayuktena tan mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:1029: 14,016.012c itihāsaṃ tu vakṣyāmi tasminn arthe purātanam
GE07mbh_14_u:1030: 14,016.013a yathā tāṃ buddhim āsthāya gatim agryāṃ gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_14_u:1031: 14,016.013c śṛṇu dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha gadataḥ sarvam eva me
GE07mbh_14_u:1032: 14,016.014a āgacchad brāhmaṇaḥ kaś cit svargalokād ariṃdama
GE07mbh_14_u:1034: 14,016.014d*0036_01 paripṛṣṭaś ca sa tadā yad āha dvijasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1035: 14,016.015a asmābhiḥ paripṛṣṭaś ca yad āha bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_14_u:1042: 14,016.018a kaś cid vipras tapoyuktaḥ kāśyapo dharmavittamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1043: 14,016.018c āsasāda dvijaṃ kaṃ cid dharmāṇām āgatāgamam
GE07mbh_14_u:1049: 14,016.021c dīpyamānaṃ śriyā brāhmyā kramamāṇaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1052: 14,016.023a saṃbhāṣamāṇam ekānte samāsīnaṃ ca taiḥ saha
GE07mbh_14_u:1053: 14,016.023c yadṛcchayā ca gacchantam asaktaṃ pavanaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_14_u:1054: 14,016.024a taṃ samāsādya medhāvī sa tadā dvijasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1057: 14,016.025a vismitaś cādbhutaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāśyapas taṃ dvijottamam
GE07mbh_14_u:1061: 14,016.027a tasmai tuṣṭaḥ sa śiṣyāya prasanno 'thābravīd guruḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1062: 14,016.027c siddhiṃ parām abhiprekṣya śṛṇu tan me janārdana
GE07mbh_14_u:1063: 14,016.028a vividhaiḥ karmabhis tāta puṇyayogaiś ca kevalaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1064: 14,016.028c gacchantīha gatiṃ martyā devaloke 'pi ca sthitim
GE07mbh_14_u:1065: 14,016.029a na kva cit sukham atyantaṃ na kva cic chāśvatī sthitiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1066: 14,016.029c sthānāc ca mahato bhraṃśo duḥkhalabdhāt punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1067: 14,016.030a aśubhā gatayaḥ prāptāḥ kaṣṭā me pāpasevanāt
GE07mbh_14_u:1069: 14,016.031a punaḥ punaś ca maraṇaṃ janma caiva punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1070: 14,016.031c āhārā vividhā bhuktāḥ pītā nānāvidhāḥ stanāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1071: 14,016.032a mātaro vividhā dṛṣṭāḥ pitaraś ca pṛthagvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1072: 14,016.032c sukhāni ca vicitrāṇi duḥkhāni ca mayānagha
GE07mbh_14_u:1073: 14,016.033a priyair vivāso bahuśaḥ saṃvāsaś cāpriyaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_14_u:1074: 14,016.033c dhananāśaś ca saṃprāpto labdhvā duḥkhena tad dhanam
GE07mbh_14_u:1075: 14,016.034a avamānāḥ sukaṣṭāś ca parataḥ svajanāt tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:1077: 14,016.035a prāptā vimānanāś cogrā vadhabandhāś ca dāruṇāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1078: 14,016.035c patanaṃ niraye caiva yātanāś ca yamakṣaye
GE07mbh_14_u:1079: 14,016.036a jarā rogāś ca satataṃ vāsanāni ca bhūriśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1081: 14,016.037a tataḥ kadā cin nirvedān nikārān nikṛtena ca
GE07mbh_14_u:1084: 14,016.037e tataḥ siddhir iyaṃ prāptā prasādād ātmano mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:1085: 14,016.038a nāhaṃ punar ihāgantā lokān ālokayāmy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:1086: 14,016.038c ā siddher ā prajāsargād ātmano me gatiḥ śubhā
GE07mbh_14_u:1088: 14,016.039c itaḥ paraṃ gamiṣyāmi tataḥ parataraṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1089: 14,016.039e brahmaṇaḥ padam avyagraṃ mā te bhūd atra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1091: 14,016.040c prīto 'smi te mahāprājña brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te
GE07mbh_14_u:1092: 14,016.041a yadīpsur upapannas tvaṃ tasya kālo 'yam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1093: 14,016.041c abhijāne ca tad ahaṃ yadarthaṃ mā tvam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1094: 14,016.041e acirāt tu gamiṣyāmi yenāhaṃ tvām acūcudam
GE07mbh_14_u:1096: 14,016.042c paripṛccha yāvad bhavate bhāṣeyaṃ yat tavepsitam
GE07mbh_14_u:1097: 14,016.043a bahu manye ca te buddhiṃ bhṛśaṃ saṃpūjayāmi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:1098: 14,016.043c yenāhaṃ bhavatā buddho medhāvī hy asi kāśyapa
GE07mbh_14_u:1101: 14,017.001c papraccha tāṃś ca sarvān sa prāha dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1104: 14,017.002c kathaṃ kaṣṭāc ca saṃsārāt saṃsaran parimucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:1105: 14,017.003a ātmānaṃ vā kathaṃ yuktvā tac charīraṃ vimuñcati
GE07mbh_14_u:1106: 14,017.003c śarīrataś ca nirmuktaḥ katham anyat prapadyate
GE07mbh_14_u:1107: 14,017.004a kathaṃ śubhāśubhe cāyaṃ karmaṇī svakṛte naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1110: 14,017.005a evaṃ saṃcoditaḥ siddhaḥ praśnāṃs tān pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_14_u:1111: 14,017.005c ānupūrvyeṇa vārṣṇeya yathā tan me vacaḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:1113: 14,017.005d*0038_01 asminn evāśubhaphalā āyuṣyās tu kriyāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1119: 14,017.008a sattvaṃ balaṃ ca kālaṃ cāpy aviditvātmanas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:1122: 14,017.009c atyartham api vā bhuṅkte na vā bhuṅkte kadā cana
GE07mbh_14_u:1123: 14,017.010a duṣṭānnaṃ viṣamānnaṃ ca so 'nyonyena virodhi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:1124: 14,017.010c guru vāpi samaṃ bhuṅkte nātijīrṇe 'pi vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1131: 14,017.014a tasya taiḥ kāraṇair jantoḥ śarīrāc cyavate yathā
GE07mbh_14_u:1134: 14,017.015c śarīram anuparyeti sarvān prāṇān ruṇaddhi vai
GE07mbh_14_u:1136: 14,017.016c bhinatti jīvasthānāni tāni marmāṇi viddhi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:1137: 14,017.017a tataḥ savedanaḥ sadyo jīvaḥ pracyavate kṣaran
GE07mbh_14_u:1143: 14,017.019c tādṛśīm eva labhate vedanāṃ mānavaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1144: 14,017.020a bhinnasaṃdhir atha kledam adbhiḥ sa labhate naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1147: 14,017.021a yaḥ sa pañcasu bhūteṣu prāṇāpāne vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1148: 14,017.021c sa gacchaty ūrdhvago vāyuḥ kṛcchrān muktvā śarīriṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:1149: 14,017.022a śarīraṃ ca jahāty eva nirucchvāsaś ca dṛśyate
GE07mbh_14_u:1151: 14,017.023a brahmaṇā saṃparityakto mṛta ity ucyate naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1153: 14,017.023e tair eva na vijānāti prāṇam āhārasaṃbhavam
GE07mbh_14_u:1154: 14,017.024a tatraiva kurute kāye yaḥ sa jīvaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1155: 14,017.024c teṣāṃ yad yad bhaved yuktaṃ saṃnipāte kva cit kva cit
GE07mbh_14_u:1156: 14,017.024e tat tan marma vijānīhi śāstradṛṣṭaṃ hi tat tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:1157: 14,017.025a teṣu marmasu bhinneṣu tataḥ sa samudīrayan
GE07mbh_14_u:1158: 14,017.025c āviśya hṛdayaṃ jantoḥ sattvaṃ cāśu ruṇaddhi vai
GE07mbh_14_u:1159: 14,017.025e tataḥ sa cetano jantur nābhijānāti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:1162: 14,017.027a tataḥ sa taṃ mahocchvāsaṃ bhṛśam ucchvasya dāruṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:1163: 14,017.027c niṣkrāman kampayaty āśu tac charīram acetanam
GE07mbh_14_u:1164: 14,017.028a sa jīvaḥ pracyutaḥ kāyāt karmabhiḥ svaiḥ samāvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1165: 14,017.028c aṅkitaḥ svaiḥ śubhaiḥ puṇyaiḥ pāpair vāpy upapadyate
GE07mbh_14_u:1167: 14,017.029c itaraṃ kṛtapuṇyaṃ vā taṃ vijānanti lakṣaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1170: 14,017.031a paśyanty evaṃvidhāḥ siddhā jīvaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_14_u:1173: 14,017.032c karmabhūmir iyaṃ bhūmir yatra tiṣṭhanti jantavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1177: 14,017.034c avāk sa niraye pāpo mānavaḥ pacyate bhṛśam
GE07mbh_14_u:1178: 14,017.034d*0039_01 arvāg gatir iyaṃ kaṣṭā yatra pacyanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1179: 14,017.034e tasmāt sudurlabho mokṣa ātmā rakṣyo bhṛśaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1180: 14,017.035a ūrdhvaṃ tu jantavo gatvā yeṣu sthāneṣv avasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1182: 14,017.035e tac chrutvā naiṣṭhikīṃ buddhiṃ budhyethāḥ karmaniścayāt
GE07mbh_14_u:1184: 14,017.036c yac ca vibhrājate loke svabhāsā sūryamaṇḍalam
GE07mbh_14_u:1186: 14,017.037a karmakṣayāc ca te sarve cyavante vai punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1188: 14,017.038a na tatrāpy asti saṃtoṣo dṛṣṭvā dīptatarāṃ śriyam
GE07mbh_14_u:1189: 14,017.038c ity etā gatayaḥ sarvāḥ pṛthaktve samudīritāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1190: 14,017.039a upapattiṃ tu garbhasya vakṣyāmy aham ataḥ param
GE07mbh_14_u:1193: 14,018.001a śubhānām aśubhānāṃ ca neha nāśo 'sti karmaṇām
GE07mbh_14_u:1194: 14,018.001c prāpya prāpya tu pacyante kṣetraṃ kṣetraṃ tathā tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:1195: 14,018.002a yathā prasūyamānas tu phalī dadyāt phalaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_14_u:1196: 14,018.002c tathā syād vipulaṃ puṇyaṃ śuddhena manasā kṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:1197: 14,018.003a pāpaṃ cāpi tathaiva syāt pāpena manasā kṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:1198: 14,018.003c purodhāya mano hīha karmaṇy ātmā pravartate
GE07mbh_14_u:1200: 14,018.004c naro garbhaṃ praviśati tac cāpi śṛṇu cottaram
GE07mbh_14_u:1202: 14,018.005c kṣetraṃ karmajam āpnoti śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
GE07mbh_14_u:1203: 14,018.006a saukṣmyād avyaktabhāvāc ca na sa kva cana sajjate
GE07mbh_14_u:1204: 14,018.006c saṃprāpya brahmaṇaḥ kāyaṃ tasmāt tad brahma śāśvatam
GE07mbh_14_u:1205: 14,018.006e tad bījaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tena jīvanti jantavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1212: 14,018.009c tathā tvam api jānīhi garbhe jīvopapādanam
GE07mbh_14_u:1213: 14,018.010a yathā ca dīpaḥ śaraṇaṃ dīpyamānaḥ prakāśayet
GE07mbh_14_u:1215: 14,018.011a yad yac ca kurute karma śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
GE07mbh_14_u:1217: 14,018.012a tatas tat kṣīyate caiva punaś cānyat pracīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:1219: 14,018.013a tatra dharmaṃ pravakṣyāmi sukhī bhavati yena vai
GE07mbh_14_u:1221: 14,018.013d*0040_01 śubhapradāni yāny āhus tāni kuryāc ca buddhimān
GE07mbh_14_u:1225: 14,018.015c vyalīkānām akaraṇaṃ bhūtānāṃ yatra sā bhuvi
GE07mbh_14_u:1228: 14,018.017a pravartanaṃ śubhānāṃ ca tat satāṃ vṛttam ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:1230: 14,018.017b*0041_02 ubhayārtho bhavaty eva svargārtho mokṣadas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:1231: 14,018.017c tato dharmaḥ prabhavati yaḥ prajāḥ pāti śāśvatīḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1232: 14,018.018a evaṃ satsu sadā paśyet tatra hy eṣā dhruvā sthitiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1233: 14,018.018c ācāro dharmam ācaṣṭe yasmin santo vyavasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1234: 14,018.019a teṣu tad dharmanikṣiptaṃ yaḥ sa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1235: 14,018.019c yas taṃ samabhipadyeta na sa durgatim āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_14_u:1237: 14,018.020c yas tu yogī ca muktaś ca sa etebhyo viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:1239: 14,018.021c saṃsāratāraṇaṃ hy asya kālena mahatā bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:1240: 14,018.022a evaṃ pūrvakṛtaṃ karma sarvo jantur niṣevate
GE07mbh_14_u:1241: 14,018.022c sarvaṃ tat kāraṇaṃ yena nikṛto 'yam ihāgataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1243: 14,018.023c ity evaṃ saṃśayo loke tac ca vakṣyāmy ataḥ param
GE07mbh_14_u:1246: 14,018.025a tataḥ pradhānam asṛjac cetanā sā śarīriṇām
GE07mbh_14_u:1247: 14,018.025c yayā sarvam idaṃ vyāptaṃ yāṃ loke paramāṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1248: 14,018.026a iha tat kṣaram ity uktaṃ paraṃ tv amṛtam akṣaram
GE07mbh_14_u:1249: 14,018.026c trayāṇāṃ mithunaṃ sarvam ekaikasya pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_14_u:1251: 14,018.027c sthāvarāṇi ca bhūtāni ity eṣā paurvikī śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1253: 14,018.028c bhūteṣu parivṛttiṃ ca punarāvṛttim eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:1254: 14,018.029a yathātra kaś cin medhāvī dṛṣṭātmā pūrvajanmani
GE07mbh_14_u:1255: 14,018.029c yat pravakṣyāmi tat sarvaṃ yathāvad upapadyate
GE07mbh_14_u:1256: 14,018.030a sukhaduḥkhe sadā samyag anitye yaḥ prapaśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:1258: 14,018.031a yac ca kiṃ cit sukhaṃ tac ca sarvaṃ duḥkham iti smaran
GE07mbh_14_u:1262: 14,018.033a nirvidyate tataḥ kṛtsnaṃ mārgamāṇaḥ paraṃ padam
GE07mbh_14_u:1267: 14,019.001a yaḥ syād ekāyane līnas tūṣṇīṃ kiṃ cid acintayan
GE07mbh_14_u:1268: 14,019.001c pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ parityajya sa nirārambhako bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:1271: 14,019.003a ātmavat sarvabhūteṣu yaś caren niyataḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1272: 14,019.003b*0042_01 nityam eva yathānyāyaṃ yaś caren niyatendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1273: 14,019.003c amānī nirabhīmānaḥ sarvato mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1274: 14,019.004a jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ cobhe sukhaduḥkhe tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:1275: 14,019.004c lābhālābhe priyadveṣye yaḥ samaḥ sa ca mucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:1276: 14,019.005a na kasya cit spṛhayate nāvajānāti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:1277: 14,019.005c nirdvaṃdvo vītarāgātmā sarvato mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1278: 14,019.006a anamitro 'tha nirbandhur anapatyaś ca yaḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_14_u:1280: 14,019.007a naiva dharmī na cādharmī pūrvopacitahā ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1282: 14,019.008a akarmā cāvikāṅkṣaś ca paśyañ jagad aśāśvatam
GE07mbh_14_u:1289: 14,019.011c aguṇaṃ guṇabhoktāraṃ yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:1293: 14,019.012d*0043_02 upaśāmyendriyagrāmaṃ yaś caren mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1295: 14,019.013c param āpnoti saṃśāntam acalaṃ divyam akṣaram
GE07mbh_14_u:1297: 14,019.014c yaj jñātvā siddham ātmānaṃ loke paśyanti yoginaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1298: 14,019.015a tasyopadeśaṃ paśyāmi yathāvat tan nibodha me
GE07mbh_14_u:1299: 14,019.015c yair dvāraiś cārayan nityaṃ paśyaty ātmānam ātmani
GE07mbh_14_u:1300: 14,019.016a indriyāṇi tu saṃhṛtya mana ātmani dhārayet
GE07mbh_14_u:1301: 14,019.016c tīvraṃ taptvā tapaḥ pūrvaṃ tato yoktum upakramet
GE07mbh_14_u:1303: 14,019.017c manīṣī manasā vipraḥ paśyaty ātmānam ātmani
GE07mbh_14_u:1304: 14,019.018a sa cec chaknoty ayaṃ sādhur yoktum ātmānam ātmani
GE07mbh_14_u:1305: 14,019.018c tata ekāntaśīlaḥ sa paśyaty ātmānam ātmani
GE07mbh_14_u:1308: 14,019.020a yathā hi puruṣaḥ svapne dṛṣṭvā paśyaty asāv iti
GE07mbh_14_u:1310: 14,019.021a iṣīkāṃ vā yathā muñjāt kaś cin nirhṛtya darśayet
GE07mbh_14_u:1311: 14,019.021c yogī niṣkṛṣṭam ātmānaṃ tathā saṃpaśyate tanau
GE07mbh_14_u:1312: 14,019.022a muñjaṃ śarīraṃ tasyāhur iṣīkām ātmani śritām
GE07mbh_14_u:1314: 14,019.023a yadā hi yuktam ātmānaṃ samyak paśyati dehabhṛt
GE07mbh_14_u:1315: 14,019.023c tadāsya neśate kaś cit trailokyasyāpi yaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1317: 14,019.024b*0044_01 samyag yuktvā sa ātmānam ātmany evāvatiṣṭhate
GE07mbh_14_u:1318: 14,019.024c vinivṛtya jarāmṛtyū na hṛṣyati na śocati
GE07mbh_14_u:1319: 14,019.025a devānām api devatvaṃ yuktaḥ kārayate vaśī
GE07mbh_14_u:1320: 14,019.025c brahma cāvyayam āpnoti hitvā deham aśāśvatam
GE07mbh_14_u:1321: 14,019.026a vinaśyatsv api lokeṣu na bhayaṃ tasya jāyate
GE07mbh_14_u:1322: 14,019.026c kliśyamāneṣu bhūteṣu na sa kliśyati kena cit
GE07mbh_14_u:1325: 14,019.028a nainaṃ śastrāṇi vidhyante na mṛtyuś cāsya vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:1326: 14,019.028c nātaḥ sukhataraṃ kiṃ cil loke kva cana vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:1328: 14,019.029a samyag yuktvā yadātmānam ātmany eva prapaśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:1330: 14,019.029b*0047_01 dehān yatheṣṭam abhyeti hitvemāṃ mānuṣīṃ tanum
GE07mbh_14_u:1331: 14,019.029c tadaiva na spṛhayate sākṣād api śatakratoḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1332: 14,019.030a nirvedas tu na gantavyo yuñjānena kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:1333: 14,019.030c yogam ekāntaśīlas tu yathā yuñjīta tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:1334: 14,019.031a dṛṣṭapūrvāṃ diśaṃ cintya yasmin saṃnivaset pure
GE07mbh_14_u:1335: 14,019.031c purasyābhyantare tasya manaś cāryaṃ na bāhyataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1339: 14,019.033c tasmin kāye manaś cāryaṃ na kathaṃ cana bāhyataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1342: 14,019.035a dantāṃs tālu ca jihvāṃ ca galaṃ grīvāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:1344: 14,019.036a ity uktaḥ sa mayā śiṣyo medhāvī madhusūdana
GE07mbh_14_u:1346: 14,019.037a bhuktaṃ bhuktaṃ katham idam annaṃ koṣṭhe vipacyate
GE07mbh_14_u:1347: 14,019.037c kathaṃ rasatvaṃ vrajati śoṇitaṃ jāyate katham
GE07mbh_14_u:1348: 14,019.037e tathā māṃsaṃ ca medaś ca snāyvasthīni ca poṣati
GE07mbh_14_u:1350: 14,019.038c vardhante vardhamānasya vardhate ca kathaṃ balam
GE07mbh_14_u:1351: 14,019.038e nirojasāṃ niṣkramaṇaṃ malānāṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_14_u:1352: 14,019.039a kuto vāyaṃ praśvasiti ucchvasity api vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1353: 14,019.039c kaṃ ca deśam adhiṣṭhāya tiṣṭhaty ātmāyam ātmani
GE07mbh_14_u:1354: 14,019.040a jīvaḥ kāyaṃ vahati cec ceṣṭayānaḥ kalevaram
GE07mbh_14_u:1355: 14,019.040c kiṃvarṇaṃ kīdṛśaṃ caiva niveśayati vai manaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1359: 14,019.042a yathā svakoṣṭhe prakṣipya koṣṭhaṃ bhāṇḍamanā bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:1360: 14,019.042c tathā svakāye prakṣipya mano dvārair aniścalaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1362: 14,019.043a evaṃ satatam udyuktaḥ prītātmā nacirād iva
GE07mbh_14_u:1363: 14,019.043c āsādayati tad brahma yad dṛṣṭvā syāt pradhānavit
GE07mbh_14_u:1364: 14,019.044a na tv asau cakṣuṣā grāhyo na ca sarvair apīndriyaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1369: 14,019.046a sa tad utsṛjya dehaṃ svaṃ dhārayan brahma kevalam
GE07mbh_14_u:1371: 14,019.046d*0049_01 tad evam āśrayaṃ kṛtvā mokṣaṃ yāti tato mayi
GE07mbh_14_u:1374: 14,019.048a ity uktaḥ sa tadā kṛṣṇa mayā śiṣyo mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1377: 14,019.049a ity uktvā sa tadā vākyaṃ māṃ pārtha dvijapuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1379: 14,019.050a kaccid etat tvayā pārtha śrutam ekāgracetasā
GE07mbh_14_u:1380: 14,019.050c tadāpi hi rathasthas tvaṃ śrutavān etad eva hi
GE07mbh_14_u:1381: 14,019.051a naitat pārtha suvijñeyaṃ vyāmiśreṇeti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1384: 14,019.052c kaccin nedaṃ śrutaṃ pārtha martyenānyena kena cit
GE07mbh_14_u:1385: 14,019.053a na hy etac chrotum arho 'nyo manuṣyas tvām ṛte 'nagha
GE07mbh_14_u:1388: 14,019.054c na caitad iṣṭaṃ devānāṃ martyai rūpanivartanam
GE07mbh_14_u:1389: 14,019.055a parā hi sā gatiḥ pārtha yat tad brahma sanātanam
GE07mbh_14_u:1390: 14,019.055c yatrāmṛtatvaṃ prāpnoti tyaktvā duḥkhaṃ sadā sukhī
GE07mbh_14_u:1391: 14,019.056a evaṃ hi dharmam āsthāya ye 'pi syuḥ pāpayonayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1392: 14,019.056c striyo vaiśyās tathā śūdrās te 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_14_u:1393: 14,019.057a kiṃ punar brāhmaṇāḥ pārtha kṣatriyā vā bahuśrutāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1395: 14,019.058a hetumac caitad uddiṣṭam upāyāś cāsya sādhane
GE07mbh_14_u:1396: 14,019.058c siddheḥ phalaṃ ca mokṣaś ca duḥkhasya ca vinirṇayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1397: 14,019.058e ataḥ paraṃ sukhaṃ tv anyat kiṃ nu syād bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_14_u:1398: 14,019.059a śrutavāñ śraddadhānaś ca parākrāntaś ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:1400: 14,019.059e etair upāyaiḥ sa kṣipraṃ parāṃ gatim avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_14_u:1401: 14,019.060a etāvad eva vaktavyaṃ nāto bhūyo 'sti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:1405: 14,020.001c daṃpatyoḥ pārtha saṃvādam abhayaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1407: 14,020.002c dṛṣṭvā vivikta āsīnaṃ bhāryā bhartāram abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:1408: 14,020.003a kaṃ nu lokaṃ gamiṣyāmi tvām ahaṃ patim āśritā
GE07mbh_14_u:1410: 14,020.004a bhāryāḥ patikṛtāṃl lokān āpnuvantīti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_14_u:1411: 14,020.004c tvām ahaṃ patim āsādya kāṃ gamiṣyāmi vai gatim
GE07mbh_14_u:1412: 14,020.005a evam uktaḥ sa śāntātmā tām uvāca hasann iva
GE07mbh_14_u:1414: 14,020.006a grāhyaṃ dṛśyaṃ ca śrāvyaṃ ca yad idaṃ karma vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:1415: 14,020.006c etad eva vyavasyanti karma karmeti karmiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1417: 14,020.007c naiṣkarmyaṃ na ca loke 'smin maurtam ity upalabhyate
GE07mbh_14_u:1418: 14,020.008a karmaṇā manasā vācā śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
GE07mbh_14_u:1421: 14,020.009c ātmastham ātmanā tena dṛṣṭam āyatanaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:1422: 14,020.010a yatra tad brahma nirdvaṃdvaṃ yatra somaḥ sahāgninā
GE07mbh_14_u:1423: 14,020.010c vyavāyaṃ kurute nityaṃ dhīro bhūtāni dhārayan
GE07mbh_14_u:1424: 14,020.011a yatra brahmādayo yuktās tad akṣaram upāsate
GE07mbh_14_u:1426: 14,020.012a ghrāṇena na tad āghreyaṃ na tad ādyaṃ ca jihvayā
GE07mbh_14_u:1427: 14,020.012c sparśena ca na tat spṛśyaṃ manasā tv eva gamyate
GE07mbh_14_u:1428: 14,020.013a cakṣuṣā na viṣahyaṃ ca yat kiṃ cic chravaṇāt param
GE07mbh_14_u:1430: 14,020.014a yataḥ pravartate tantraṃ yatra ca pratitiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_14_u:1431: 14,020.014c prāṇo 'pānaḥ samānaś ca vyānaś codāna eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:1432: 14,020.015a tata eva pravartante tam eva praviśanti ca
GE07mbh_14_u:1434: 14,020.016a tasmin supte pralīyete samāno vyāna eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:1436: 14,020.016e tasmāc chayānaṃ puruṣaṃ prāṇāpānau na muñcataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1437: 14,020.017a prāṇān āyamyate yena tam udānaṃ pracakṣate
GE07mbh_14_u:1441: 14,020.019a ghrāṇaṃ jihvā ca cakṣuś ca tvak ca śrotraṃ ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_14_u:1442: 14,020.019c mano buddhiś ca saptaitā jihvā vaiśvānarārciṣaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1443: 14,020.020a ghreyaṃ peyaṃ ca dṛśyaṃ ca spṛśyaṃ śravyaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:1444: 14,020.020c mantavyam atha boddhavyaṃ tāḥ sapta samidho mama
GE07mbh_14_u:1445: 14,020.021a ghrātā bhakṣayitā draṣṭā spraṣṭā śrotā ca pañcamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1446: 14,020.021c mantā boddhā ca saptaite bhavanti paramartvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1447: 14,020.022a ghreye peye ca dṛśye ca spṛśye śravye tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:1448: 14,020.022b*0050_01 mantavye 'py atha boddhavye subhage paśya sarvadā
GE07mbh_14_u:1449: 14,020.022c havīṃṣy agniṣu hotāraḥ saptadhā sapta saptasu
GE07mbh_14_u:1451: 14,020.022f*0051_01 karaṇaṃ karma kartā ca mokṣam ity eva vādinaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:1452: 14,020.023a pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_14_u:1453: 14,020.023c mano buddhiś ca saptaite yonir ity eva śabditāḥ

GE07mbh_14_u:2216: 14,035.006c prāñjaliḥ paripapraccha yat tac chṛṇu mahāmate
GE07mbh_14_u:2218: 14,035.007a kutaś cāhaṃ kutaś ca tvaṃ tat satyaṃ brūhi yat param

GE07mbh_14_u:2223: 14,035.009a etān me bhagavan praśnān yāthātathyena sattama
GE07mbh_14_u:2224: 14,035.009c vaktum arhasi viprarṣe yathāvad iha tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2225: 14,035.009d*0071_01 tvad anyaḥ kaś ca na praśnān etān vaktum ihārhati
GE07mbh_14_u:2226: 14,035.009d*0071_02 brūhi dharmavidāṃ śreṣṭha paraṃ kautūhalaṃ mama
GE07mbh_14_u:2228: 14,035.009d*0071_04 sarvasaṃśayasaṃchettā tvad anyo na ca vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:2235: 14,035.011a tān praśnān abravīt pārtha medhāvī sa dhṛtavrataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2239: 14,035.012d@003_0001 jñānaṃ tv eva paraṃ vidmaḥ saṃnyāsaṃ tapa uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:2240: 14,035.012d@003_0002 yas tu veda nirābādhaṃ jñānatattvaṃ viniścayāt
GE07mbh_14_u:2242: 14,035.012d@003_0004 yo vidvān sahavāsaṃ ca vivāsaṃ caiva paśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:2244: 14,035.012d@003_0006 yo na kāmayate kiṃ cin na kiṃ cid abhimanyate
GE07mbh_14_u:2253: 14,035.012d@003_0015 etaj jñātvā ca tattvena jñānena parāmāsinā
GE07mbh_14_u:2257: 14,035.014a pravakṣye 'haṃ mahāprājña padam uttamam adya te
GE07mbh_14_u:2258: 14,035.014c buddhvā yad iha saṃsiddhā bhavantīha manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2261: 14,035.016a vasiṣṭhaḥ kāśyapaś caiva viśvāmitro 'trir eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:2263: 14,035.017a ṛṣim āṅgirasaṃ vṛddhaṃ puraskṛtya tu te dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2267: 14,035.019a kathaṃ karma kriyāt sādhu kathaṃ mucyeta kilbiṣāt
GE07mbh_14_u:2268: 14,035.019c ke no mārgāḥ śivāś ca syuḥ kiṃ satyaṃ kiṃ ca duṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:2271: 14,035.021a ity uktaḥ sa muniśreṣṭhair yad āha prapitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2272: 14,035.021c tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇu śiṣya yathāgamam
GE07mbh_14_u:2274: 14,035.022a satyād bhūtāni jātāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:2275: 14,035.022c tapasā tāni jīvanti iti tad vitta suvratāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2276: 14,035.023a svāṃ yoniṃ punar āgamya vartante svena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:2278: 14,035.024a brahma satyaṃ tapaḥ satyaṃ satyaṃ caiva prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2279: 14,035.024c satyād bhūtāni jātāni bhūtaṃ satyamayaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_14_u:2284: 14,035.027a cāturvidyaṃ tathā varṇāṃś caturaś cāśramān pṛthak
GE07mbh_14_u:2285: 14,035.027c dharmam ekaṃ catuṣpādaṃ nityam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2286: 14,035.028a panthānaṃ vaḥ pravakṣyāmi śivaṃ kṣemakaraṃ dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2288: 14,035.029a gadatas taṃ mamādyeha panthānaṃ durvidaṃ param
GE07mbh_14_u:2291: 14,035.030c gārhasthyaṃ tu dvitīyaṃ syād vānaprastham ataḥ param
GE07mbh_14_u:2292: 14,035.030e tataḥ paraṃ tu vijñeyam adhyātmaṃ paramaṃ padam
GE07mbh_14_u:2293: 14,035.031a jyotir ākāśam ādityo vāyur indraḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2294: 14,035.031c nopaiti yāvad adhyātmaṃ tāvad etān na paśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:2298: 14,035.033a sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ gārhasthyaṃ tad vidhīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:2299: 14,035.033c śraddhālakṣaṇam ity evaṃ dharmaṃ dhīrāḥ pracakṣate
GE07mbh_14_u:2301: 14,035.034a ity ete devayānā vaḥ panthānaḥ parikīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2303: 14,035.035a eteṣāṃ pṛthag adhyāste yo dharmaṃ saṃśitavrataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2307: 14,035.037a mahān ātmā tathāvyaktam ahaṃkāras tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:2308: 14,035.037c indriyāṇi daśaikaṃ ca mahābhūtāni pañca ca
GE07mbh_14_u:2309: 14,035.038a viśeṣāḥ pañcabhūtānām ity eṣā vaidikī śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2311: 14,035.039a tattvānām atha yo veda sarveṣāṃ prabhavāpyayau
GE07mbh_14_u:2312: 14,035.039c sa dhīraḥ sarvabhūteṣu na moham adhigacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:2313: 14,035.040a tattvāni yo vedayate yathātathaṃ; guṇāṃś ca sarvān akhilāś ca devatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2314: 14,035.040c vidhūtapāpmā pravimucya bandhanaṃ; sa sarvalokān amalān samaśnute
GE07mbh_14_u:2316: 14,036.001a tad avyaktam anudriktaṃ sarvavyāpi dhruvaṃ sthiram
GE07mbh_14_u:2319: 14,036.002c buddhisvāmikam ity etat param ekādaśaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:2320: 14,036.003a trīṇi srotāṃsi yāny asminn āpyāyante punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2322: 14,036.004a tamo rajas tathā sattvaṃ guṇān etān pracakṣate
GE07mbh_14_u:2326: 14,036.006a tamaso mithunaṃ sattvaṃ sattvasya mithunaṃ rajaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2327: 14,036.006c rajasaś cāpi sattvaṃ syāt sattvasya mithunaṃ tamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2328: 14,036.007a niyamyate tamo yatra rajas tatra pravartate
GE07mbh_14_u:2329: 14,036.007c niyamyate rajo yatra sattvaṃ tatra pravartate
GE07mbh_14_u:2332: 14,036.008d*0074_01 tāmasaṃ rūpam etat tu dṛśyate cāpi saṃgatam
GE07mbh_14_u:2336: 14,036.010c sāttvikaṃ rūpam evaṃ tu lāghavaṃ sādhusaṃmitam
GE07mbh_14_u:2340: 14,036.012c svapnaḥ stambho bhayaṃ lobhaḥ śokaḥ sukṛtadūṣaṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:2347: 14,036.016a sarva ete guṇā viprās tāmasāḥ saṃprakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2348: 14,036.016c ye cānye niyatā bhāvā loke 'smin mohasaṃjñitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2349: 14,036.017a tatra tatra niyamyante sarve te tāmasā guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2351: 14,036.018a atyāgaś cābhimānaś ca moho manyus tathākṣamā
GE07mbh_14_u:2352: 14,036.018c matsaraś caiva bhūteṣu tāmasaṃ vṛttam iṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:2353: 14,036.019a vṛthārambhāś ca ye ke cid vṛthādānāni yāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:2354: 14,036.019c vṛthābhakṣaṇam ity etat tāmasaṃ vṛttam iṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:2357: 14,036.021a evaṃvidhās tu ye ke cil loke 'smin pāpakarmiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2358: 14,036.021c manuṣyā bhinnamaryādāḥ sarve te tāmasā janāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2361: 14,036.023a sthāvarāṇi ca bhūtāni paśavo vāhanāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:2363: 14,036.024a aṇḍajā jantavo ye ca sarve cāpi catuṣpadāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2364: 14,036.024c unmattā badhirā mūkā ye cānye pāparogiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2366: 14,036.025c avāksrotasa ity ete magnās tamasi tāmasāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2367: 14,036.026a teṣām utkarṣam udrekaṃ vakṣyāmy aham ataḥ param
GE07mbh_14_u:2368: 14,036.026c yathā te sukṛtāṃl lokāṃl labhante puṇyakarmiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2369: 14,036.027a anyathā pratipannās tu vivṛddhā ye ca karmasu
GE07mbh_14_u:2372: 14,036.028c svargaṃ gacchanti devānām ity eṣā vaidikī śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2373: 14,036.029a anyathā pratipannās tu vivṛddhāḥ sveṣu karmasu
GE07mbh_14_u:2377: 14,036.031a śūdrayonim atikramya ye cānye tāmasā guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2379: 14,036.032a abhiṣaṅgas tu kāmeṣu mahāmoha iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2380: 14,036.032c ṛṣayo munayo devā muhyanty atra sukhepsavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2382: 14,036.033c maraṇaṃ tv andhatāmisraṃ tāmisraṃ krodha ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:2383: 14,036.034a bhāvato guṇataś caiva yonitaś caiva tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2384: 14,036.034c sarvam etat tamo viprāḥ kīrtitaṃ vo yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_14_u:2385: 14,036.035a ko nv etad budhyate sādhu ko nv etat sādhu paśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:2387: 14,036.036a tamoguṇā vo bahudhā prakīrtitā; yathāvad uktaṃ ca tamaḥ parāvaram
GE07mbh_14_u:2388: 14,036.036c naro hi yo veda guṇān imān sadā; sa tāmasaiḥ sarvaguṇaiḥ pramucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:2394: 14,037.003a balaṃ śauryaṃ mado roṣo vyāyāmakalahāv api
GE07mbh_14_u:2401: 14,037.006c nindā stutiḥ praśaṃsā ca pratāpaḥ paritarpaṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:2402: 14,037.007a paricaryā ca śuśrūṣā sevā tṛṣṇā vyapāśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2404: 14,037.008a saṃskārā ye ca loke 'smin pravartante pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_14_u:2405: 14,037.008c nṛṣu nārīṣu bhūteṣu dravyeṣu śaraṇeṣu ca
GE07mbh_14_u:2406: 14,037.009a saṃtāpo 'pratyayaś caiva vratāni niyamāś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:2407: 14,037.009c pradānam āśīryuktaṃ ca satataṃ me bhavatv iti
GE07mbh_14_u:2412: 14,037.011a idaṃ me syād idaṃ me syāt sneho guṇasamudbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2413: 14,037.011c abhidrohas tathā māyā nikṛtir māna eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:2415: 14,037.012c stambho dambho 'tha rāgaś ca bhaktiḥ prītiḥ pramodanam
GE07mbh_14_u:2416: 14,037.013a dyūtaṃ ca janavādaś ca saṃbandhāḥ strīkṛtāś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:2417: 14,037.013c nṛttavāditragītāni prasaṅgā ye ca ke cana
GE07mbh_14_u:2418: 14,037.013e sarva ete guṇā viprā rājasāḥ saṃprakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2420: 14,037.014c trivarganiratā nityaṃ dharmo 'rthaḥ kāma ity api
GE07mbh_14_u:2423: 14,037.016a asmiṃl loke pramodante jāyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2424: 14,037.016c pretyabhāvikam īhanta iha laukikam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:2426: 14,037.016e dadati pratigṛhṇanti japanty atha ca juhvati
GE07mbh_14_u:2427: 14,037.017a rajoguṇā vo bahudhānukīrtitā; yathāvad uktaṃ guṇavṛttam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:2428: 14,037.017c naro hi yo veda guṇān imān sadā; sa rājasaiḥ sarvaguṇair vimucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:2430: 14,038.001a ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi tṛtīyaṃ guṇam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:2432: 14,038.002a ānandaḥ prītir udrekaḥ prākāśyaṃ sukham eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:2434: 14,038.003a kṣamā dhṛtir ahiṃsā ca samatā satyam ārjavam
GE07mbh_14_u:2435: 14,038.003c akrodhaś cānasūyā ca śaucaṃ dākṣyaṃ parākramaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2436: 14,038.004a mudhā jñānaṃ mudhā vṛttaṃ mudhā sevā mudhā śramaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2437: 14,038.004c evaṃ yo yuktadharmaḥ syāt so 'mutrānantyam aśnute
GE07mbh_14_u:2439: 14,038.005c akāmahata ity eṣa satāṃ dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2440: 14,038.006a viśrambho hrīs titikṣā ca tyāgaḥ śaucam atandritā
GE07mbh_14_u:2442: 14,038.007a harṣas tuṣṭir vismayaś ca vinayaḥ sādhuvṛttatā
GE07mbh_14_u:2443: 14,038.007c śāntikarma viśuddhiś ca śubhā buddhir vimocanam
GE07mbh_14_u:2444: 14,038.008a upekṣā brahmacaryaṃ ca parityāgaś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2446: 14,038.009a mudhā dānaṃ mudhā yajño mudhādhītaṃ mudhā vratam
GE07mbh_14_u:2447: 14,038.009c mudhā pratigrahaś caiva mudhā dharmo mudhā tapaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2448: 14,038.010a evaṃvṛttās tu ye ke cil loke 'smin sattvasaṃśrayāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2450: 14,038.011a hitvā sarvāṇi pāpāni niḥśokā hy ajarāmarāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2451: 14,038.011c divaṃ prāpya tu te dhīrāḥ kurvate vai tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2452: 14,038.012a īśitvaṃ ca vaśitvaṃ ca laghutvaṃ manasaś ca te
GE07mbh_14_u:2454: 14,038.013a ūrdhvasrotasa ity ete devā vaikārikāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2455: 14,038.013c vikurvate prakṛtyā vai divaṃ prāptās tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2456: 14,038.013e yad yad icchanti tat sarvaṃ bhajante vibhajanti ca
GE07mbh_14_u:2457: 14,038.014a ity etat sāttvikaṃ vṛttaṃ kathitaṃ vo dvijarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2458: 14,038.014c etad vijñāya vidhival labhate yad yad icchati
GE07mbh_14_u:2459: 14,038.015a prakīrtitāḥ sattvaguṇā viśeṣato; yathāvad uktaṃ guṇavṛttam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:2460: 14,038.015c naras tu yo veda guṇān imān sadā; guṇān sa bhuṅkte na guṇaiḥ sa bhujyate
GE07mbh_14_u:2462: 14,039.001a naiva śakyā guṇā vaktuṃ pṛthaktveneha sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2463: 14,039.001c avicchinnāni dṛśyante rajaḥ sattvaṃ tamas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:2466: 14,039.003a yāvat sattvaṃ tamas tāvad vartate nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2467: 14,039.003c yāvat tamaś ca sattvaṃ ca rajas tāvad ihocyate
GE07mbh_14_u:2471: 14,039.005c vartate tad yathānyūnaṃ vyatiriktaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2473: 14,039.006c alpaṃ tatra rajo jñeyaṃ sattvaṃ cālpataraṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2474: 14,039.007a udriktaṃ ca rajo yatra madhyasrotogataṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:2475: 14,039.007c alpaṃ tatra tamo jñeyaṃ sattvaṃ cālpataraṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2476: 14,039.008a udriktaṃ ca yadā sattvam ūrdhvasrotogataṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:2477: 14,039.008c alpaṃ tatra rajo jñeyaṃ tamaś cālpataraṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2479: 14,039.009c na hi sattvāt paro bhāvaḥ kaś cid anyo vidhīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:2480: 14,039.010a ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti sattvasthā madhye tiṣṭhanti rājasāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2482: 14,039.011a tamaḥ śūdre rajaḥ kṣatre brāhmaṇe sattvam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:2483: 14,039.011c ity evaṃ triṣu varṇeṣu vivartante guṇās trayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2484: 14,039.012a dūrād api hi dṛśyante sahitāḥ saṃghacāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2485: 14,039.012c tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajaś caiva pṛthaktvaṃ nānuśuśruma
GE07mbh_14_u:2486: 14,039.013a dṛṣṭvā cādityam udyantaṃ kucorāṇāṃ bhayaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:2488: 14,039.014a ādityaḥ sattvam uddiṣṭaṃ kucorās tu yathā tamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2490: 14,039.015a prākāśyaṃ sattvam āditye saṃtāpo rājaso guṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2491: 14,039.015c upaplavas tu vijñeyas tāmasas tasya parvasu
GE07mbh_14_u:2492: 14,039.016a evaṃ jyotiḥṣu sarveṣu vivartante guṇās trayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2493: 14,039.016c paryāyeṇa ca vartante tatra tatra tathā tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:2495: 14,039.017c rājasās tu vivartante snehabhāvas tu sāttvikaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2496: 14,039.018a ahas tridhā tu vijñeyaṃ tridhā rātrir vidhīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:2498: 14,039.019a tridhā dānāni dīyante tridhā yajñaḥ pravartate
GE07mbh_14_u:2499: 14,039.019c tridhā lokās tridhā vedās tridhā vidyās tridhā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2500: 14,039.020a bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca dharmo 'rthaḥ kāma ity api
GE07mbh_14_u:2501: 14,039.020c prāṇāpānāv udānaś cāpy eta eva trayo guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2502: 14,039.021a yat kiṃ cid iha vai loke sarvam eṣv eva tat triṣu
GE07mbh_14_u:2503: 14,039.021c trayo guṇāḥ pravartante avyaktā nityam eva tu
GE07mbh_14_u:2504: 14,039.021e sattvaṃ rajas tamaś caiva guṇasargaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2505: 14,039.022a tamo 'vyaktaṃ śivaṃ nityam ajaṃ yoniḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2507: 14,039.023a anudriktam anūnaṃ ca hy akampam acalaṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_14_u:2508: 14,039.023c sad asac caiva tat sarvam avyaktaṃ triguṇaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:2510: 14,039.024a avyaktanāmāni guṇāṃś ca tattvato; yo veda sarvāṇi gatīś ca kevalāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2511: 14,039.024c vimuktadehaḥ pravibhāgatattvavit; sa mucyate sarvaguṇair nirāmayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2513: 14,040.001a avyaktāt pūrvam utpanno mahān ātmā mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2514: 14,040.001c ādir guṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ prathamaḥ sarga ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:2515: 14,040.002a mahān ātmā matir viṣṇur viśvaḥ śaṃbhuś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_14_u:2516: 14,040.002c buddhiḥ prajñopalabdhiś ca tathā khyātir dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2518: 14,040.003c taṃ jānan brāhmaṇo vidvān na pramohaṃ nigacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:2520: 14,040.004c sarvataḥśrutimāṃl loke sarvaṃ vyāpya sa tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_14_u:2522: 14,040.005c aṇimā laghimā prāptir īśāno jyotir avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2523: 14,040.006a tatra buddhimatāṃ lokāḥ saṃnyāsaniratāś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:2525: 14,040.007a jñānavantaś ca ye ke cid alubdhā jitamanyavaḥ
