GE07mbh_14_u:2876: 14,046.008c na saṃsarati jātīṣu paramaṃ sthānam āśritaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2878: 14,046.009c grāmān niṣkramya cāraṇyaṃ muniḥ pravrajito vaset
GE07mbh_14_u:2880: 14,046.010c araṇyagocaro nityaṃ na grāmaṃ praviśet punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2881: 14,046.011a arcayann atithīn kāle dadyāc cāpi pratiśrayam
GE07mbh_14_u:2883: 14,046.012a pravṛttam udakaṃ vāyuṃ sarvaṃ vāneyam ā tṛṇāt
GE07mbh_14_u:2886: 14,046.013c yadbhakṣaḥ syāt tato dadyād bhikṣāṃ nityam atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2889: 14,046.015a dānto maitraḥ kṣamāyuktaḥ keśaśmaśru ca dhārayan
GE07mbh_14_u:2892: 14,046.016c evaṃ yukto jayet svargaṃ vānaprastho jitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2893: 14,046.017a gṛhastho brahmacārī ca vānaprastho 'tha vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2894: 14,046.017c ya icchen mokṣam āsthātum uttamāṃ vṛttim āśrayet
GE07mbh_14_u:2898: 14,046.019c joṣayeta sadā bhojyaṃ grāsam āgatam aspṛhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2901: 14,046.021a grāsād ācchādanāc cānyan na gṛhṇīyāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:2903: 14,046.022a parebhyo na pratigrāhyaṃ na ca deyaṃ kadā cana
GE07mbh_14_u:2904: 14,046.022c dainyabhāvāc ca bhūtānāṃ saṃvibhajya sadā budhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2906: 14,046.023c na kiṃ cid viṣayaṃ bhuktvā spṛhayet tasya vai punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2909: 14,046.025a na śilpajīvikāṃ jīved dvirannaṃ nota kāmayet
GE07mbh_14_u:2910: 14,046.025c na dveṣṭā nopadeṣṭā ca bhaveta nirupaskṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2913: 14,046.026c kṛtvā vahniṃ cared bhaikṣyaṃ vidhūme bhuktavajjane
GE07mbh_14_u:2915: 14,046.027c lābhe na ca prahṛṣyeta nālābhe vimanā bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:2917: 14,046.028a mātrāśī kālam ākāṅkṣaṃś cared bhaikṣyaṃ samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2921: 14,046.029c nāsvādayīta bhuñjāno rasāṃś ca madhurāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:2924: 14,046.030c na cānyam anubhikṣeta bhikṣamāṇaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:2925: 14,046.031a na saṃnikāśayed dharmaṃ vivikte virajāś caret
GE07mbh_14_u:2926: 14,046.031c śūnyāgāram araṇyaṃ vā vṛkṣamūlaṃ nadīṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:2927: 14,046.031e pratiśrayārthaṃ seveta pārvatīṃ vā punar guhām
GE07mbh_14_u:2928: 14,046.032a grāmaikarātriko grīṣme varṣāsv ekatra vā vaset
GE07mbh_14_u:2929: 14,046.032c adhvā sūryeṇa nirdiṣṭaḥ kīṭavac ca caren mahīm
GE07mbh_14_u:2930: 14,046.033a dayārthaṃ caiva bhūtānāṃ samīkṣya pṛthivīṃ caret
GE07mbh_14_u:2931: 14,046.033c saṃcayāṃś ca na kurvīta snehavāsaṃ ca varjayet
GE07mbh_14_u:2932: 14,046.034a pūtena cāmbhasā nityaṃ kāryaṃ kurvīta mokṣavit
GE07mbh_14_u:2933: 14,046.034c upaspṛśed uddhṛtābhir adbhiś ca puruṣaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:2934: 14,046.035a ahiṃsā brahmacaryaṃ ca satyam ārjavam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:2935: 14,046.035c akrodhaś cānasūyā ca damo nityam apaiśunam
GE07mbh_14_u:2936: 14,046.036a aṣṭāsv eteṣu yuktaḥ syād vrateṣu niyatendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2937: 14,046.036c apāpam aśaṭhaṃ vṛttam ajihmaṃ nityam ācaret
GE07mbh_14_u:2939: 14,046.037c lokasaṃgrahadharmaṃ ca naiva kuryān na kārayet
GE07mbh_14_u:2941: 14,046.038c samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu sthāvareṣu careṣu ca
GE07mbh_14_u:2942: 14,046.039a paraṃ nodvejayet kaṃ cin na ca kasya cid udvijet
GE07mbh_14_u:2944: 14,046.040a anāgataṃ ca na dhyāyen nātītam anucintayet
GE07mbh_14_u:2946: 14,046.041a na cakṣuṣā na manasā na vācā dūṣayet kva cit
GE07mbh_14_u:2947: 14,046.041c na pratyakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ vā kiṃ cid duṣṭaṃ samācaret
GE07mbh_14_u:2953: 14,046.044c sarvajñaḥ sarvato mukto mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2957: 14,046.046c atvagasthy atha vāmajjam amāṃsam api caiva ha
GE07mbh_14_u:2958: 14,046.047a niścintam avyayaṃ nityaṃ hṛdistham api nityadā
GE07mbh_14_u:2959: 14,046.047c sarvabhūtastham ātmānaṃ ye paśyanti na te mṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2960: 14,046.048a na tatra kramate buddhir nendriyāṇi na devatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2961: 14,046.048c vedā yajñāś ca lokāś ca na tapo na parākramaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2966: 14,046.050c yathainam avamanyeran pare satatam eva hi
GE07mbh_14_u:2968: 14,046.051c yo hy evaṃ vṛttasaṃpannaḥ sa muniḥ śreṣṭha ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:2971: 14,046.053a sarvam etat prasaṃkhyāya samyak saṃtyajya nirmalaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2978: 14,047.001a saṃnyāsaṃ tapa ity āhur vṛddhā niścitadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2979: 14,047.001c brāhmaṇā brahmayonisthā jñānaṃ brahma paraṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2981: 14,047.002c nirdvaṃdvaṃ nirguṇaṃ nityam acintyaṃ guhyam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:2982: 14,047.003a jñānena tapasā caiva dhīrāḥ paśyanti tat padam
GE07mbh_14_u:2986: 14,047.005a tapaḥ pradīpa ity āhur ācāro dharmasādhakaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:2987: 14,047.005c jñānaṃ tv eva paraṃ vidma saṃnyāsas tapa uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:2988: 14,047.006a yas tu veda nirābādhaṃ jñānaṃ tattvaviniścayāt
GE07mbh_14_u:2990: 14,047.007a yo vidvān sahavāsaṃ ca vivāsaṃ caiva paśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:2992: 14,047.008a yo na kāmayate kiṃ cin na kiṃ cid avamanyate
GE07mbh_14_u:2998: 14,047.011a hitvā guṇamayaṃ sarvaṃ karma jantuḥ śubhāśubham
GE07mbh_14_u:2999: 14,047.011c ubhe satyānṛte hitvā mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3005: 14,047.014a etac chittvā ca bhittvā ca jñānena paramāsinā
GE07mbh_14_u:3006: 14,047.014c hitvā cāmaratāṃ prāpya jahyād vai mṛtyujanmanī
GE07mbh_14_u:3010: 14,047.015a dvāv etau pakṣiṇau nityau sakhāyau cāpy acetanau
GE07mbh_14_u:3011: 14,047.015c etābhyāṃ tu paro yasya cetanāvān iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3013: 14,047.016c sa kṣetrajñaḥ sattvasaṃghātabuddhir; guṇātigo mucyate mṛtyupāśāt
GE07mbh_14_u:3015: 14,048.001a ke cid brahmamayaṃ vṛkṣaṃ ke cid brahmamayaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_14_u:3016: 14,048.001c ke cit puruṣam avyaktaṃ ke cit param anāmayam
GE07mbh_14_u:3018: 14,048.002a ucchvāsamātram api ced yo 'ntakāle samo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:3022: 14,048.004a prāṇāyāmair atha prāṇān saṃyamya sa punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3024: 14,048.005a evaṃ pūrvaṃ prasannātmā labhate yad yad icchati
GE07mbh_14_u:3028: 14,048.006e na śakyam anyathā gantuṃ puruṣaṃ tam atho dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3029: 14,048.007a kṣamā dhṛtir ahiṃsā ca samatā satyam ārjavam
GE07mbh_14_u:3030: 14,048.007c jñānaṃ tyāgo 'tha saṃnyāsaḥ sāttvikaṃ vṛttam iṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:3032: 14,048.008c sattvaṃ ca puruṣaś caikas tatra nāsti vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:3033: 14,048.009a āhur eke ca vidvāṃso ye jñāne supratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3035: 14,048.010a pṛthagbhūtas tato nityam ity etad avicāritam
GE07mbh_14_u:3036: 14,048.010c pṛthagbhāvaś ca vijñeyaḥ sahajaś cāpi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3038: 14,048.011c maśakodumbare tv aikyaṃ pṛthaktvam api dṛśyate
GE07mbh_14_u:3039: 14,048.012a matsyo yathānyaḥ syād apsu saṃprayogas tathānayoḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3042: 14,048.013a ity uktavantaṃ te viprās tadā lokapitāmaham
GE07mbh_14_u:3045: 14,048.014a kiṃ svid eveha dharmāṇām anuṣṭheyatamaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:3046: 14,048.014c vyāhatām iva paśyāmo dharmasya vividhāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_14_u:3047: 14,048.015a ūrdhvaṃ dehād vadanty eke naitad astīti cāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:3048: 14,048.015c ke cit saṃśayitaṃ sarvaṃ niḥsaṃśayam athāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:3049: 14,048.016a anityaṃ nityam ity eke nāsty astīty api cāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:3050: 14,048.016c ekarūpaṃ dvidhety eke vyāmiśram iti cāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:3051: 14,048.016e ekam eke pṛthak cānye bahutvam iti cāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:3053: 14,048.017c jaṭājinadharāś cānye muṇḍāḥ ke cid asaṃvṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3054: 14,048.018a asnānaṃ ke cid icchanti snānam ity api cāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:3055: 14,048.018c āhāraṃ ke cid icchanti ke cic cānaśane ratāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3056: 14,048.019a karma ke cit praśaṃsanti praśāntim api cāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:3057: 14,048.019c deśakālāv ubhau ke cin naitad astīti cāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:3058: 14,048.019e ke cin mokṣaṃ praśaṃsanti ke cid bhogān pṛthagvidhān
GE07mbh_14_u:3059: 14,048.020a dhanāni ke cid icchanti nirdhanatvaṃ tathāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:3060: 14,048.020c upāsyasādhanaṃ tv eke naitad astīti cāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:3062: 14,048.021c puṇyena yaśasety eke naitad astīti cāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:3063: 14,048.022a sadbhāvaniratāś cānye ke cit saṃśayite sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3064: 14,048.022c duḥkhād anye sukhād anye dhyānam ity apare sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3065: 14,048.023a yajñam ity apare dhīrāḥ pradānam iti cāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:3066: 14,048.023c sarvam eke praśaṃsanti na sarvam iti cāpare
GE07mbh_14_u:3067: 14,048.024a tapas tv anye praśaṃsanti svādhyāyam apare janāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3068: 14,048.024c jñānaṃ saṃnyāsam ity eke svabhāvaṃ bhūtacintakāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3071: 14,048.026a idaṃ śreya idaṃ śreya ity evaṃ prasthito janaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3072: 14,048.026c yo hi yasmin rato dharme sa taṃ pūjayate sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:3073: 14,048.027a tatra no vihatā prajñā manaś ca bahulīkṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:3074: 14,048.027c etad ākhyātum icchāmaḥ śreyaḥ kim iti sattama
GE07mbh_14_u:3075: 14,048.028a ataḥ paraṃ ca yad guhyaṃ tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_14_u:3077: 14,048.029a evam uktaḥ sa tair viprair bhagavāṃl lokabhāvanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3080: 14,049.001a hanta vaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi yan māṃ pṛcchatha sattamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3081: 14,049.001b*0087_01 guruṇā śiṣyam āsādya yad uktaṃ tan nibodhata
GE07mbh_14_u:3082: 14,049.001c samastam iha tac chrutvā samyag evāvadhāryatām
GE07mbh_14_u:3085: 14,049.003a jñānaṃ niḥśreya ity āhur vṛddhā niścayadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3087: 14,049.004a hiṃsāparāś ca ye loke ye ca nāstikavṛttayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3089: 14,049.005a āśīryuktāni karmāṇi kurvate ye tv atandritāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3090: 14,049.005c te 'smiṃl loke pramodante jāyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3091: 14,049.006a kurvate ye tu karmāṇi śraddadhānā vipaścitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3094: 14,049.007c saṃyogo viprayogaś ca tan nibodhata sattamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3096: 14,049.008c viṣayī puruṣo nityaṃ sattvaṃ ca viṣayaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3098: 14,049.009c bhujyamānaṃ na jānīte nityaṃ sattvam acetanam
GE07mbh_14_u:3099: 14,049.009e yas tv eva tu vijānīte yo bhuṅkte yaś ca bhujyate
GE07mbh_14_u:3102: 14,049.011a samaḥ saṃjñāgatas tv evaṃ yadā sarvatra dṛśyate
GE07mbh_14_u:3104: 14,049.012a sarvair api guṇair vidvān vyatiṣakto na lipyate
GE07mbh_14_u:3106: 14,049.012e evam evāpy asaṃsaktaḥ puruṣaḥ syān na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3108: 14,049.013c yathā dravyaṃ ca kartā ca saṃyogo 'py anayos tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:3109: 14,049.014a yathā pradīpam ādāya kaś cit tamasi gacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:3113: 14,049.016a vyaktaḥ sattvaguṇas tv evaṃ puruṣo 'vyakta iṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:3114: 14,049.016c etad viprā vijānīta hanta bhūyo bravīmi vaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3116: 14,049.017b*0088_01 tat padaṃ samanuprāptaṃ yatra gatvā na śocati
GE07mbh_14_u:3117: 14,049.017b*0088_02 tvam apy etan mahābhāga yathoktaṃ brahmavarcasā
GE07mbh_14_u:3118: 14,049.017b*0088_03 vyaktaḥ sattvaguṇas tv evaṃ buddhimān sukham edhate
GE07mbh_14_u:3121: 14,049.018c upāyajño hi medhāvī sukham atyantam aśnute
GE07mbh_14_u:3122: 14,049.019a yathādhvānam apātheyaḥ prapanno mānavaḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_14_u:3123: 14,049.019c kleśena yāti mahatā vinaśyaty antarāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:3124: 14,049.020a tathā karmasu vijñeyaṃ phalaṃ bhavati vā na vā
GE07mbh_14_u:3126: 14,049.021a yathā ca dīrgham adhvānaṃ padbhyām eva prapadyate
GE07mbh_14_u:3132: 14,049.024a yāvad rathapathas tāvad rathena sa tu gacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:3133: 14,049.024c kṣīṇe rathapathe prājño ratham utsṛjya gacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:3137: 14,049.026c bāhubhyām eva saṃmohād vadhaṃ carcchaty asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_14_u:3138: 14,049.027a nāvā cāpi yathā prājño vibhāgajñas taritrayā
GE07mbh_14_u:3139: 14,049.027c aklāntaḥ salilaṃ gāhet kṣipraṃ saṃtarati dhruvam
GE07mbh_14_u:3140: 14,049.028a tīrṇo gacchet paraṃ pāraṃ nāvam utsṛjya nirmamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3142: 14,049.029a snehāt saṃmoham āpanno nāvi dāśo yathā tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:3144: 14,049.030a nāvaṃ na śakyam āruhya sthale viparivartitum
GE07mbh_14_u:3145: 14,049.030c tathaiva ratham āruhya nāpsu caryā vidhīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:3146: 14,049.031a evaṃ karma kṛtaṃ citraṃ viṣayasthaṃ pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_14_u:3147: 14,049.031c yathā karma kṛtaṃ loke tathā tad upapadyate
GE07mbh_14_u:3148: 14,049.032a yan naiva gandhino rasyaṃ na rūpasparśaśabdavat
GE07mbh_14_u:3149: 14,049.032c manyante munayo buddhyā tat pradhānaṃ pracakṣate
GE07mbh_14_u:3152: 14,049.033a tatra pradhānam avyaktam avyaktasya guṇo mahān
GE07mbh_14_u:3155: 14,049.034c pṛthaktvena hi bhūtānāṃ viṣayā vai guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3157: 14,049.035c bījadharmā mahān ātmā prasavaś ceti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_14_u:3158: 14,049.036a bījadharmā tv ahaṃkāraḥ prasavaś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3160: 14,049.037a bījadharmiṇa ity āhuḥ prasavaṃ ca na kurvate
GE07mbh_14_u:3163: 14,049.038c triguṇaṃ jyotir ity āhur āpaś cāpi caturguṇāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3166: 14,049.040a śabdaḥ sparśas tathā rūpaṃ raso gandhaś ca pañcamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3167: 14,049.040c ete pañca guṇā bhūmer vijñeyā dvijasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3168: 14,049.041a pārthivaś ca sadā gandho gandhaś ca bahudhā smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3169: 14,049.041c tasya gandhasya vakṣyāmi vistareṇa bahūn guṇān
GE07mbh_14_u:3170: 14,049.042a iṣṭaś cāniṣṭagandhaś ca madhuro 'mlaḥ kaṭus tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:3171: 14,049.042c nirhārī saṃhataḥ snigdho rūkṣo viśada eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:3172: 14,049.042e evaṃ daśavidho jñeyaḥ pārthivo gandha ity uta
GE07mbh_14_u:3173: 14,049.043a śabdaḥ sparśas tathā rūpaṃ rasaś cāpāṃ guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3174: 14,049.043c rasajñānaṃ tu vakṣyāmi rasas tu bahudhā smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3175: 14,049.044a madhuro 'mlaḥ kaṭus tiktaḥ kaṣāyo lavaṇas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:3177: 14,049.045a śabdaḥ sparśas tathā rūpaṃ triguṇaṃ jyotir ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:3178: 14,049.045c jyotiṣaś ca guṇo rūpaṃ rūpaṃ ca bahudhā smṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:3179: 14,049.046a śuklaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ tathā raktaṃ nīlaṃ pītāruṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:3180: 14,049.046c hrasvaṃ dīrghaṃ tathā sthūlaṃ caturasrāṇu vṛttakam
GE07mbh_14_u:3183: 14,049.048a śabdasparśau ca vijñeyau dviguṇo vāyur ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:3184: 14,049.048c vāyoś cāpi guṇaḥ sparśaḥ sparśaś ca bahudhā smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3185: 14,049.049a uṣṇaḥ śītaḥ sukho duḥkhaḥ snigdho viśada eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:3186: 14,049.049c kaṭhinaś cikkaṇaḥ ślakṣṇaḥ picchilo dāruṇo mṛduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3189: 14,049.051a tatraikaguṇam ākāśaṃ śabda ity eva ca smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3190: 14,049.051c tasya śabdasya vakṣyāmi vistareṇa bahūn guṇān
GE07mbh_14_u:3191: 14,049.052a ṣaḍjarṣabhau ca gāndhāro madhyamaḥ pañcamas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:3192: 14,049.052c ataḥ paraṃ tu vijñeyo niṣādo dhaivatas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:3193: 14,049.053a iṣṭo 'niṣṭaś ca śabdas tu saṃhataḥ pravibhāgavān
GE07mbh_14_u:3195: 14,049.054a ākāśam uttamaṃ bhūtam ahaṃkāras tataḥ param
GE07mbh_14_u:3196: 14,049.054c ahaṃkārāt parā buddhir buddher ātmā tataḥ paraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3197: 14,049.055a tasmāt tu param avyaktam avyaktāt puruṣaḥ paraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3201: 14,050.001a bhūtānām atha pañcānāṃ yathaiṣām īśvaraṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3202: 14,050.001c niyame ca visarge ca bhūtātmā mana eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:3203: 14,050.002a adhiṣṭhātā mano nityaṃ bhūtānāṃ mahatāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:3204: 14,050.002c buddhir aiśvaryam ācaṣṭe kṣetrajñaḥ sarva ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:3205: 14,050.003a indriyāṇi mano yuṅkte sadaśvān iva sārathiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3206: 14,050.003c indriyāṇi mano buddhiṃ kṣetrajño yuñjate sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:3208: 14,050.004c tam āruhya sa bhūtātmā samantāt paridhāvati
GE07mbh_14_u:3211: 14,050.006a evaṃ yo vetti vidvān vai sadā brahmamayaṃ ratham
GE07mbh_14_u:3212: 14,050.006c sa dhīraḥ sarvalokeṣu na moham adhigacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:3218: 14,050.009c etad brahmavanaṃ nityaṃ yasmiṃś carati kṣetravit
GE07mbh_14_u:3219: 14,050.010a loke 'smin yāni bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:3220: 14,050.010c tāny evāgre pralīyante paścād bhūtakṛtā guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3223: 14,050.011c sarve svabhāvataḥ sṛṣṭā na kriyābhyo na kāraṇāt
GE07mbh_14_u:3224: 14,050.012a ete viśvakṛto viprā jāyante ha punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3225: 14,050.012c tebhyaḥ prasūtās teṣv eva mahābhūteṣu pañcasu
GE07mbh_14_u:3228: 14,050.013c bhūtebhyaś cāpi pañcabhyo mukto gacchet prajāpatim
GE07mbh_14_u:3236: 14,050.017c tat sarvaṃ tapasā sādhyaṃ tapo hi duratikramam
GE07mbh_14_u:3240: 14,050.019c yāni cānyāni bhūtāni trasāni sthāvarāṇi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:3242: 14,050.020c tathaiva tapasā devā mahābhāgā divaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3243: 14,050.021a āśīryuktāni karmāṇi kurvate ye tv atandritāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3251: 14,050.025a avyaktād eva saṃbhūtaḥ samayajño gataḥ punaḥ

GE07mbh_14_u:3256: 14,050.027c yaccittas tanmanā bhūtvā guhyam etat sanātanam
GE07mbh_14_u:3258: 14,050.028c nibodhata yathā hīdaṃ guṇair lakṣaṇam ity uta
GE07mbh_14_u:3259: 14,050.029a dvyakṣaras tu bhaven mṛtyus tryakṣaraṃ brahma śāśvatam

GE07mbh_14_u:3261: 14,050.030a karma ke cit praśaṃsanti mandabuddhitarā narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3262: 14,050.030c ye tu buddhā mahātmāno na praśaṃsanti karma te
GE07mbh_14_u:3265: 14,050.032a tasmāt karmasu niḥsnehā ye ke cit pāradarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3266: 14,050.032c vidyāmayo 'yaṃ puruṣo na tu karmamayaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3267: 14,050.032d*0091_01 ya evam amṛtaṃ nityam agrāhyaṃ śaśvad akṣaram
GE07mbh_14_u:3268: 14,050.032d*0091_02 vaśyātmānam asaṃśliṣṭaṃ yo veda na mṛto bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:3269: 14,050.033a apūrvam amṛtaṃ nityaṃ ya enam avicāriṇam

GE07mbh_14_u:3273: 14,050.034c sa tad brahma śubhaṃ vetti yasmād bhūyo na vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:3275: 14,050.035c lakṣaṇaṃ hi prasādasya yathā syāt svapnadarśanam
GE07mbh_14_u:3276: 14,050.036a gatir eṣā tu muktānāṃ ye jñānapariniṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3277: 14,050.036c pravṛttayaś ca yāḥ sarvāḥ paśyanti pariṇāmajāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3278: 14,050.037a eṣā gatir asaktānām eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3279: 14,050.037c eṣā jñānavatāṃ prāptir etad vṛttam aninditam
GE07mbh_14_u:3282: 14,050.038c śakyā gatir iyaṃ gantuṃ sarvatra samadarśinā
GE07mbh_14_u:3283: 14,050.039a etad vaḥ sarvam ākhyātaṃ mayā viprarṣisattamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3284: 14,050.039c evam ācarata kṣipraṃ tataḥ siddhim avāpsyatha
GE07mbh_14_u:3286: 14,050.040a ity uktās te tu munayo brahmaṇā guruṇā tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:3288: 14,050.041a tvam apy etan mahābhāga yathoktaṃ brahmaṇo vacaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3289: 14,050.041c samyag ācara śuddhātmaṃs tataḥ siddhim avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_14_u:3291: 14,050.042a ity uktaḥ sa tadā śiṣyo guruṇā dharmam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:3292: 14,050.042c cakāra sarvaṃ kaunteya tato mokṣam avāptavān
GE07mbh_14_u:3293: 14,050.043a kṛtakṛtyaś ca sa tadā śiṣyaḥ kurukulodvaha
GE07mbh_14_u:3294: 14,050.043c tat padaṃ samanuprāpto yatra gatvā na śocati
GE07mbh_14_u:3296: 14,050.044a ko nv asau brāhmaṇaḥ kṛṣṇa kaś ca śiṣyo janārdana
GE07mbh_14_u:3297: 14,050.044c śrotavyaṃ cen mayaitad vai tat tvam ācakṣva me vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:3299: 14,050.045a ahaṃ gurur mahābāho manaḥ śiṣyaṃ ca viddhi me
GE07mbh_14_u:3300: 14,050.045c tvatprītyā guhyam etac ca kathitaṃ me dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_14_u:3301: 14,050.046a mayi ced asti te prītir nityaṃ kurukulodvaha
GE07mbh_14_u:3302: 14,050.046c adhyātmam etac chrutvā tvaṃ samyag ācara suvrata
GE07mbh_14_u:3303: 14,050.047a tatas tvaṃ samyag ācīrṇe dharme 'smin kurunandana
GE07mbh_14_u:3305: 14,050.048a pūrvam apy etad evoktaṃ yuddhakāla upasthite
GE07mbh_14_u:3306: 14,050.048c mayā tava mahābāho tasmād atra manaḥ kuru
GE07mbh_14_u:3307: 14,050.049a mayā tu bharataśreṣṭha ciradṛṣṭaḥ pitā vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:3308: 14,050.049c tam ahaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi saṃmate tava phalguna
GE07mbh_14_u:3314: 14,050.050b*0093_04 dānam apy arthadoṣeṇa nāma tasmāt kalau smaret
GE07mbh_14_u:3315: 14,050.050b*0093_05 yadi gantuṃ kṛtā buddhir vāsudeva namo 'stu te
GE07mbh_14_u:3316: 14,050.050c gacchāvo nagaraṃ kṛṣṇa gajasāhvayam adya vai
GE07mbh_14_u:3318: 14,050.051c samanujñāpya durdharṣaṃ svāṃ purīṃ yātum arhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:3321: 14,051.001c muhūrtād iva cācaṣṭa yuktam ity eva dārukaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3324: 14,051.003a ity uktāḥ sainikās te tu sajjībhūtā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_14_u:3326: 14,051.004a tatas tau ratham āsthāya prayātau kṛṣṇapāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_14_u:3327: 14,051.004c vikurvāṇau kathāś citrāḥ prīyamāṇau viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_14_u:3331: 14,051.006c nihatāḥ śatravaś cāpi prāptaṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam
GE07mbh_14_u:3333: 14,051.007c bhavantaṃ plavam āsādya tīrṇāḥ sma kurusāgaram
GE07mbh_14_u:3334: 14,051.007d*0094_01 bhaktāṃs tvam āśritān asmān pālayāmutra ceha ca
GE07mbh_14_u:3336: 14,051.008c yathāhaṃ tvā vijānāmi yathā cāhaṃ bhavanmanāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3337: 14,051.008d*0095_01 bhavāmi satataṃ kṛṣṇa tathā kuru mahāmate
GE07mbh_14_u:3339: 14,051.009c ratiḥ krīḍāmayī tubhyaṃ māyā te rodasī vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:3340: 14,051.010a tvayi sarvam idaṃ viśvaṃ yad idaṃ sthāṇujaṅgamam
GE07mbh_14_u:3341: 14,051.010c tvaṃ hi sarvaṃ vikuruṣe bhūtagrāmaṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_14_u:3344: 14,051.012a prāṇo vāyuḥ satatagaḥ krodho mṛtyuḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3345: 14,051.012c prasāde cāpi padmā śrīr nityaṃ tvayi mahāmate
GE07mbh_14_u:3346: 14,051.013a ratis tuṣṭir dhṛtiḥ kṣāntis tvayi cedaṃ carācaram
GE07mbh_14_u:3348: 14,051.014a sudīrgheṇāpi kālena na te śakyā guṇā mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:3349: 14,051.014c ātmā ca paramo vaktuṃ namas te nalinekṣaṇa
GE07mbh_14_u:3350: 14,051.015a vidito me 'si durdharṣa nāradād devalāt tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:3352: 14,051.016a tvayi sarvaṃ samāsaktaṃ tvam evaiko janeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3354: 14,051.017a etat sarvam ahaṃ samyag ācariṣye janārdana
GE07mbh_14_u:3356: 14,051.018a yat pāpo nihataḥ saṃkhye kauravyo dhṛtarāṣṭrajaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3357: 14,051.018c tvayā dagdhaṃ hi tat sainyaṃ mayā vijitam āhave
GE07mbh_14_u:3358: 14,051.019a bhavatā tat kṛtaṃ karma yenāvāpto jayo mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:3361: 14,051.020c saindhavasya ca pāpasya bhūriśravasa eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:3362: 14,051.020d*0096_01 tasmāt tvam eva saṃcintya hitaṃ kuru yathā tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:3364: 14,051.021c yad uktas tat kariṣyāmi na hi me 'tra vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:3367: 14,051.023a rucitaṃ hi mamaitat te dvārakāgamanaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:3368: 14,051.023c acirāc caiva dṛṣṭā tvaṃ mātulaṃ madhusūdana
GE07mbh_14_u:3374: 14,051.026a viduraṃ ca mahābuddhiṃ rājānaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhiram

GE07mbh_14_u:3377: 14,051.027a gāndhārīṃ ca mahāprājñāṃ pṛthāṃ kṛṣṇāṃ ca bhāminīm
GE07mbh_14_u:3378: 14,051.027c subhadrādyāś ca tāḥ sarvā bharatānāṃ striyas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:3379: 14,051.027e dadṛśāte sthitāḥ sarvā gāndhārīṃ parivārya vai
GE07mbh_14_u:3381: 14,051.028c nivedya nāmadheye sve tasya pādāv agṛhṇatām
GE07mbh_14_u:3382: 14,051.029a gāndhāryāś ca pṛthāyāś ca dharmarājñas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:3383: 14,051.029c bhīmasya ca mahātmānau tathā pādāv agṛhṇatām
GE07mbh_14_u:3384: 14,051.029d*0097_01 bhīmasya ca vavandāte tathā pādau mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3387: 14,051.030a kṣattāraṃ cāpi saṃpūjya pṛṣṭvā kuśalam avyayam
GE07mbh_14_u:3389: 14,051.030c taiḥ sārdhaṃ nṛpatiṃ vṛddhaṃ tatas taṃ paryupāsatām
GE07mbh_14_u:3391: 14,051.031c janārdanaṃ ca medhāvī vyasarjayata vai gṛhān
GE07mbh_14_u:3392: 14,051.032a te 'nujñātā nṛpatinā yayuḥ svaṃ svaṃ niveśanam
GE07mbh_14_u:3393: 14,051.032c dhanaṃjayagṛhān eva yayau kṛṣṇas tu vīryavān
GE07mbh_14_u:3399: 14,051.035a tatas tau tat praviśyātha dadṛśāte mahābalau
GE07mbh_14_u:3403: 14,051.037a tataḥ sa rājā medhāvī vivakṣū prekṣya tāv ubhau
GE07mbh_14_u:3405: 14,051.038a vivakṣū hi yuvāṃ manye vīrau yadukurūdvahau
GE07mbh_14_u:3406: 14,051.038c brūta kartāsmi sarvaṃ vāṃ na cirān mā vicāryatām
GE07mbh_14_u:3407: 14,051.039a ity ukte phalgunas tatra dharmarājānam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:3412: 14,051.041a sa gacched abhyanujñāto bhavatā yadi manyase
GE07mbh_14_u:3415: 14,051.042a puṇḍarīkākṣa bhadraṃ te gaccha tvaṃ madhusūdana
GE07mbh_14_u:3416: 14,051.042c purīṃ dvāravatīm adya draṣṭuṃ śūrasutaṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_14_u:3417: 14,051.043a rocate me mahābāho gamanaṃ tava keśava
GE07mbh_14_u:3418: 14,051.043c mātulaś ciradṛṣṭo me tvayā devī ca devakī
GE07mbh_14_u:3419: 14,051.044a mātulaṃ vasudevaṃ tvaṃ baladevaṃ ca mādhava
GE07mbh_14_u:3421: 14,051.045a smarethāś cāpi māṃ nityaṃ bhīmaṃ ca balināṃ varam
GE07mbh_14_u:3422: 14,051.045c phalgunaṃ nakulaṃ caiva sahadevaṃ ca mādhava
GE07mbh_14_u:3423: 14,051.046a ānartān avalokya tvaṃ pitaraṃ ca mahābhuja
GE07mbh_14_u:3424: 14,051.046c vṛṣṇīṃś ca punar āgaccher hayamedhe mamānagha
GE07mbh_14_u:3425: 14,051.047a sa gaccha ratnāny ādāya vividhāni vasūni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:3426: 14,051.047c yac cāpy anyan manojñaṃ te tad apy ādatsva sātvata
GE07mbh_14_u:3427: 14,051.048a iyaṃ hi vasudhā sarvā prasādāt tava mādhava
GE07mbh_14_u:3428: 14,051.048c asmān upagatā vīra nihatāś cāpi śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3432: 14,051.049c vāsudevo varaḥ puṃsām idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:3433: 14,051.050a tavaiva ratnāni dhanaṃ ca kevalam; dharā ca kṛtsnā tu mahābhujādya vai
GE07mbh_14_u:3434: 14,051.050c yad asti cānyad draviṇaṃ gṛheṣu me; tvam eva tasyeśvara nityam īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3435: 14,051.051a tathety athoktaḥ pratipūjitas tadā; gadāgrajo dharmasutena vīryavān
GE07mbh_14_u:3436: 14,051.051c pitṛṣvasām abhyavadad yathāvidhi; saṃpūjitaś cāpy agamat pradakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:3437: 14,051.052a tayā sa samyak pratinanditas tadā; tathaiva sarvair vidurādibhis tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3438: 14,051.052c viniryayau nāgapurād gadāgrajo; rathena divyena caturyujā hariḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3439: 14,051.053a rathaṃ subhadrām adhiropya bhāminīṃ; yudhiṣṭhirasyānumate janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3440: 14,051.053c pitṛṣvasāyāś ca tathā mahābhujo; viniryayau paurajanābhisaṃvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3441: 14,051.054a tam anvagād vānaravaryaketanaḥ; sasātyakir mādravatīsutāv api
GE07mbh_14_u:3442: 14,051.054c agādhabuddhir viduraś ca mādhavaṃ; svayaṃ ca bhīmo gajarājavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3443: 14,051.055a nivartayitvā kururāṣṭravardhanāṃs; tataḥ sa sarvān viduraṃ ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_14_u:3444: 14,051.055c janārdano dārukam āha satvaraḥ; pracodayāśvān iti sātyakis tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:3446: 14,051.056c yathā nihatyārigaṇāñ śatakratur; divaṃ tathānartapurīṃ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_14_u:3450: 14,052.002a punaḥ punaś ca vārṣṇeyaṃ paryaṣvajata phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3451: 14,052.002c ā cakṣurviṣayāc cainaṃ dadarśa ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3452: 14,052.003a kṛcchreṇaiva ca tāṃ pārtho govinde viniveśitām
GE07mbh_14_u:3453: 14,052.003c saṃjahāra tadā dṛṣṭiṃ kṛṣṇaś cāpy aparājitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3454: 14,052.004a tasya prayāṇe yāny āsan nimittāni mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3455: 14,052.004c bahūny adbhutarūpāṇi tāni me gadataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:3456: 14,052.005a vāyur vegena mahatā rathasya purato vavau
GE07mbh_14_u:3458: 14,052.006a vavarṣa vāsavaś cāpi toyaṃ śuci sugandhi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:3462: 14,052.007d*0103_01 āgacchantam apaśyad vai udaṅkaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3464: 14,052.008a sa taṃ saṃpūjya tejasvī muniṃ pṛthulalocanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3465: 14,052.008c pūjitas tena ca tadā paryapṛcchad anāmayam

GE07mbh_14_u:3476: 14,052.014a yā me saṃbhāvanā tāta tvayi nityam avartata
GE07mbh_14_u:3477: 14,052.014c api sā saphalā kṛṣṇa kṛtā te bharatān prati
GE07mbh_14_u:3479: 14,052.015a kṛto yatno mayā brahman saubhrātre kauravān prati

GE07mbh_14_u:3563: 14,054.001c nūnaṃ bhavatprasādo 'yam iti me nāsti saṃśayaḥ

GE07mbh_14_u:3639: 14,054.028a amṛtaṃ deyam ity eva mayoktaḥ sa śacīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3640: 14,054.028c sa māṃ prasādya devendraḥ punar evedam abravīt

GE07mbh_14_u:3706: 14,055.021a dakṣiṇā paritoṣo vai gurūṇāṃ sadbhir ucyate

GE07mbh_14_u:3708: 14,055.022a itthaṃ ca parituṣṭaṃ māṃ vijānīhi bhṛgūdvaha

GE07mbh_14_u:3754: 14,056.006a evam astu mahārāja samayaḥ kriyatāṃ tu me
GE07mbh_14_u:3755: 14,056.006c gurvartham abhinirvartya punar eṣyāmi te vaśam
GE07mbh_14_u:3756: 14,056.007a saṃśrutaś ca mayā yo 'rtho gurave rājasattama
GE07mbh_14_u:3757: 14,056.007c tvadadhīnaḥ sa rājendra taṃ tvā bhikṣe nareśvara
GE07mbh_14_u:3758: 14,056.008a dadāsi vipramukhyebhyas tvaṃ hi ratnāni sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:3759: 14,056.008c dātā tvaṃ ca naravyāghra pātrabhūtaḥ kṣitāv iha
GE07mbh_14_u:3760: 14,056.008e pātraṃ pratigrahe cāpi viddhi māṃ nṛpasattama
GE07mbh_14_u:3762: 14,056.009c samayeneha rājendra punar eṣyāmi te vaśam
GE07mbh_14_u:3763: 14,056.010a satyaṃ te pratijānāmi nātra mithyāsti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:3764: 14,056.010c anṛtaṃ noktapūrvaṃ me svaireṣv api kuto 'nyathā
GE07mbh_14_u:3766: 14,056.011a yadi mattas tvadāyatto gurvarthaḥ kṛta eva saḥ

GE07mbh_14_u:4470: 14,067.003a tataḥ sa prāviśat tūrṇaṃ janmaveśma pitus tava
GE07mbh_14_u:4472: 14,067.004a apāṃ kumbhaiḥ supūrṇaiś ca vinyastaiḥ sarvatodiśam

GE07mbh_14_u:4477: 14,067.006c dadarśa ca sa tejasvī rakṣoghnāny api sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4478: 14,067.006e dravyāṇi sthāpitāni sma vidhivat kuśalair janaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4479: 14,067.007a tathāyuktaṃ ca tad dṛṣṭvā janmaveśma pitus tava
GE07mbh_14_u:4480: 14,067.007c hṛṣṭo 'bhavad dhṛṣīkeśaḥ sādhu sādhv iti cābravīt

GE07mbh_14_u:4483: 14,067.009a ayam āyāti te bhadre śvaśuro madhusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4485: 14,067.010a sāpi bāṣpakalāṃ vācaṃ nigṛhyāśrūṇi caiva ha
GE07mbh_14_u:4490: 14,067.012c abhimanyuṃ ca māṃ caiva hatau tulyaṃ janārdana
GE07mbh_14_u:4491: 14,067.013a vārṣṇeya madhuhan vīra śirasā tvāṃ prasādaye
GE07mbh_14_u:4493: 14,067.014a yadi sma dharmarājñā vā bhīmasenena vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4494: 14,067.014c tvayā vā puṇḍarīkākṣa vākyam uktam idaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:4495: 14,067.015a ajānatīm iṣīkeyaṃ janitrīṃ hantv iti prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:4496: 14,067.015c aham eva vinaṣṭā syāṃ nedam evaṃgataṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:4499: 14,067.016c kṛtvā nṛśaṃsaṃ durbuddhir drauṇiḥ kiṃ phalam aśnute
GE07mbh_14_u:4500: 14,067.017a sā tvā prasādya śirasā yāce śatrunibarhaṇa
GE07mbh_14_u:4501: 14,067.017c prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi govinda nāyaṃ saṃjīvate yadi
GE07mbh_14_u:4502: 14,067.018a asmin hi bahavaḥ sādho ye mamāsan manorathāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4503: 14,067.018c te droṇaputreṇa hatāḥ kiṃ nu jīvāmi keśava
GE07mbh_14_u:4504: 14,067.019a āsīn mama matiḥ kṛṣṇa pūrṇotsaṅgā janārdana
GE07mbh_14_u:4507: 14,067.020c viphalā me kṛtāḥ kṛṣṇa hṛdi sarve manorathāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4511: 14,067.022c yaḥ pāṇḍavīṃ śriyaṃ tyaktvā gato 'dya yamasādanam
GE07mbh_14_u:4513: 14,067.023c abhimanyau hate vīra tvām eṣyāmy acirād iti
GE07mbh_14_u:4514: 14,067.024a tac ca nākaravaṃ kṛṣṇa nṛśaṃsā jīvitapriyā
GE07mbh_14_u:4515: 14,067.024c idānīm āgatāṃ tatra kiṃ nu vakṣyati phālguniḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4520: 14,068.002c cukrośa kuntī duḥkhārtā sarvāś ca bharatastriyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4521: 14,068.003a muhūrtam iva tad rājan pāṇḍavānāṃ niveśanam
GE07mbh_14_u:4524: 14,068.004c kaśmalābhihatā vīra vairāṭī tv abhavat tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:4525: 14,068.005a pratilabhya tu sā saṃjñām uttarā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_14_u:4526: 14,068.005c aṅkam āropya taṃ putram idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:4527: 14,068.006a dharmajñasya sutaḥ saṃs tvam adharmam avabudhyase
GE07mbh_14_u:4529: 14,068.007a putra gatvā mama vaco brūyās tvaṃ pitaraṃ tava
GE07mbh_14_u:4530: 14,068.007c durmaraṃ prāṇināṃ vīra kāle prāpte kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:4531: 14,068.008a yāhaṃ tvayā vihīnādya patyā putreṇa caiva ha
GE07mbh_14_u:4534: 14,068.009c bhakṣayiṣye viṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ pravekṣye vā hutāśanam
GE07mbh_14_u:4535: 14,068.010a atha vā durmaraṃ tāta yad idaṃ me sahasradhā
GE07mbh_14_u:4539: 14,068.012a āryāṃ ca paśya pāñcālīṃ sātvatīṃ ca tapasvinīm
GE07mbh_14_u:4540: 14,068.012c māṃ ca paśya suduḥkhārtāṃ vyādhaviddhāṃ mṛgīm iva
GE07mbh_14_u:4543: 14,068.014a evaṃ vipralapantīṃ tu dṛṣṭvā nipatitāṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4544: 14,068.014c uttarāṃ tāḥ striyaḥ sarvāḥ punar utthāpayanty uta
GE07mbh_14_u:4545: 14,068.015a utthāya tu punar dhairyāt tadā matsyapateḥ sutā
GE07mbh_14_u:4547: 14,068.016a śrutvā sa tasyā vipulaṃ vilāpaṃ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4548: 14,068.016c upaspṛśya tataḥ kṛṣṇo brahmāstraṃ saṃjahāra tat
GE07mbh_14_u:4549: 14,068.017a pratijajñe ca dāśārhas tasya jīvitam acyutaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4550: 14,068.017c abravīc ca viśuddhātmā sarvaṃ viśrāvayañ jagat
GE07mbh_14_u:4551: 14,068.018a na bravīmy uttare mithyā satyam etad bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:4553: 14,068.019a noktapūrvaṃ mayā mithyā svaireṣv api kadā cana
GE07mbh_14_u:4554: 14,068.019c na ca yuddhe parāvṛttas tathā saṃjīvatām ayam
GE07mbh_14_u:4555: 14,068.020a yathā me dayito dharmo brāhmaṇāś ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4556: 14,068.020c abhimanyoḥ suto jāto mṛto jīvatv ayaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:4558: 14,068.021c virodhaṃ tena satyena mṛto jīvatv ayaṃ śiśuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4559: 14,068.022a yathā satyaṃ ca dharmaś ca mayi nityaṃ pratiṣṭhitau

GE07mbh_14_u:4561: 14,068.023a yathā kaṃsaś ca keśī ca dharmeṇa nihatau mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:4562: 14,068.023c tena satyena bālo 'yaṃ punar ujjīvatām iha

GE07mbh_14_u:4565: 14,068.024a ity ukto vāsudevena sa bālo bharatarṣabha

GE07mbh_14_u:4571: 14,069.001a brahmāstraṃ tu yadā rājan kṛṣṇena pratisaṃhṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:4572: 14,069.001c tadā tad veśma te pitrā tejasābhividīpitam
GE07mbh_14_u:4573: 14,069.002a tato rakṣāṃsi sarvāṇi neśus tyaktvā gṛhaṃ tu tat

GE07mbh_14_u:4575: 14,069.003a tad astraṃ jvalitaṃ cāpi pitāmaham agāt tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:4576: 14,069.003c tataḥ prāṇān punar lebhe pitā tava janeśvara
GE07mbh_14_u:4578: 14,069.004a babhūvur muditā rājaṃs tatas tā bharatastriyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4579: 14,069.004c brāhmaṇān vācayām āsur govindasya ca śāsanāt

GE07mbh_14_u:4582: 14,069.006a kuntī drupadaputrī ca subhadrā cottarā tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:4584: 14,069.007a tatra mallā naṭā jhallā granthikāḥ saukhaśāyikāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4590: 14,069.008e tatas tasyai dadau prīto bahuratnaṃ viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4594: 14,069.010c parikṣid iti nāmāsya bhavatv ity abravīt tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:4598: 14,069.012a māsajātas tu te vīra pitā bhavati bhārata

GE07mbh_14_u:4608: 14,069.014a patākābhir vicitrābhir dhvajaiś ca vividhair api
GE07mbh_14_u:4614: 14,069.017a nartakaiś cāpi nṛtyadbhir gāyanānāṃ ca nisvanaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4615: 14,069.017c āsīd vaiśravaṇasyeva nivāsas tat puraṃ tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:4616: 14,069.018a bandibhiś ca narai rājan strīsahāyaiḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4619: 14,069.019c adarśayann iva tadā kurūn vai dakṣiṇottarān
GE07mbh_14_u:4627: 14,070.002a te sametya yathānyāyaṃ pāṇḍavā vṛṣṇibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_14_u:4631: 14,070.004a te kośam agrataḥ kṛtvā viviśuḥ svapuraṃ tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:4635: 14,070.006a dhṛtarāṣṭrād anu ca te gāndhārīṃ subalātmajām
GE07mbh_14_u:4637: 14,070.007a viduraṃ pūjayitvā ca vaiśyāputraṃ sametya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:4638: 14,070.007c pūjyamānāḥ sma te vīrā vyarājanta viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_14_u:4639: 14,070.008a tatas tat param āścaryaṃ vicitraṃ mahad adbhutam
GE07mbh_14_u:4640: 14,070.008c śuśruvus te tadā vīrāḥ pitus te janma bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:4641: 14,070.009a tad upaśrutya te karma vāsudevasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4645: 14,070.011a tasya sarve yathānyāyaṃ pūjāṃ cakruḥ kurūdvahāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4649: 14,070.013a bhavatprasādād bhagavan yad idaṃ ratnam āhṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:4652: 14,070.014c tvadadhīnā vayaṃ sarve kṛṣṇasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4654: 14,070.015a anujānāmi rājaṃs tvāṃ kriyatāṃ yad anantaram
GE07mbh_14_u:4657: 14,070.016c teneṣṭvā tvaṃ vipāpmā vai bhavitā nātra saṃśayaḥ

GE07mbh_14_u:4664: 14,070.019c yad brūyāṃ tvāṃ mahābāho tat kṛthās tvam ihācyuta

GE07mbh_14_u:4667: 14,070.021a dīkṣayasva tvam ātmānaṃ tvaṃ naḥ paramako guruḥ

GE07mbh_14_u:4669: 14,070.021e tvaṃ hi yajño 'kṣaraḥ sarvas tvaṃ dharmas tvaṃ prajāpatiḥ

GE07mbh_14_u:4674: 14,070.023c guṇabhūtāḥ sma te rājaṃs tvaṃ no rājan mato guruḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4675: 14,070.024a yajasva madanujñātaḥ prāpta eva kratur mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:4676: 14,070.024c yunaktu no bhavān kārye yatra vāñchasi bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:4677: 14,070.024e satyaṃ te pratijānāmi sarvaṃ kartāsmi te 'nagha

GE07mbh_14_u:4684: 14,071.002c dīkṣayasva tadā mā tvaṃ tvayy āyatto hi me kratuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4686: 14,071.003a ahaṃ pailo 'tha kaunteya yājñavalkyas tathaiva ca

GE07mbh_14_u:4688: 14,071.004a caitryāṃ hi paurṇamāsyāṃ ca tava dīkṣā bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:4690: 14,071.005a aśvavidyāvidaś caiva sūtā viprāś ca tadvidaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4693: 14,071.006c sa paryetu yaśo nāmnā tava pārthiva vardhayan
GE07mbh_14_u:4697: 14,071.007a ity uktaḥ sa tathety uktvā pāṇḍavaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4700: 14,071.008a sa saṃbhārān samāhṛtya nṛpo dharmātmajas tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:4703: 14,071.009c yathākālaṃ yathāyogaṃ sajjāḥ sma tava dīkṣaṇe
GE07mbh_14_u:4704: 14,071.010a sphyaś ca kūrcaś ca sauvarṇo yac cānyad api kaurava

GE07mbh_14_u:4706: 14,071.011a aśvaś cotsṛjyatām adya pṛthvyām atha yathākramam
GE07mbh_14_u:4707: 14,071.011c suguptaś ca caratv eṣa yathāśāstraṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:4709: 14,071.012a ayam aśvo mayā brahmann utsṛṣṭaḥ pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_14_u:4712: 14,071.013c kaḥ pālayed iti mune tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_14_u:4714: 14,071.014a ity uktaḥ sa tu rājendra kṛṣṇadvaipāyano 'bravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:4716: 14,071.015a jiṣṇuḥ sahiṣṇur dhṛṣṇuś ca sa enaṃ pālayiṣyati

GE07mbh_14_u:4718: 14,071.016a tasmin hy astrāṇi divyāni divyaṃ saṃhananaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:4719: 14,071.016c divyaṃ dhanuś ceṣudhī ca sa enam anuyāsyati
GE07mbh_14_u:4723: 14,071.018c abhimanyoḥ pitā vīraḥ sa enam anuyāsyati
GE07mbh_14_u:4725: 14,071.019c samartho rakṣituṃ rāṣṭraṃ nakulaś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_14_u:4728: 14,071.021a tat tu sarvaṃ yathānyāyam uktaṃ kurukulodvahaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4729: 14,071.021c cakāra phalgunaṃ cāpi saṃdideśa hayaṃ prati
GE07mbh_14_u:4731: 14,071.022a ehy arjuna tvayā vīra hayo 'yaṃ paripālyatām
GE07mbh_14_u:4732: 14,071.022c tvam arho rakṣituṃ hy enaṃ nānyaḥ kaś cana mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4733: 14,071.023a ye cāpi tvāṃ mahābāho pratyudīyur narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4734: 14,071.023c tair vigraho yathā na syāt tathā kāryaṃ tvayānagha
GE07mbh_14_u:4735: 14,071.024a ākhyātavyaś ca bhavatā yajño 'yaṃ mama sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4737: 14,071.025a evam uktvā sa dharmātmā bhrātaraṃ savyasācinam

GE07mbh_14_u:4739: 14,071.026a kuṭumbatantre ca tathā sahadevaṃ yudhāṃ patim
GE07mbh_14_u:4742: 14,072.001a dīkṣākāle tu saṃprāpte tatas te sumahartvijaḥ

GE07mbh_14_u:4746: 14,072.003a hayaś ca hayamedhārthaṃ svayaṃ sa brahmavādinā
GE07mbh_14_u:4748: 14,072.004a sa rājā dharmajo rājan dīkṣito vibabhau tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:4753: 14,072.006c babhūvur arjunaś caiva pradīpta iva pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4757: 14,072.008c tam aśvaṃ pṛthivīpāla mudā yuktaḥ sasāra ha

GE07mbh_14_u:4761: 14,072.010c didṛkṣūṇāṃ hayaṃ taṃ ca taṃ caiva hayasāriṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:4764: 14,072.012a eṣa gacchati kaunteyas turagaś caiva dīptimān
GE07mbh_14_u:4765: 14,072.012c yam anveti mahābāhuḥ saṃspṛśan dhanur uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:4766: 14,072.013a evaṃ śuśrāva vadatāṃ giro jiṣṇur udāradhīḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4767: 14,072.013c svasti te 'stu vrajāriṣṭaṃ punaś caihīti bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:4769: 14,072.014c nainaṃ paśyāma saṃmarde dhanur etat pradṛśyate
GE07mbh_14_u:4770: 14,072.015a etad dhi bhīmanirhrādaṃ viśrutaṃ gāṇḍivaṃ dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4771: 14,072.015c svasti gacchatv ariṣṭaṃ vai panthānam akutobhayam
GE07mbh_14_u:4772: 14,072.015e nivṛttam enaṃ drakṣyāmaḥ punar evaṃ ca te 'bruvan
GE07mbh_14_u:4774: 14,072.016c śuśrāva madhurā vācaḥ punaḥ punar udīritāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4778: 14,072.018c anujagmur mahātmānaṃ kṣatriyāś ca viśo 'pi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:4780: 14,072.019c cacāra sa mahārāja yathādeśaṃ sa sattama
GE07mbh_14_u:4781: 14,072.020a tatra yuddhāni vṛttāni yāny āsan pāṇḍavasya ha
GE07mbh_14_u:4782: 14,072.020c tāni vakṣyāmi te vīra vicitrāṇi mahānti ca
GE07mbh_14_u:4783: 14,072.021a sa hayaḥ pṛthivīṃ rājan pradakṣiṇam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_14_u:4786: 14,072.022c śanais tadā pariyayau śvetāśvaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:4787: 14,072.023a tatra saṃkalanā nāsti rājñām ayutaśas tadā

GE07mbh_14_u:5162: 14,078.014a saṃnahya kāñcanaṃ varma śirastrāṇaṃ ca bhānumat
GE07mbh_14_u:5167: 14,078.016c prayayau pārtham uddiśya sa rājā babhruvāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5170: 14,078.018a gṛhītaṃ vājinaṃ dṛṣṭvā prītātmā sa dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5172: 14,078.019a tataḥ sa rājā taṃ vīraṃ śaravrātaiḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5174: 14,078.020a tayoḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ pituḥ putrasya cātulam
GE07mbh_14_u:5178: 14,078.022a so 'bhyagāt saha puṅkhena valmīkam iva pannagaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5180: 14,078.023a sa gāḍhavedano dhīmān ālambya dhanur uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:5181: 14,078.023c divyaṃ tejaḥ samāviśya pramīta iva saṃbabhau
GE07mbh_14_u:5183: 14,078.024c putraṃ śakrātmajo vākyam idam āha mahīpate
GE07mbh_14_u:5185: 14,078.025c sadṛśaṃ karma te dṛṣṭvā prītimān asmi putraka
GE07mbh_14_u:5186: 14,078.026a vimuñcāmy eṣa bāṇāṃs te putra yuddhe sthiro bhava
GE07mbh_14_u:5187: 14,078.026c ity evam uktvā nārācair abhyavarṣad amitrahā
GE07mbh_14_u:5190: 14,078.027c nārācair acchinad rājā sarvān eva tridhā tridhā
GE07mbh_14_u:5191: 14,078.028a tasya pārthaḥ śarair divyair dhvajaṃ hemapariṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:5196: 14,078.030c padātiḥ pitaraṃ kopād yodhayām āsa pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_14_u:5202: 14,078.033a tataḥ sa bālyāt pitaraṃ vivyādha hṛdi patriṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:5204: 14,078.034a sa bāṇas tejasā dīpto jvalann iva hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5207: 14,078.035c mahīṃ jagāma mohārtas tato rājan dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5210: 14,078.037a vyāyamya saṃyuge rājā dṛṣṭvā ca pitaraṃ hatam
GE07mbh_14_u:5211: 14,078.037c pūrvam eva ca bāṇaughair gāḍhaviddho 'rjunena saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5213: 14,078.038a bhartāraṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā putraṃ ca patitaṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_14_u:5219: 14,079.001c mumoha duḥkhād durdharṣā nipapāta ca bhūtale
GE07mbh_14_u:5220: 14,079.002a pratilabhya ca sā saṃjñāṃ devī divyavapurdharā
GE07mbh_14_u:5222: 14,079.003a ulūpi paśya bhartāraṃ śayānaṃ nihataṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_14_u:5224: 14,079.004a nanu tvam ārye dharmajñā nanu cāsi pativratā
GE07mbh_14_u:5225: 14,079.004c yat tvatkṛte 'yaṃ patitaḥ patis te nihato raṇe
GE07mbh_14_u:5226: 14,079.005a kiṃ tu sarvāparādho 'yaṃ yadi te 'dya dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5228: 14,079.006a nanu tvam ārye dharmajñā trailokyaviditā śubhe
GE07mbh_14_u:5229: 14,079.006c yad ghātayitvā bhartāraṃ putreṇeha na śocasi
GE07mbh_14_u:5231: 14,079.007c patim eva tu śocāmi yasyātithyam idaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:5232: 14,079.008a ity uktvā sā tadā devīm ulūpīṃ pannagātmajām
GE07mbh_14_u:5235: 14,079.009c ayam aśvo mahābāho mayā te parimokṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5236: 14,079.010a nanu nāma tvayā vīra dharmarājasya yajñiyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5237: 14,079.010c ayam aśvo 'nusartavyaḥ sa śeṣe kiṃ mahītale
GE07mbh_14_u:5239: 14,079.011c sa kasmāt prāṇado 'nyeṣāṃ prāṇān saṃtyaktavān asi
GE07mbh_14_u:5240: 14,079.012a ulūpi sādhu saṃpaśya bhartāraṃ nihataṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_14_u:5241: 14,079.012c putraṃ cainaṃ samutsāhya ghātayitvā na śocasi
GE07mbh_14_u:5242: 14,079.013a kāmaṃ svapitu bālo 'yaṃ bhūmau pretagatiṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5245: 14,079.014c nārīṇāṃ tu bhavaty etan mā te bhūd buddhir īdṛśī
GE07mbh_14_u:5246: 14,079.015a sakhyaṃ hy etat kṛtaṃ dhātrā śāśvataṃ cāvyayaṃ ca ha
GE07mbh_14_u:5247: 14,079.015c sakhyaṃ samabhijānīhi satyaṃ saṃgatam astu te
GE07mbh_14_u:5248: 14,079.016a putreṇa ghātayitvemaṃ patiṃ yadi na me 'dya vai
GE07mbh_14_u:5251: 14,079.017c ihaiva prāyam āśiṣye prekṣantyās te na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5253: 14,079.018c tataḥ prāyam upāsīnā tūṣṇīm āsīj janādhipa
GE07mbh_14_u:5255: 14,080.001a tathā vilapyoparatā bhartuḥ pādau pragṛhya sā
GE07mbh_14_u:5257: 14,080.002a tataḥ saṃjñāṃ punar labdhvā sa rājā babhruvāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5259: 14,080.003a ito duḥkhataraṃ kiṃ nu yan me mātā sukhaidhitā
GE07mbh_14_u:5260: 14,080.003c bhūmau nipatitaṃ vīram anuśete mṛtaṃ patim
GE07mbh_14_u:5262: 14,080.004c mayā vinihataṃ saṃkhye prekṣate durmaraṃ bata
GE07mbh_14_u:5263: 14,080.005a aho 'syā hṛdayaṃ devyā dṛḍhaṃ yan na vidīryate
GE07mbh_14_u:5265: 14,080.006a durmaraṃ puruṣeṇeha manye hy adhvany anāgate
GE07mbh_14_u:5266: 14,080.006c yatra nāhaṃ na me mātā viprayujyeta jīvitāt
GE07mbh_14_u:5267: 14,080.007a aho dhik kuruvīrasya hy uraḥsthaṃ kāñcanaṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_14_u:5269: 14,080.008a bho bho paśyata me vīraṃ pitaraṃ brāhmaṇā bhuvi
GE07mbh_14_u:5272: 14,080.009c kurvantu śāntikāṃ tv adya raṇe yo 'yaṃ mayā hataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5273: 14,080.010a vyādiśantu ca kiṃ viprāḥ prāyaścittam ihādya me
GE07mbh_14_u:5275: 14,080.011a duścarā dvādaśa samā hatvā pitaram adya vai
GE07mbh_14_u:5277: 14,080.012a śiraḥkapāle cāsyaiva bhuñjataḥ pitur adya me
GE07mbh_14_u:5278: 14,080.012c prāyaścittaṃ hi nāsty anyad dhatvādya pitaraṃ mama
GE07mbh_14_u:5280: 14,080.013c kṛtaṃ priyaṃ mayā te 'dya nihatya samare 'rjunam
GE07mbh_14_u:5281: 14,080.014a so 'ham apy adya yāsyāmi gatiṃ pitṛniṣevitām
GE07mbh_14_u:5282: 14,080.014c na śaknomy ātmanātmānam ahaṃ dhārayituṃ śubhe
GE07mbh_14_u:5283: 14,080.015a sā tvaṃ mayi mṛte mātas tathā gāṇḍīvadhanvani
GE07mbh_14_u:5285: 14,080.016a ity uktvā sa tadā rājā duḥkhaśokasamāhataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5288: 14,080.017c tvaṃ ca mātar yathā satyaṃ bravīmi bhujagottame
GE07mbh_14_u:5289: 14,080.018a yadi nottiṣṭhati jayaḥ pitā me bharatarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5291: 14,080.019a na hi me pitaraṃ hatvā niṣkṛtir vidyate kva cit
GE07mbh_14_u:5293: 14,080.020a vīraṃ hi kṣatriyaṃ hatvā gośatena pramucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:5294: 14,080.020c pitaraṃ tu nihatyaivaṃ dustarā niṣkṛtir mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:5295: 14,080.021a eṣa hy eko mahātejāḥ pāṇḍuputro dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5296: 14,080.021c pitā ca mama dharmātmā tasya me niṣkṛtiḥ kutaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5297: 14,080.022a ity evam uktvā nṛpate dhanaṃjayasuto nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5302: 14,081.002a ulūpī cintayām āsa tadā saṃjīvanaṃ maṇim
GE07mbh_14_u:5304: 14,081.003a taṃ gṛhītvā tu kauravya nāgarājapateḥ sutā
GE07mbh_14_u:5306: 14,081.004a uttiṣṭha mā śucaḥ putra naiṣa jiṣṇus tvayā hataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5307: 14,081.004c ajeyaḥ puruṣair eṣa devair vāpi savāsavaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5308: 14,081.005a mayā tu mohinī nāma māyaiṣā saṃprayojitā
GE07mbh_14_u:5310: 14,081.006a jijñāsur hy eṣa vai putra balasya tava kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5312: 14,081.007a tasmād asi mayā putra yuddhārthaṃ paricoditaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5313: 14,081.007c mā pāpam ātmanaḥ putra śaṅkethās tv aṇv api prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:5315: 14,081.008c nainaṃ śakto hi saṃgrāme jetuṃ śakro 'pi putraka
GE07mbh_14_u:5316: 14,081.009a ayaṃ tu me maṇir divyaḥ samānīto viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_14_u:5317: 14,081.009c mṛtān mṛtān pannagendrān yo jīvayati nityadā
GE07mbh_14_u:5318: 14,081.010a etam asyorasi tvaṃ tu sthāpayasva pituḥ prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:5319: 14,081.010c saṃjīvitaṃ punaḥ putra tato draṣṭāsi pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_14_u:5320: 14,081.011a ity uktaḥ sthāpayām āsa tasyorasi maṇiṃ tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:5322: 14,081.012a tasmin nyaste maṇau vīra jiṣṇur ujjīvitaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5329: 14,081.015c sādhu sādhv iti cākāśe babhūva sumahān svanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5335: 14,081.018c raṇājiram amitraghna yadi jānāsi śaṃsa me
GE07mbh_14_u:5336: 14,081.019a jananī ca kimarthaṃ te raṇabhūmim upāgatā
GE07mbh_14_u:5338: 14,081.020a jānāmy aham idaṃ yuddhaṃ tvayā madvacanāt kṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:5339: 14,081.020c strīṇām āgamane hetum aham icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_14_u:5340: 14,081.021a tam uvāca tataḥ pṛṣṭo maṇipūrapatis tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:5341: 14,081.021c prasādya śirasā vidvān ulūpī pṛcchyatām iti
GE07mbh_14_u:5346: 14,082.002c mama vā cañcalāpāṅge kaccit tvaṃ śubham icchasi
GE07mbh_14_u:5348: 14,082.003c akārṣam aham ajñānād ayaṃ vā babhruvāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5349: 14,082.004a kaccic ca rājaputrī te sapatnī caitravāhinī
GE07mbh_14_u:5352: 14,082.005c na me tvam aparāddho 'si na nṛpo babhruvāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5353: 14,082.005e na janitrī tathāsyeyaṃ mama yā preṣyavat sthitā
GE07mbh_14_u:5354: 14,082.006a śrūyatāṃ yad yathā cedaṃ mayā sarvaṃ viceṣṭitam
GE07mbh_14_u:5355: 14,082.006c na me kopas tvayā kāryaḥ śirasā tvāṃ prasādaye
GE07mbh_14_u:5356: 14,082.007a tvatprītyarthaṃ hi kauravya kṛtam etan mayānagha
GE07mbh_14_u:5357: 14,082.007c yat tac chṛṇu mahābāho nikhilena dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_14_u:5359: 14,082.008c adharmeṇa hataḥ pārtha tasyaiṣā niṣkṛtiḥ kṛtā
GE07mbh_14_u:5360: 14,082.009a na hi bhīṣmas tvayā vīra yudhyamāno nipātitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5361: 14,082.009c śikhaṇḍinā tu saṃsaktas tam āśritya hatas tvayā
GE07mbh_14_u:5362: 14,082.010a tasya śāntim akṛtvā tu tyajes tvaṃ yadi jīvitam
GE07mbh_14_u:5363: 14,082.010c karmaṇā tena pāpena patethā niraye dhruvam
GE07mbh_14_u:5364: 14,082.011a eṣā tu vihitā śāntiḥ putrād yāṃ prāptavān asi
GE07mbh_14_u:5366: 14,082.012a purā hi śrutam etad vai vasubhiḥ kathitaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:5367: 14,082.012c gaṅgāyās tīram āgamya hate śāṃtanave nṛpe
GE07mbh_14_u:5368: 14,082.013a āplutya devā vasavaḥ sametya ca mahānadīm
GE07mbh_14_u:5369: 14,082.013c idam ūcur vaco ghoraṃ bhāgīrathyā mate tadā
GE07mbh_14_u:5372: 14,082.015a tad anenābhiṣaṅgeṇa vayam apy arjunaṃ śubhe
GE07mbh_14_u:5373: 14,082.015c śāpena yojayāmeti tathāstv iti ca sābravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:5374: 14,082.016a tad ahaṃ pitur āvedya bhṛśaṃ pravyathitendriyā
GE07mbh_14_u:5375: 14,082.016c abhavaṃ sa ca tac chrutvā viṣādam agamat param
GE07mbh_14_u:5376: 14,082.017a pitā tu me vasūn gatvā tvadarthaṃ samayācata
GE07mbh_14_u:5377: 14,082.017c punaḥ punaḥ prasādyaināṃs ta enam idam abruvan
GE07mbh_14_u:5379: 14,082.018c sa enaṃ raṇamadhyasthaṃ śaraiḥ pātayitā bhuvi
GE07mbh_14_u:5380: 14,082.019a evaṃ kṛte sa nāgendra muktaśāpo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:5381: 14,082.019c gaccheti vasubhiś cokto mama cedaṃ śaśaṃsa saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5382: 14,082.020a tac chrutvā tvaṃ mayā tasmāc chāpād asi vimokṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5383: 14,082.020c na hi tvāṃ devarājo 'pi samareṣu parājayet
GE07mbh_14_u:5384: 14,082.021a ātmā putraḥ smṛtas tasmāt tenehāsi parājitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5385: 14,082.021c nātra doṣo mama mataḥ kathaṃ vā manyase vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:5386: 14,082.022a ity evam ukto vijayaḥ prasannātmābravīd idam
GE07mbh_14_u:5387: 14,082.022c sarvaṃ me supriyaṃ devi yad etat kṛtavaty asi
GE07mbh_14_u:5392: 14,082.025a ity evam uktaḥ pārthena sa rājā babhruvāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5396: 14,082.027a mama tv anugrahārthāya praviśasva puraṃ svakam
GE07mbh_14_u:5397: 14,082.027c bhāryābhyāṃ saha śatrughna mā bhūt te 'tra vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:5398: 14,082.028a uṣitveha viśalyas tvaṃ sukhaṃ sve veśmani prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:5400: 14,082.029a ity uktaḥ sa tu putreṇa tadā vānaraketanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5402: 14,082.030a viditaṃ te mahābāho yathā dīkṣāṃ carāmy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:5403: 14,082.030c na sa tāvat pravekṣyāmi puraṃ te pṛthulocana
GE07mbh_14_u:5404: 14,082.031a yathākāmaṃ prayāty eṣa yajñiyaś ca turaṃgamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5405: 14,082.031c svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmi na sthānaṃ vidyate mama
GE07mbh_14_u:5406: 14,082.032a sa tatra vidhivat tena pūjitaḥ pākaśāsaniḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5409: 14,083.001a sa tu vājī samudrāntāṃ paryetya pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_14_u:5415: 14,083.004a tataḥ purāt sa niṣkramya rathī dhanvī śarī talī
GE07mbh_14_u:5419: 14,083.006a kim ayaṃ cāryate vājī strīmadhya iva bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:5421: 14,083.007a adattānunayo yuddhe yadi tvaṃ pitṛbhir mama
GE07mbh_14_u:5425: 14,083.008a ity uktaḥ pratyuvācainaṃ pāṇḍavaḥ prahasann iva
GE07mbh_14_u:5426: 14,083.008c vighnakartā mayā vārya iti me vratam āhitam
GE07mbh_14_u:5427: 14,083.009a bhrātrā jyeṣṭhena nṛpate tavāpi viditaṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_14_u:5428: 14,083.009c praharasva yathāśakti na manyur vidyate mama
GE07mbh_14_u:5429: 14,083.010a ity uktaḥ prāharat pūrvaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ magadheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5432: 14,083.011c cakāra moghāṃs tān bāṇān ayatnād bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_14_u:5433: 14,083.012a sa moghaṃ tasya bāṇaughaṃ kṛtvā vānaraketanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5434: 14,083.012c śarān mumoca jvalitān dīptāsyān iva pannagān
GE07mbh_14_u:5436: 14,083.013c anyeṣu ca rathāṅgeṣu na śarīre na sārathau
GE07mbh_14_u:5438: 14,083.014c manyamānaḥ svavīryaṃ tan māgadhaḥ prāhiṇoc charān
GE07mbh_14_u:5440: 14,083.015c babhau vāsantika iva palāśaḥ puṣpito mahān
GE07mbh_14_u:5442: 14,083.016c tena tasthau sa kauravya lokavīrasya darśane
GE07mbh_14_u:5443: 14,083.017a savyasācī tu saṃkruddho vikṛṣya balavad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5444: 14,083.017c hayāṃś cakāra nirdehān sāratheś ca śiro 'harat
GE07mbh_14_u:5445: 14,083.018a dhanuś cāsya mahac citraṃ kṣureṇa pracakarta ha
GE07mbh_14_u:5446: 14,083.018c hastāvāpaṃ patākāṃ ca dhvajaṃ cāsya nyapātayat
GE07mbh_14_u:5447: 14,083.019a sa rājā vyathito vyaśvo vidhanur hatasārathiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5458: 14,083.024c bahv etat samare karma tava bālasya pārthiva
GE07mbh_14_u:5459: 14,083.025a yudhiṣṭhirasya saṃdeśo na hantavyā nṛpā iti
GE07mbh_14_u:5460: 14,083.025c tena jīvasi rājaṃs tvam aparāddho 'pi me raṇe
GE07mbh_14_u:5461: 14,083.026a iti matvā sa cātmānaṃ pratyādiṣṭaṃ sma māgadhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5463: 14,083.026d*0157_01 parājito 'smi bhadraṃ te nāhaṃ yoddhum ihotsahe
GE07mbh_14_u:5464: 14,083.026d*0157_02 yac ca kṛtyaṃ mayā te 'dya tad brūhi kṛtam eva tu
GE07mbh_14_u:5465: 14,083.027a tam arjunaḥ samāśvāsya punar evedam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:5466: 14,083.027c āgantavyaṃ parāṃ caitrīm aśvamedhe nṛpasya naḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5467: 14,083.028a ity uktaḥ sa tathety uktvā pūjayām āsa taṃ hayam
GE07mbh_14_u:5468: 14,083.028c phalgunaṃ ca yudhāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vidhivat sahadevajaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5469: 14,083.029a tato yatheṣṭam agamat punar eva sa kesarī
GE07mbh_14_u:5471: 14,083.030a tatra tatra ca bhūrīṇi mlecchasainyāny anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:5475: 14,084.001c dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āsthāya cārayām āsa taṃ hayam

GE07mbh_14_u:6167: 14,093.076c na yajñair vividhair vipra yathānyāyena saṃcitaiḥ

GE07mbh_14_u:6171: 14,093.078c na cāśvamedhair bahubhiḥ phalaṃ samam idaṃ tava
GE07mbh_14_u:6174: 14,093.080a sarveṣāṃ vo dvijaśreṣṭha divyaṃ yānam upasthitam

GE07mbh_14_u:6177: 14,093.081c sabhāryaḥ sahaputraś ca sasnuṣaś ca divaṃ vraja

GE07mbh_14_u:6212: 14,094.003c iha kīrtiṃ parāṃ prāpya pretya svargam ito gatāḥ

GE07mbh_14_u:6222: 14,094.006d*0188_02 karma rājño mahābuddhe dharmaḥ sūkṣmo mahīpate
GE07mbh_14_u:6224: 14,094.007a yajñasya vidhim agryaṃ vai phalaṃ caiva nararṣabha
GE07mbh_14_u:6225: 14,094.007c gadataḥ śṛṇu me rājan yathāvad iha bhārata

GE07mbh_14_u:6234: 14,094.012a tato dīnān paśūn dṛṣṭvā ṛṣayas te tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6235: 14,094.012c ūcuḥ śakraṃ samāgamya nāyaṃ yajñavidhiḥ śubhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6236: 14,094.013a apavijñānam etat te mahāntaṃ dharmam icchataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6237: 14,094.013c na hi yajñe paśugaṇā vidhidṛṣṭāḥ puraṃdara

GE07mbh_14_u:6240: 14,094.015a āgamenaiva te yajñaṃ kurvantu yadi hecchasi

GE07mbh_14_u:6244: 14,094.017a śatakratus tu tad vākyam ṛṣibhis tattvadarśibhiḥ

GE07mbh_14_u:6248: 14,094.019a te tu khinnā vivādena ṛṣayas tattvadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6249: 14,094.019c tataḥ saṃdhāya śakreṇa papracchur nṛpatiṃ vasum

GE07mbh_14_u:6286: 14,094.034c dānadharmāgninā śuddhās te svargaṃ yānti bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:6288: 14,095.001a dharmāgatena tyāgena bhagavan sarvam asti cet
GE07mbh_14_u:6289: 14,095.001c etan me sarvam ācakṣva kuśalo hy asi bhāṣitum
GE07mbh_14_u:6290: 14,095.002a tatoñchavṛtter yad vṛttaṃ saktudāne phalaṃ mahat

GE07mbh_14_u:6292: 14,095.003a kathaṃ hi sarvayajñeṣu niścayaḥ paramo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:6293: 14,095.003c etad arhasi me vaktuṃ nikhilena dvijarṣabha
GE07mbh_14_u:6304: 14,095.008c dame sthitāś ca te sarve dambhamohavivarjitāḥ

GE07mbh_14_u:6308: 14,095.010c tasmin satre tu yat kiṃ cid ayogyaṃ tatra nābhavat

GE07mbh_14_u:6315: 14,095.013c na ca varṣati parjanyaḥ katham annaṃ bhaviṣyati

GE07mbh_14_u:6330: 14,095.019c bījaiḥ kṛtaiḥ kariṣye ca nātra vighno bhaviṣyati

GE07mbh_14_u:6440: 14,096.015d@004_0025 tathā bhāgavatāś caiva tatas taṃ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_14_u:6441: 14,096.015d@004_0026 tattvatas tu bhavān eva pādamūlam upāgatam
GE07mbh_14_u:6442: 14,096.015d@004_0027 yadi jānāsi māṃ bhaktaṃ snigdhaṃ vā bhaktavatsala
GE07mbh_14_u:6444: 14,096.015d@004_0029 dharmān kathaya deveśa yady anugrahabhāg aham
GE07mbh_14_u:6445: 14,096.015d@004_0030 śrutā me mānavā dharmā vāsiṣṭhāḥ kāśyapās tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:6446: 14,096.015d@004_0031 gārgīyā gautamīyāś ca tathā gopālakasya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:6448: 14,096.015d@004_0033 aumā māheśvarāś caiva nandidharmāś ca pāvanāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6449: 14,096.015d@004_0034 brahmaṇā kathitā ye ca kaumārāś ca śrutā mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:6452: 14,096.015d@004_0037 bhāradvājakṛtā ye ca bṛhaspatikṛtāś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:6453: 14,096.015d@004_0038 kuṇeś ca kuṇibāhoś ca viśvāmitrakṛtāś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:6457: 14,096.015d@004_0042 vālakhilyakṛtā ye ca ye ca saptarṣibhiḥ kṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6459: 14,096.015d@004_0044 prājāpatyās tathā yāmyā māhendrāś ca śrutā mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:6460: 14,096.015d@004_0045 vaiyyāghrā vyāsagītāś ca vibhāṇḍakakṛtāś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:6461: 14,096.015d@004_0046 nāradīyāḥ śrutā dharmāḥ kāpotāś ca śrutā mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:6463: 14,096.015d@004_0048 krauñcā mṛdaṅgagītāś ca sauryā hārītakāś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:6468: 14,096.015d@004_0053 pāvanatvāt pavitratvād viśiṣṭā iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6469: 14,096.015d@004_0054 tasmād dhi tvāṃ prapannasya tvadbhaktasya ca bhāvataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6471: 14,096.015d@004_0055 yuṣmadīyān varān dharmān puṇyān kathaya me 'cyuta
GE07mbh_14_u:6472: 14,096.015d@004_0056 evaṃ pṛṣṭas tu dharmajño dharmaputreṇa keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6474: 14,096.015d@004_0058 evaṃ te yasya kaunteya yatno dharmeṣu suvrata
GE07mbh_14_u:6475: 14,096.015d@004_0059 tvatsamo durlabho loke na kaś cid iha vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:6476: 14,096.015d@004_0060 dharmaḥ śruto vā dṛṣṭo vā kathito vā kṛto 'pi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:6477: 14,096.015d@004_0061 anumodito vā rājendra punātīha naraṃ sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:6478: 14,096.015d@004_0062 dharmaḥ pitā ca mātā ca dharmo nāthaḥ suhṛt tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:6479: 14,096.015d@004_0063 dharmo bhrātā sakhā caiva dharmaḥ svāmī paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_14_u:6480: 14,096.015d@004_0064 dharmād arthaś ca kāmaś ca dharmād bhogāḥ sukhāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:6481: 14,096.015d@004_0065 dharmād aiśvaryam evāgryaṃ dharmāt svargagatiḥ parā
GE07mbh_14_u:6482: 14,096.015d@004_0066 dharmo yaḥ sevitaḥ śuddhas trāyate mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_14_u:6483: 14,096.015d@004_0067 dharmād dvijatvaṃ devatvaṃ dharmaḥ prāpayate naram
GE07mbh_14_u:6484: 14,096.015d@004_0068 yadā ca kṣīyate pāpaṃ kālena puruṣasya tu
GE07mbh_14_u:6485: 14,096.015d@004_0069 tadā saṃjāyate buddhir dharmaṃ kartuṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:6487: 14,096.015d@004_0071 tad gatvāpīha yo dharmaṃ na karoti sa vañcitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6488: 14,096.015d@004_0072 kutsitā ye daridrāś ca virūpā vyādhitās tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:6489: 14,096.015d@004_0073 parapreṣyāś ca mūrkhāś ca na tair dharmaḥ kṛtaḥ purā
GE07mbh_14_u:6490: 14,096.015d@004_0074 ye ca dīrghāyuṣaḥ śūrāḥ paṇḍitā bhoginas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:6491: 14,096.015d@004_0075 nīrogā rūpasaṃpannās tair dharmaḥ sukṛtaḥ purā
GE07mbh_14_u:6492: 14,096.015d@004_0076 evaṃ dharmaḥ kṛtaḥ śuddho nayate gatim uttamām
GE07mbh_14_u:6493: 14,096.015d@004_0077 adharmaṃ sevamānas tu tiryag yonyāṃ pataty asau
GE07mbh_14_u:6494: 14,096.015d@004_0078 idaṃ rahasyaṃ kaunteya śṛṇu dharmam anuttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:6495: 14,096.015d@004_0079 kathayiṣye paraṃ dharmaṃ mama bhaktasya pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:6496: 14,096.015d@004_0080 iṣṭas tvam asi me 'tyarthaṃ prapannaś cāpi māṃ sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:6497: 14,096.015d@004_0081 paramārtham api brūmaḥ kiṃ punar dharmasaṃhitām
GE07mbh_14_u:6498: 14,096.015d@004_0082 idaṃ me mānuṣaṃ janma kṛtam ātmani māyayā
GE07mbh_14_u:6500: 14,096.015d@004_0084 mānuṣyaṃ bhāvam āpannaṃ ye māṃ gṛhṇanty avajñayā
GE07mbh_14_u:6501: 14,096.015d@004_0085 saṃsarantīha te mūḍhās tiryag yoniṣv anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6502: 14,096.015d@004_0086 ye ca māṃ sarvabhūtasthaṃ paśyanti jñānacakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_14_u:6503: 14,096.015d@004_0087 madbhaktāṃs tān sadā yuktān matsamīpaṃ nayāmy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:6505: 14,096.015d@004_0089 madbhaktānāṃ tu mānuṣye saphalaṃ janma pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:6509: 14,096.015d@004_0093 bhaktir utpadyate tāta manuṣyāṇāṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6510: 14,096.015d@004_0094 yac ca rūpaṃ paraṃ guhyaṃ kūṭastham acalaṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_14_u:6511: 14,096.015d@004_0095 na dṛśyate tathā devair madbhaktair dṛśyate yathā
GE07mbh_14_u:6512: 14,096.015d@004_0096 aparaṃ yac ca me rūpaṃ prādurbhāveṣu dṛśyate
GE07mbh_14_u:6515: 14,096.015d@004_0099 darśayāmīha tad rūpaṃ tat prapaśyanti me surāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6517: 14,096.015d@004_0101 anugṛhṇāmy ahaṃ taṃ vai saṃsārān mocayāmi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:6518: 14,096.015d@004_0102 aham ādir hi devānāṃ sṛṣṭā brahmādayo mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:6519: 14,096.015d@004_0103 prakṛtiṃ svām avaṣṭabhya jagat sarvaṃ sṛjāmy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:6522: 14,096.015d@004_0106 mūrdhānaṃ me divaṃ viddhi candrādityau ca locane
GE07mbh_14_u:6523: 14,096.015d@004_0107 devāgnir brāhmaṇā vaktraṃ mārutaḥ śvasanaś ca me
GE07mbh_14_u:6524: 14,096.015d@004_0108 diśo me bāhavaś cāṣṭau nakṣatrāṇi ca bhūṣaṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:6526: 14,096.015d@004_0110 mārgo meghānilābhyāṃ tu yan mamodaram avyayam
GE07mbh_14_u:6529: 14,096.015d@004_0113 sthito hy ekaguṇaḥ khe 'haṃ dviguṇaś cāsmi mārute
GE07mbh_14_u:6530: 14,096.015d@004_0114 triguṇo 'gnau sthito 'haṃ vai salile tu caturguṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6531: 14,096.015d@004_0115 śabdādyā ye guṇāḥ pañca mahābhūteṣu pañcasu
GE07mbh_14_u:6537: 14,096.015d@004_0121 acintyo 'ham ananto 'ham ajaro 'ham ajo hy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:6541: 14,096.015d@004_0125 sudhā cāhaṃ svadhā cāhaṃ svāhā cāhaṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_14_u:6546: 14,096.015d@004_0130 saṃhṛtyāhaṃ jagat sarvaṃ kṛtvā vai garbham ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6549: 14,096.015d@004_0133 sthitvā sṛjāmi bhūtāni jaṅgamāni sthirāṇi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:6550: 14,096.015d@004_0134 kalpe kalpe ca bhūtāni saṃharāmi sṛjāmi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:6551: 14,096.015d@004_0135 na ca māṃ tāni jānanti māyayā mohitāni me
GE07mbh_14_u:6554: 14,096.015d@004_0138 na tad asti kva cid rājan yatrāhaṃ na pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6555: 14,096.015d@004_0139 na ca tad vidyate bhūtaṃ mayi yan na pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_14_u:6556: 14,096.015d@004_0140 yāvanmātraṃ bhaved bhūtaṃ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_14_u:6557: 14,096.015d@004_0141 jīvabhūto hy ahaṃ tasmiṃs tāvanmātraṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_14_u:6558: 14,096.015d@004_0142 kiṃ cātra bahunoktena satyam eva bravīmi te
GE07mbh_14_u:6559: 14,096.015d@004_0143 yad bhūtaṃ yad bhaviṣyac ca tat sarvam aham eva tu
GE07mbh_14_u:6560: 14,096.015d@004_0144 mayā sṛṣṭāni bhūtāni manmayāni ca bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:6561: 14,096.015d@004_0145 mām eva na vijānanti māyayā mohitāni me
GE07mbh_14_u:6563: 14,096.015d@004_0147 mattaḥ prabhavate rājan mayy eva pravilīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:6565: 14,096.015d@004_0148 evam ātmodbhavaṃ sarvaṃ jagad uddiśya keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6570: 14,096.015d@004_0152 yaḥ śṛṇoti śucir bhūtvā ekacittas tapoyutaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6571: 14,096.015d@004_0153 svargyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ dharmyaṃ jñeyaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:6574: 14,096.015d@004_0155 vinaśyaty āśu tat sarvaṃ madbhaktasya viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6575: 14,096.015d@004_0156 evaṃ śrutvā vacaḥ puṇyaṃ satyaṃ keśavabhāṣitam
GE07mbh_14_u:6578: 14,096.015d@004_0159 bhūtā yakṣagrahāś caiva guhyakā bhujagās tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:6583: 14,096.015d@004_0164 hṛdi kartuṃ ca tad vākyaṃ praṇemuḥ śirasā natāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6584: 14,096.015d@004_0165 tatas te vāsudevena dṛṣṭāḥ saumyena cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_14_u:6588: 14,096.015d@004_0169 vaiśyasya kīdṛśī deva gatiḥ śūdrasya kīdṛśī
GE07mbh_14_u:6589: 14,096.015d@004_0170 kathaṃ badhyeta pāśena brāhmaṇas tu yamālaye
GE07mbh_14_u:6590: 14,096.015d@004_0171 kṣatriyo vātha vaiśyo vā śūdro vā badhyate katham
GE07mbh_14_u:6592: 14,096.015d@004_0172 etat karmaphalaṃ brūhi lokanātha namo 'stu te
GE07mbh_14_u:6593: 14,096.015d@004_0173 pṛṣṭo 'tha keśavo hy evaṃ dharmaputreṇa dhīmatā
GE07mbh_14_u:6597: 14,096.015d@004_0176 nāsti kiṃ cin naraśreṣṭha duṣkṛtaṃ brāhmaṇasya tu
GE07mbh_14_u:6598: 14,096.015d@004_0177 ye sthitāḥ syuḥ sadādhyātme saṃdhyāṃ ye cāpy upāsate
GE07mbh_14_u:6599: 14,096.015d@004_0178 yaiś ca pūrṇāhutiḥ prāptā vidhivaj juhvate ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:6600: 14,096.015d@004_0179 vaiśvadevaṃ ca ye kuryuḥ pūjayanty atithīṃś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:6601: 14,096.015d@004_0180 nityaṃ svādhyāyaśīlāś ca japayajñaparāś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:6614: 14,096.015d@004_0193 viprebhyaḥ kāmado nityaṃ bhṛtyānāṃ bharaṇe rataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6617: 14,096.015d@004_0196 tatra divyāpsarobhis tu gandharvaiś ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6619: 14,096.015d@004_0198 caturyugāni vai triṃśat krīḍitvā tatra devavat
GE07mbh_14_u:6620: 14,096.015d@004_0199 iha mānuṣaloke tu caturvedī dvijo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:6627: 14,096.015d@004_0206 caturyugāni vai triṃśat krīḍitvā daśa pañca ca
GE07mbh_14_u:6628: 14,096.015d@004_0207 iha mānuṣyaloke ca rājā bhavati vīryavān
GE07mbh_14_u:6629: 14,096.015d@004_0208 suvarṇakoṭyaḥ pañcāśad ratnānāṃ ca śataṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:6632: 14,096.015d@004_0211 viśeṣatas tu viprāṇāṃ dāsavad yas tu tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_14_u:6638: 14,096.015d@004_0217 iha mānuṣaloke tu vaiśyo dhanapatir bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:6639: 14,096.015d@004_0218 evaṃ dharmāt paraṃ nāsti mahat saṃsāramokṣaṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:6640: 14,096.015d@004_0219 na ca dharmāt paraṃ kiṃ cit pāpakarmavyapohanam
GE07mbh_14_u:6641: 14,096.015d@004_0220 tasmād dharmaḥ sadā kāryo mānuṣyaṃ prāpya durlabham
GE07mbh_14_u:6642: 14,096.015d@004_0221 na hi dharmānuraktānāṃ loke kiṃ cin na durlabham
GE07mbh_14_u:6644: 14,096.015d@004_0223 sa tena kṣapayet pāpaṃ samyag ācaritena ca
GE07mbh_14_u:6645: 14,096.015d@004_0224 sahajaṃ yad bhavet karma na tat tyājyaṃ hi kena cit
GE07mbh_14_u:6646: 14,096.015d@004_0225 sa eva tasya dharmo hi tena siddhiṃ sa gacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:6649: 14,096.015d@004_0227 evam eva tu dharmo 'pi kṣīyate pāpavardhanāt
GE07mbh_14_u:6650: 14,096.015d@004_0228 bhagavan devadeveśa śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_14_u:6653: 14,096.015d@004_0230 śṛṇu pārthiva tat sarvaṃ dharmaṃ sūkṣmaṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_14_u:6656: 14,096.015d@004_0233 bhavet tu tatkṣaṇād uṣṇaṃ śītatvaṃ ca vinaśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:6657: 14,096.015d@004_0234 yathoṣṇaṃ vā bhaved alpaṃ śītena bahunāvṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:6658: 14,096.015d@004_0235 śītalaṃ tad bhavet sarvam uṣṇatvaṃ ca vinaśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:6659: 14,096.015d@004_0236 evaṃ tu yad bhaved bhūri sukṛtaṃ vātha duṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:6660: 14,096.015d@004_0237 tad alpaṃ kṣapayec chīghraṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:6662: 14,096.015d@004_0239 gūhitasya bhaved vṛddhiḥ kīrtitasya bhavet kṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6664: 14,096.015d@004_0241 tathā kṛtas tu rājendra dharmo naśyati mānada
GE07mbh_14_u:6665: 14,096.015d@004_0242 tāv ubhau gūhitau samyag vṛddhiṃ yātau na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6666: 14,096.015d@004_0243 tasmāt sarvaprayatnena na pāpaṃ gūhayed budhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6668: 14,096.015d@004_0245 tasmāt saṃkīrtayet pāpaṃ satyaṃ dharmaṃ ca gūhayet
GE07mbh_14_u:6670: 14,096.015d@004_0246 evaṃ śrutvā vacas tasya dharmaputro 'cyutasya tu
GE07mbh_14_u:6672: 14,096.015d@004_0247 papraccha punar apy anyān dharmān dharmātmajo harim
GE07mbh_14_u:6673: 14,096.015d@004_0248 vṛthā ca kati janmāni vṛthā dānāni yāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:6674: 14,096.015d@004_0249 vṛthā ca jīvitaṃ keṣāṃ narāṇāṃ puruṣottama
GE07mbh_14_u:6677: 14,096.015d@004_0252 garbhasthe kiṃ samaśnāti kiṃ bālye vāpi keśava
GE07mbh_14_u:6678: 14,096.015d@004_0253 yauvanasthe 'pi kiṃ kṛṣṇa vārdhake vāpi kiṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:6679: 14,096.015d@004_0254 sāttvikaṃ kīdṛśaṃ dānaṃ rājasaṃ kīdṛśaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:6680: 14,096.015d@004_0255 tāmasaṃ kīdṛśaṃ deva tarpayiṣyati kiṃ prabho
GE07mbh_14_u:6681: 14,096.015d@004_0256 uttamaṃ kīdṛśaṃ dānaṃ madhyamaṃ kīdṛśaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:6682: 14,096.015d@004_0257 adhamaṃ kīdṛśaṃ dānaṃ teṣāṃ vā vada kiṃ phalam
GE07mbh_14_u:6683: 14,096.015d@004_0258 kiṃ dānaṃ nayati hy ūrdhvaṃ kiṃ gatiṃ madhyamāṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:6684: 14,096.015d@004_0259 gatiṃ jaghanyām atha vā devadeva bravīhi me
GE07mbh_14_u:6685: 14,096.015d@004_0260 etad icchāmi vijñātuṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_14_u:6686: 14,096.015d@004_0261 tvadīyaṃ vacanaṃ satyaṃ puṇyaṃ ca madhusūdana
GE07mbh_14_u:6688: 14,096.015d@004_0262 evaṃ dharmaṃ prayatnena pṛṣṭaḥ pāṇḍusutena vai
GE07mbh_14_u:6690: 14,096.015d@004_0264 śṛṇu rājan yathānyāyaṃ vacanaṃ tathyam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:6692: 14,096.015d@004_0266 vṛthā ca daśa janmāni catvāri ca narādhipa
GE07mbh_14_u:6693: 14,096.015d@004_0267 vṛthā dānāni pañcāśat pañcaiva ca yathākramam
GE07mbh_14_u:6694: 14,096.015d@004_0268 vṛthā ca jīvitaṃ yeṣāṃ te ca ṣaṭ parikīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6696: 14,096.015d@004_0270 dharmaghnānāṃ vṛthā janma lubdhānāṃ pāpināṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:6697: 14,096.015d@004_0271 vṛthā pākaṃ ca ye 'śnanti paradāraratāś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:6698: 14,096.015d@004_0272 pākabhedakarā ye ca ye ca syuḥ satyavarjitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6699: 14,096.015d@004_0273 mṛṣṭam aśnāti yaś caiko dṛśyamānas tu bāndhavaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6700: 14,096.015d@004_0274 pitaraṃ mātaraṃ caiva upādhyāyaṃ guruṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:6701: 14,096.015d@004_0275 mātulaṃ mātulānīṃ ca yo nihanyāc chapeta vā
GE07mbh_14_u:6703: 14,096.015d@004_0277 nirbrahmo niḥsvadhaś caiva śūdrāṇām annabhug dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6704: 14,096.015d@004_0278 mama vā śaṃkarasyāpi brahmaṇo vā yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:6705: 14,096.015d@004_0279 atha vā brāhmaṇānāṃ tu ye na bhaktā narādhamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6706: 14,096.015d@004_0280 vṛthā janmāny athaiteṣāṃ pāpināṃ viddhi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:6707: 14,096.015d@004_0281 aśraddhayā ca yad dattam avamānena vāpi yat
GE07mbh_14_u:6708: 14,096.015d@004_0282 ḍambhārtham api yad dattaṃ yat pāṣaṇḍihṛtaṃ nṛpa
