GE07mbh_14_u:6935: 14,096.015d@004_0507 bhūr bhuvaḥ svar iti brahma yo vedaparamaṃ dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6936: 14,096.015d@004_0508 svadāranirato dāntaḥ sa vidvān sa ca bhūsuraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6937: 14,096.015d@004_0509 saṃdhyām upāsate viprā nityam eva dvijottamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6938: 14,096.015d@004_0510 te yānti naraśārdūla brahmalokaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6941: 14,096.015d@004_0513 sāvitrīṃ caiva vedāṃś ca tulayātolayan purā
GE07mbh_14_u:6943: 14,096.015d@004_0515 caturṇām api vedānāṃ sā hi rājan garīyasī
GE07mbh_14_u:6944: 14,096.015d@004_0516 yathā vikasite puṣpe madhu gṛhṇati ṣaṭpadāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6946: 14,096.015d@004_0518 evaṃ gṛhītā sāvitrī sarvavede ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:6947: 14,096.015d@004_0519 tasmāt tu sarvavedānāṃ sāvitrī prāṇa ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:6948: 14,096.015d@004_0520 nirjīvā hītare vedā vinā sāvitriyā nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:6954: 14,096.015d@004_0525 trailokyanātha he kṛṣṇa sarvabhūtātmako hy asi
GE07mbh_14_u:6958: 14,096.015d@004_0528 karoti cen namaskāram upahāraṃ ca kārayet
GE07mbh_14_u:6959: 14,096.015d@004_0529 stauti yaḥ stutibhir māṃ ca ṛgyajuḥsāmabhiḥ sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:6960: 14,096.015d@004_0530 na toṣayati ced viprān nāhaṃ tuṣyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:6961: 14,096.015d@004_0531 brāhmaṇe pūjite nityaṃ pūjito 'smi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6963: 14,096.015d@004_0533 parā mayi gatis teṣāṃ pūjayanti ca māṃ hi te
GE07mbh_14_u:6966: 14,096.015d@004_0536 tam ahaṃ svena rūpeṇa paśyāmi narapuṃgava
GE07mbh_14_u:6967: 14,096.015d@004_0537 kubjāḥ kāṇā vāmanāś ca daridrā vyādhitās tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:6968: 14,096.015d@004_0538 nāvamānyā dvijāḥ prājñair mama rūpā hi te dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6969: 14,096.015d@004_0539 ye ke cit sāgarāntāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ dvijasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6970: 14,096.015d@004_0540 mama rūpaṃ hi teṣv evam arciteṣv arcito 'smy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:6971: 14,096.015d@004_0541 bahavas tu na jānanti narā jñānabahiṣkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6973: 14,096.015d@004_0543 avamanyanti ye viprān svadharmāt pātayanti te
GE07mbh_14_u:6974: 14,096.015d@004_0544 preṣaṇaiḥ preṣayante ca śuśrūṣāṃ kārayanti ca
GE07mbh_14_u:6980: 14,096.015d@004_0550 agnivarṇais tu saṃdaṃśair yamo jihvāṃ samuddharet
GE07mbh_14_u:6981: 14,096.015d@004_0551 ye ca viprān nirīkṣante pāpāḥ pāpena cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_14_u:6982: 14,096.015d@004_0552 abrahmaṇyāḥ śruter bāhyā nityaṃ brahmadviṣo narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6985: 14,096.015d@004_0555 yaḥ prahāraṃ dvijendrāya dadyāt kuryāc ca śoṇitam
GE07mbh_14_u:6986: 14,096.015d@004_0556 asthibhaṅgaṃ ca yaḥ kuryāt prāṇair vā viprayojayet
GE07mbh_14_u:6990: 14,096.015d@004_0560 nāvamucyeta durmedhā na tasya kṣīyate gatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6995: 14,096.015d@004_0565 tasmān nākuśalaṃ brūyān na śuṣkāṃ giram īrayet
GE07mbh_14_u:6996: 14,096.015d@004_0566 na brūyāt paruṣāṃ vāṇīṃ na caivaitān atikramet
GE07mbh_14_u:6997: 14,096.015d@004_0567 ye viprāñ śraddhayā vācā pūjayanti narottamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6998: 14,096.015d@004_0568 arcitaś ca tataś caiva tair bhavāmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:6999: 14,096.015d@004_0569 tarjayanti ca ye viprān krośayanti ca bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:7000: 14,096.015d@004_0570 ākruṣṭas tarjitaś cāhaṃ tair bhavāmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7010: 14,096.015d@004_0579 devadeveśa daityaghna paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_14_u:7011: 14,096.015d@004_0580 etat kathaya sarvajña tvadbhaktasya ca keśava
GE07mbh_14_u:7013: 14,096.015d@004_0582 kīdṛśaṃ kiṃpramāṇaṃ vā kim adhiṣṭhānam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7022: 14,096.015d@004_0591 yamadūtair durādharṣair nīyate vā kathaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7023: 14,096.015d@004_0592 kiṃ vā tatra gatā deva karma kurvanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7025: 14,096.015d@004_0594 kathaṃ vā pāpakarmāṇo yānti pretapuraṃ narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7026: 14,096.015d@004_0595 kiṃ rūpaṃ kiṃ pramāṇaṃ vā varṇaḥ ko vāsya keśava
GE07mbh_14_u:7028: 14,096.015d@004_0596 jīvasya gacchato nityaṃ yamalokaṃ bravīhi me
GE07mbh_14_u:7029: 14,096.015d@004_0597 śṛṇu rājan yathāvṛttaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_14_u:7033: 14,096.015d@004_0601 na tatra vṛkṣacchāyā vā na taṭākaṃ saro 'pi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:7034: 14,096.015d@004_0602 na vāpyo dīrghikā vāpi na kūpo vā yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:7035: 14,096.015d@004_0603 na maṇṭapaṃ sabhā vāpi na prapā na niketanam
GE07mbh_14_u:7036: 14,096.015d@004_0604 na parvato nadī vāpi na bhūmer vivaraṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_14_u:7037: 14,096.015d@004_0605 na grāmo vāśramo vāpi nodyānaṃ vā vanāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7038: 14,096.015d@004_0606 na kiṃ cid āśrayasthānaṃ pathi tasmin yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:7039: 14,096.015d@004_0607 jantor hi prāptakālasya vedanārtasya vai bhṛśam
GE07mbh_14_u:7041: 14,096.015d@004_0609 śarīrāc cālyate jīvo hy avaśo mātariśvanā
GE07mbh_14_u:7042: 14,096.015d@004_0610 nirgato vāyubhūtas tu ṣaṭkośāt tu kalevarāt
GE07mbh_14_u:7044: 14,096.015d@004_0612 adṛśyaṃ tat praviṣṭas tu so 'py adṛṣṭena kena cit
GE07mbh_14_u:7045: 14,096.015d@004_0613 so 'ntarātmā dehavatām aṣṭāṅgo yas tu saṃcaret
GE07mbh_14_u:7046: 14,096.015d@004_0614 chedanād bhedanād dāhāt tāḍanād vā na naśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:7052: 14,096.015d@004_0620 tyaktvā bandhujanaṃ sarvaṃ nirapekṣas tu gacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:7053: 14,096.015d@004_0621 mātṛbhiḥ pitṛbhiś cāpi bhrātṛbhir mātulais tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:7054: 14,096.015d@004_0622 dāraiḥ putrair vayasyaiś ca rudadbhis tyajyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7062: 14,096.015d@004_0630 trāsaṃ janayati prāyaḥ śrūyamāṇaṃ kathāsv api
GE07mbh_14_u:7064: 14,096.015d@004_0632 prāptakālena saṃtyajya bandhūn bhogān dhanāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7065: 14,096.015d@004_0633 jarāyujair aṇḍajaiś ca svedajair udbhijjais tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:7069: 14,096.015d@004_0637 madhyamair yuvabhir vāpi bālair vṛddhais tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7070: 14,096.015d@004_0638 jātamātraiś ca garbhasthair gantavyaḥ sa mahāpathaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7071: 14,096.015d@004_0639 pūrvāhṇe vāparāhṇe vā saṃdhyākāle 'tha vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7072: 14,096.015d@004_0640 pradoṣe vārdharātre vā pratyūṣe vāpy upasthite
GE07mbh_14_u:7074: 14,096.015d@004_0642 kṣetrasthair vā nabhaḥsthair vā gṛhamadhyagatair api
GE07mbh_14_u:7075: 14,096.015d@004_0643 bhuñjadbhir vā pibadbhir vā khādadbhir vā narottama
GE07mbh_14_u:7076: 14,096.015d@004_0644 āsīnair vā sthitair vāpi śayanīyagatair api
GE07mbh_14_u:7077: 14,096.015d@004_0645 jāgradbhir vā prasuptair vā gantavyas tu mahāpathaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7080: 14,096.015d@004_0648 kva cid bhītaiḥ kva cit trastaiḥ praskhaladbhiḥ kva cit kva cit
GE07mbh_14_u:7090: 14,096.015d@004_0658 krandadbhiś ca rudadbhiś ca krośadbhiś cāpi visvanam
GE07mbh_14_u:7091: 14,096.015d@004_0659 vedanārtaiś ca kūjadbhir vikrośadbhiś ca visvaram
GE07mbh_14_u:7097: 14,096.015d@004_0665 śvabhir vyāghrair vṛkaiḥ kākair bhakṣyamāṇāḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7099: 14,096.015d@004_0667 mahiṣaiś ca mṛgaiś cāpi sūkaraiḥ pṛṣatais tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:7103: 14,096.015d@004_0671 visrabdhaṃ svāminaṃ mitraṃ striyaṃ vā ghnanti ye narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7105: 14,096.015d@004_0673 ghātayanti ca ye jīvān duḥkham āpādayanti ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7106: 14,096.015d@004_0674 rākṣasaiś ca śvabhiś caiva bhakṣyamāṇā vrajanti te
GE07mbh_14_u:7107: 14,096.015d@004_0675 ye haranti ca vastrāṇi śayyāḥ prāvaraṇāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7108: 14,096.015d@004_0676 te yānti vidrutā nagnāḥ piśācā iva tatpatham
GE07mbh_14_u:7109: 14,096.015d@004_0677 gāś ca dhānyaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca balāt kṣetragṛhaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:7111: 14,096.015d@004_0679 pāṣāṇair ulmukair daṇḍaiḥ kāṣṭhaghātaiś ca jharjharaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7114: 14,096.015d@004_0682 ākrośantīha vā nityaṃ praharanti ca ye dvijān
GE07mbh_14_u:7119: 14,096.015d@004_0687 tatra cāpi gatāḥ pāpā viṣṭhākūpeṣv anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7121: 14,096.015d@004_0689 tataś ca muktāḥ kālena loke cāsmin narādhamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7130: 14,096.015d@004_0698 mamānnaṃ dīyatāṃ svāmin pānīyaṃ dīyatāṃ mama
GE07mbh_14_u:7132: 14,096.015d@004_0699 iti bruvantas tair dūtair yāpayanti yamālayam
GE07mbh_14_u:7133: 14,096.015d@004_0700 tac chrutvā vacanaṃ viṣṇoḥ papāta bhuvi pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7135: 14,096.015d@004_0702 tato labdhvā śanaiḥ saṃjñāṃ samāśvasto 'cyutena saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7136: 14,096.015d@004_0703 netre prakṣālya toyena bhūyaḥ keśavam abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:7137: 14,096.015d@004_0704 bhīto 'smy ahaṃ mahādeva śrutvā mārgasya vistaram
GE07mbh_14_u:7143: 14,096.015d@004_0709 yam adhvānaṃ tu gacchanti yathāvat taṃ nibodha me
GE07mbh_14_u:7145: 14,096.015d@004_0711 ye prayacchanti vidvadbhyas te sukhaṃ yānti tatpatham
GE07mbh_14_u:7146: 14,096.015d@004_0712 annaṃ ye ca prayacchanti brāhmaṇebhyaḥ susaṃskṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:7148: 14,096.015d@004_0714 te vimānair mahātmāno yānti citrair yamālayam
GE07mbh_14_u:7150: 14,096.015d@004_0716 ye ca nityaṃ prabhāṣante satyaṃ niṣkalmaṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7151: 14,096.015d@004_0717 te 'pi yānty amalābhrābhair vimānais taṃ yamālayam
GE07mbh_14_u:7156: 14,096.015d@004_0722 upānahau ca chattraṃ ca śayanāny āsanāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7157: 14,096.015d@004_0723 viprebhyo ye prayacchanti vastrāṇy ābharaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7158: 14,096.015d@004_0724 te yānty aśvair vṛṣair vāpi kuñjarair apy alaṃkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7160: 14,096.015d@004_0726 ye ca bhakṣyāṇi dāsyanti bhojyaṃ peyaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7161: 14,096.015d@004_0727 snigdhānnāny api viprebhyaḥ śraddhayā parayā yutāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7162: 14,096.015d@004_0728 te yānti kāñcanair yānaiḥ sukhaṃ vaivasvatālayam
GE07mbh_14_u:7164: 14,096.015d@004_0730 ye ca kṣīraṃ prayacchanti ghṛtaṃ dadhi guḍaṃ madhu
GE07mbh_14_u:7168: 14,096.015d@004_0734 ye phalāni prayacchanti puṣpāṇi surabhīṇi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7169: 14,096.015d@004_0735 haṃsayuktair vimānais tu yānti dharmapuraṃ narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7174: 14,096.015d@004_0740 te sutṛptāḥ sukhaṃ yānti vimānair haṃsacoditaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7175: 14,096.015d@004_0741 ye tilāṃs tiladhenuṃ vā ghṛtadhenum athāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:7179: 14,096.015d@004_0745 yeṣāṃ vāpyaś ca kūpāś ca taṭākāni sarāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7180: 14,096.015d@004_0746 dīrghikāḥ puṣkariṇyaś ca sajalāś ca jalāśayāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7191: 14,096.015d@004_0757 śītalaṃ salilaṃ ramyaṃ tṛṣitebhyo diśanti ye
GE07mbh_14_u:7192: 14,096.015d@004_0758 te tu tṛptiṃ parāṃ prāpya sukhaṃ yānti mahāpatham
GE07mbh_14_u:7195: 14,096.015d@004_0761 ārāmān vṛkṣaṣaṇḍāṃś ca ropayanti ca ye narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7198: 14,096.015d@004_0764 yānti te vāhanair divyaiḥ pūjyamānā muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7201: 14,096.015d@004_0767 aśvayānaṃ tu goyānaṃ hastiyānam athāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:7203: 14,096.015d@004_0769 suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ vāpi vidrumaṃ mauktikaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:7204: 14,096.015d@004_0770 ye prayacchanti te yānti vimānaiḥ kāñcanojjvalaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7206: 14,096.015d@004_0772 bhūmidā yānti taṃ lokaṃ sarvakāmaiḥ sutarpitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7208: 14,096.015d@004_0774 kanyāṃ ye ca prayacchanti viprāya śrotriyāya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7213: 14,096.015d@004_0779 yānti dharmapuraṃ yānair vicitrair apy alaṃkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7214: 14,096.015d@004_0780 dīpadā yānti yānaiś ca dyotayanto diśo daśa
GE07mbh_14_u:7221: 14,096.015d@004_0787 ye prayacchanti viprebhyas te yānty aśvair yamālayam
GE07mbh_14_u:7222: 14,096.015d@004_0788 viśrāmayanti ye viprāñ śrāntān adhvani karśitān
GE07mbh_14_u:7224: 14,096.015d@004_0790 svāgatena ca yo viprān pūjayed āsanena ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7227: 14,096.015d@004_0793 vratavat prayato nityaṃ sa sukhaṃ yāti tatpatham
GE07mbh_14_u:7228: 14,096.015d@004_0794 namaḥ sarvasabhābhyaś cety abhikhyāya dine dine
GE07mbh_14_u:7229: 14,096.015d@004_0795 namaskaroti gobhyo yaḥ sa sukhaṃ yāti tatpatham
GE07mbh_14_u:7231: 14,096.015d@004_0797 bhūmim ākramate prātaḥ śayanād utthitaś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7235: 14,096.015d@004_0801 te 'pi sārasayuktena yānti yānena vai sukham
GE07mbh_14_u:7236: 14,096.015d@004_0802 ye cāpy ekena bhuktena vartante ḍambhavarjitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7237: 14,096.015d@004_0803 haṃsayuktair vimānais tu sukhaṃ yānti yamālayam
GE07mbh_14_u:7238: 14,096.015d@004_0804 caturthena ca bhuktena vartante ye jitendriyāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7242: 14,096.015d@004_0808 ṣaṣṭhāhnakāliko yas tu varṣam ekaṃ tu vartate
GE07mbh_14_u:7244: 14,096.015d@004_0810 sa yāti kuñjarasthas tu jayaśabdaravair yutaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7247: 14,096.015d@004_0813 ye ca māsopavāsaṃ vai kurvate saṃyatendriyāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7251: 14,096.015d@004_0817 prāṇāṃs tyajati yo vipro māṃ prapanno hy anāśakaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7253: 14,096.015d@004_0819 praviṣṭo 'ntarjale yas tu prāṇāṃs tyajati mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7255: 14,096.015d@004_0821 svaśarīraṃ hi gṛdhrāṇāṃ manmanā yaḥ prayacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:7257: 14,096.015d@004_0823 gokṛte strīkṛte caiva hatā viprakṛte 'pi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7259: 14,096.015d@004_0825 ye ca kurvanti madbhaktās tīrthayātrāṃ jitendriyāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7260: 14,096.015d@004_0826 te panthānaṃ mahātmāno yānair yānti sunirvṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7263: 14,096.015d@004_0829 parapīḍām akṛtvaiva bhṛtyān bibhrati ye narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7264: 14,096.015d@004_0830 tatpathaṃ te sukhaṃ yānti vimānaiḥ kāñcanojjvalaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7269: 14,096.015d@004_0835 ye mām ekāntabhāvena devaṃ tryambakam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7270: 14,096.015d@004_0836 pūjayanti namasyanti stuvanti ca dine dine
GE07mbh_14_u:7272: 14,096.015d@004_0838 pūjitās tatra dharmeṇa svayaṃ mālyādibhiḥ śubhaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7273: 14,096.015d@004_0839 yānty eva mama lokaṃ vā rudralokam athāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:7281: 14,096.015d@004_0846 dānaṃ deyaṃ kathaṃ kṛṣṇa kīdṛśāya dvijāya vai
GE07mbh_14_u:7282: 14,096.015d@004_0847 kīdṛśaṃ vā tapaḥ kṛtvā tatphalaṃ kutra bhujyate
GE07mbh_14_u:7287: 14,096.015d@004_0852 yac chrutvā puruṣaḥ strī vā naṣṭapāpaḥ samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7289: 14,096.015d@004_0854 ekāham api kaunteya bhūmāv utpāditaṃ jalam
GE07mbh_14_u:7290: 14,096.015d@004_0855 sapta tārayate pūrvān vitṛṣṇā yatra gaur bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:7291: 14,096.015d@004_0856 pānīyaṃ paramaṃ loke jīvānāṃ jīvanaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:7298: 14,096.015d@004_0863 ye cāpy atoyadātāraḥ pūyas teṣāṃ vidhīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:7301: 14,096.015d@004_0866 tasmāt toyaṃ sadā deyaṃ tṛṣitebhyo vijānatā
GE07mbh_14_u:7302: 14,096.015d@004_0867 agner mūrtiḥ kṣiter yonir amṛtasya ca saṃbhavaḥ

GE07mbh_14_u:7317: 14,096.015d@004_0882 annaṃ prajāpate rūpam annaṃ prajananaṃ smṛtam

GE07mbh_14_u:7324: 14,096.015d@004_0889 annād bhavanti rājendra sṛṣṭir eṣā prajāpateḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7326: 14,096.015d@004_0891 annād yasmāt pravartante tasmād annaṃ paraṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:7327: 14,096.015d@004_0892 devā rudrādayaḥ sarve pitaro 'py agnayas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:7328: 14,096.015d@004_0893 yasmād annena tuṣyanti tasmād annaṃ viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:7329: 14,096.015d@004_0894 yasmād annāt prajāḥ sarvāḥ kalpe kalpe 'sṛjat prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7330: 14,096.015d@004_0895 tasmād annāt paraṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:7331: 14,096.015d@004_0896 yasmād annāt pravartante dharmārthau kāma eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7332: 14,096.015d@004_0897 tasmād annāt paraṃ dānaṃ nāmutreha ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:7333: 14,096.015d@004_0898 yakṣarakṣograhā nāgā bhūtā daityāś ca dānavāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7334: 14,096.015d@004_0899 tuṣyanty annena yasmāt tu tasmād annaṃ paraṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:7335: 14,096.015d@004_0900 parānnam upabhuñjāno yat karma kurute śubham
GE07mbh_14_u:7345: 14,096.015d@004_0910 tataś cāpi cyutaḥ kālān naraloke dvijo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:7346: 14,096.015d@004_0911 agrabhikṣāṃ ca yo dadyād daridrāya dvijātaye
GE07mbh_14_u:7347: 14,096.015d@004_0912 ṣaṇmāsād vārṣikaṃ śrāddhaṃ tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:7349: 14,096.015d@004_0914 tat puṇyaphalam āpnoti naro vai nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7351: 14,096.015d@004_0916 pracchādyaiva svayaṃ nītvā tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:7352: 14,096.015d@004_0917 kapilānāṃ sahasrais tu yad deyaṃ puṇyam ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:7353: 14,096.015d@004_0918 tat sarvam akhilaṃ prāpya śakraloke mahīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:7356: 14,096.015d@004_0921 agrānnaṃ yas tu vai dadyād dvijāya niyatavrataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7366: 14,096.015d@004_0931 yācate 'nnaṃ na dadyād yo vidyamāne dhanāgame
GE07mbh_14_u:7367: 14,096.015d@004_0932 sa lubdho narakaṃ yāti kṛmīṇāṃ kālasūtrakam
GE07mbh_14_u:7370: 14,096.015d@004_0935 tasmāc ca narakān muktaḥ kālena mahatā hi saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7371: 14,096.015d@004_0936 daridro mānuṣo loke caṇḍāleṣv api jāyate
GE07mbh_14_u:7374: 14,096.015d@004_0939 pṛcchan vai hy annadātāraṃ gṛham abhyetya yācayet
GE07mbh_14_u:7375: 14,096.015d@004_0940 taṃ pūjayet tu yatnena so 'tithiḥ svargasaṃkramaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7376: 14,096.015d@004_0941 tasmiṃs tuṣṭe naraśreṣṭha tuṣṭāḥ syuḥ sarvadevatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7377: 14,096.015d@004_0942 na tathā haviṣā homair na puṣpair nānulepanaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7378: 14,096.015d@004_0943 agnayaḥ pārtha tuṣyanti yathā hy atithipūjanāt
GE07mbh_14_u:7380: 14,096.015d@004_0945 na tat phalam avāpnoti yat phalaṃ viprabhojanāt
GE07mbh_14_u:7388: 14,096.015d@004_0953 ye prayacchanti viprebhyo nopasarpanti te yamam
GE07mbh_14_u:7389: 14,096.015d@004_0954 viprātithye kṛte rājan bhaktyā śuśrūṣite 'pi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7390: 14,096.015d@004_0955 devāḥ śuśrūṣitāḥ sarve trayastriṃśad bhavanti te
GE07mbh_14_u:7392: 14,096.015d@004_0957 tayoḥ pūjāṃ dvijaḥ kuryād iti paurāṇikī śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7394: 14,096.015d@004_0959 pūjitas tena rājendra bhavāmīha na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7402: 14,096.015d@004_0967 pitaras tasya nāśnanti daśa varṣāṇi pañca ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7403: 14,096.015d@004_0968 varjitaḥ pitṛbhir lubdhaḥ sa devair agnibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_14_u:7404: 14,096.015d@004_0969 nirayaṃ rauravaṃ gatvā daśa varṣāṇi pacyate
GE07mbh_14_u:7405: 14,096.015d@004_0970 tataś cāpi cyutaḥ kālād iha cocchiṣṭabhug bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:7406: 14,096.015d@004_0971 vaiśvadevāntike prāptam atithiṃ yo na pūjayet
GE07mbh_14_u:7407: 14,096.015d@004_0972 sa caṇḍālatvam āpnoti sadya eva na saṃśayaḥ

GE07mbh_14_u:7410: 14,096.015d@004_0975 narake raurave ghore varṣakoṭiṃ sa pacyate

GE07mbh_14_u:7417: 14,096.015d@004_0982 nirāśam atithiṃ kṛtvā bhuñjāno yaḥ prahṛṣṭavān
GE07mbh_14_u:7419: 14,096.015d@004_0984 moghaṃ dhruvaṃ prorṇayati mogham asya tu pacyate
GE07mbh_14_u:7420: 14,096.015d@004_0985 mogham annaṃ sadāśnāti yo 'tithiṃ na ca pūjayet
GE07mbh_14_u:7421: 14,096.015d@004_0986 sāṅgopāṅgāṃs tu yo vedān paṭhatīha dine dine
GE07mbh_14_u:7422: 14,096.015d@004_0987 na cātithiṃ pūjayati vṛthā bhavati sa dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7424: 14,096.015d@004_0989 ye yajanti na cārcanti gṛheṣv atithim āgatam
GE07mbh_14_u:7425: 14,096.015d@004_0990 teṣāṃ yaśobhikāmānāṃ dattam iṣṭaṃ ca yad bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:7426: 14,096.015d@004_0991 vṛthā bhavati tat sarvam āśayā hi tayā hatam
GE07mbh_14_u:7427: 14,096.015d@004_0992 deśakālaṃ ca pātraṃ ca svaśaktiṃ ca nirīkṣya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7428: 14,096.015d@004_0993 alpaṃ samaṃ mahad vāpi kuryād ātithyam ātmavān
GE07mbh_14_u:7431: 14,096.015d@004_0996 hitaḥ priyo vā dveṣyo vā mūrkhaḥ paṇḍita eva vā
GE07mbh_14_u:7436: 14,096.015d@004_1001 annaṃ prāṇo manuṣyāṇām annadaḥ prāṇado bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:7437: 14,096.015d@004_1002 tasmād annaṃ viśeṣeṇa dātavyaṃ bhūtim icchatā
GE07mbh_14_u:7438: 14,096.015d@004_1003 annadaḥ sarvakāmais tu sutṛptaḥ suṣṭhv alaṃkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7440: 14,096.015d@004_1005 sevyamāno varastrībhir mama lokaṃ sa gacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:7441: 14,096.015d@004_1006 krīḍitvā tu tatas tasmin varṣakoṭiṃ yathāmaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7442: 14,096.015d@004_1007 tataś cāpi cyutaḥ kālād iha loke mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7444: 14,096.015d@004_1009 yathāśraddhaṃ tu yaḥ kuryān manuṣyeṣu prajāyate
GE07mbh_14_u:7447: 14,096.015d@004_1012 sarvātithyaṃ tu yaḥ kuryād varṣam ekam akalmaṣaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7449: 14,096.015d@004_1014 devān iva svayaṃ viprān arcayitvā pitṝn api
GE07mbh_14_u:7451: 14,096.015d@004_1016 varṣeṇaikena yāvanti piṇḍān aśnanti vai dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7452: 14,096.015d@004_1017 tāvad varṣāṇi rājendra mama loke mahīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:7453: 14,096.015d@004_1018 tataś cāpi cyutaḥ kālād iha loke mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7455: 14,096.015d@004_1020 sarvātithyaṃ ca yaḥ kuryād yathāśraddhaṃ nareśvara
GE07mbh_14_u:7468: 14,096.015d@004_1032 yaḥ prayacchati viprāya bhūmiṃ ramyāṃ sadakṣiṇām
GE07mbh_14_u:7473: 14,096.015d@004_1037 yāti yānena divyena mama lokaṃ mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7475: 14,096.015d@004_1039 kāmagaḥ kāmarūpī ca krīḍaty apsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7476: 14,096.015d@004_1040 yāvad bibharti lokān vai bhūmiḥ kurukulodvaha
GE07mbh_14_u:7477: 14,096.015d@004_1041 tāvad bhūmipradaḥ kāmaṃ mama loke mahīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:7478: 14,096.015d@004_1042 na hi bhūmipradānād vai dānam anyad viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:7479: 14,096.015d@004_1043 na cāpi bhūmiharaṇāt pāpam anyad viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:7482: 14,096.015d@004_1046 brāhmaṇāya daridrāya bhūmiṃ dattāṃ tu yo naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7483: 14,096.015d@004_1047 na hiṃsati naravyāghra tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:7485: 14,096.015d@004_1049 sa śailavanadurgāḍhyā tena dattā mahī bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:7489: 14,096.015d@004_1053 sarvadānāni vai rājan dadāti vasudhāṃ dadan

GE07mbh_14_u:7501: 14,096.015d@004_1065 sasyapūrṇāṃ mahīṃ yas tu śrotriyāya prayacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:7503: 14,096.015d@004_1067 mama rudrasya savitus tridaśānāṃ tathaiva ca

GE07mbh_14_u:7506: 14,096.015d@004_1070 mama sālokyam āyāti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:7507: 14,096.015d@004_1071 yat kiṃ cit kurute pāpaṃ puruṣo vṛttikarśitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7509: 14,096.015d@004_1073 māsopavāse yat puṇyaṃ kṛcchre cāndrāyaṇe 'pi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7516: 14,096.015d@004_1078 gokarṇasya pramāṇaṃ vai vaktum arhasi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7519: 14,096.015d@004_1081 pratyak prāg api rājendra tat tathā dakṣiṇottaram
GE07mbh_14_u:7520: 14,096.015d@004_1082 gokarṇaṃ tadvidaḥ prāhuḥ pramāṇaṃ dharaṇer nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:7521: 14,096.015d@004_1083 savṛṣaṃ gośataṃ yatra sukhaṃ tiṣṭhaty ayantritam
GE07mbh_14_u:7522: 14,096.015d@004_1084 savatsaṃ kuruśārdūla tac ca gokarṇam ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:7523: 14,096.015d@004_1085 kiṃkarā mṛtyudaṇḍāś ca kumbhīpākāś ca dāruṇāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7524: 14,096.015d@004_1086 ghorāś ca vāruṇāḥ pāśā nopasarpanti bhūmidam
GE07mbh_14_u:7525: 14,096.015d@004_1087 nirayā rauravādyāś ca tathā vaitaraṇī nadī
GE07mbh_14_u:7526: 14,096.015d@004_1088 tīvrāś ca yātanāḥ kaṣṭā nopasarpanti bhūmidam
GE07mbh_14_u:7527: 14,096.015d@004_1089 citraguptaḥ kaliḥ kālaḥ kṛtānto mṛtyur eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7528: 14,096.015d@004_1090 yamaś ca bhagavān sākṣāt pūjayanti mahīpradam

GE07mbh_14_u:7530: 14,096.015d@004_1092 ahaṃ ca prītimān rājan pūjayāmo mahīpradam
GE07mbh_14_u:7532: 14,096.015d@004_1094 bhūmir deyā naraśreṣṭha sa nidhiḥ pāralaukikaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7535: 14,096.015d@004_1097 yathā hi dhātrī kṣīreṇa putraṃ vardhayati svayam
GE07mbh_14_u:7536: 14,096.015d@004_1098 dātāram anugṛhṇāti dattā hy evaṃ vasuṃdharā
GE07mbh_14_u:7537: 14,096.015d@004_1099 yathā bibharti gaur vatsaṃ sṛjantī kṣīram ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7540: 14,096.015d@004_1102 tathā kāmāḥ prarohanti bhūmidasya dine dine
GE07mbh_14_u:7541: 14,096.015d@004_1103 yathodayas tu sūryasya tamaḥ sarvaṃ vyapohati
GE07mbh_14_u:7543: 14,096.015d@004_1105 dātā daśānugṛhṇāti yo hared daśa hanti ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7545: 14,096.015d@004_1107 āśrutya bhūmidānaṃ tu dattvā yo vā haret punaḥ

GE07mbh_14_u:7547: 14,096.015d@004_1109 svadattāṃ paradattāṃ vā yo hareta vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_14_u:7548: 14,096.015d@004_1110 na tasya narakād ghorād vidyate niṣkṛtiḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_14_u:7549: 14,096.015d@004_1111 brāhmaṇasya hate kṣetre hanyād dvādaśa pūrvajān
GE07mbh_14_u:7550: 14,096.015d@004_1112 sa gacchet kṛmiyoniṃ ca na ca mucyeta jātu saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7551: 14,096.015d@004_1113 dattvā bhūmiṃ dvijendrāya yas tām evopajīvati
GE07mbh_14_u:7552: 14,096.015d@004_1114 gavāṃ śatasahasrasya hantuḥ sa labhate phalam

GE07mbh_14_u:7556: 14,096.015d@004_1118 dattvā bhūmiṃ dvijendrāṇāṃ yas tām evopajīvati
GE07mbh_14_u:7557: 14,096.015d@004_1119 sa mūḍho yāti duṣṭātmā narakān ekaviṃśatim
GE07mbh_14_u:7558: 14,096.015d@004_1120 narakebhyo vinirmuktaḥ śunāṃ yoniṃ sa gacchati

GE07mbh_14_u:7562: 14,096.015d@004_1124 sarvān kāmān avāpnoti manasā cintitāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7563: 14,096.015d@004_1125 bahubhir vasudhā dattā dīyate ca narādhipaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7564: 14,096.015d@004_1126 yasya yasya yadā bhūmis tasya tasya tadā phalam
GE07mbh_14_u:7565: 14,096.015d@004_1127 yaḥ prayacchati kanyāṃ vai surūpāṃ śrotriyāya vai
GE07mbh_14_u:7566: 14,096.015d@004_1128 sa brahmadevo rājendra tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:7568: 14,096.015d@004_1130 yat phalaṃ labhate rājan kanyādānena tat phalam
GE07mbh_14_u:7569: 14,096.015d@004_1131 gavāṃ śatasahasrasya samyag dattasya yat phalam
GE07mbh_14_u:7570: 14,096.015d@004_1132 tat phalaṃ samavāpnoti yaḥ prayacchati kanyakām
GE07mbh_14_u:7573: 14,096.015d@004_1135 tataś cāpi cyutaḥ kālād iha loke sa jāyate
GE07mbh_14_u:7580: 14,096.015d@004_1142 tataḥ kālāvatīrṇaś ca sosmiṃl loke hi jāyate
GE07mbh_14_u:7582: 14,096.015d@004_1144 yaś ca rūpyaṃ prayacched vai daridrāya dvijāya vai
GE07mbh_14_u:7589: 14,096.015d@004_1151 viśeṣeṇa daridrāya tasyāpi śṛṇu yat phalam
GE07mbh_14_u:7591: 14,096.015d@004_1153 tat puṇyaṃ samanuprāpya tatkṣaṇād virajo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:7592: 14,096.015d@004_1154 yathā tvaco bhujaṅgo vai tyaktvā śuddhatanur bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:7593: 14,096.015d@004_1155 tathā tilapradānād vai pāpaṃ tyaktvā viśudhyati
GE07mbh_14_u:7599: 14,096.015d@004_1161 śrotriyāya daridrāya śṛṇu tasyāpi yat phalam
GE07mbh_14_u:7602: 14,096.015d@004_1164 tilānāṃ kuḍavair yas tu tiladhenuṃ prayacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:7606: 14,096.015d@004_1168 madbhaktyā madgatātmā vai tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:7608: 14,096.015d@004_1170 tat puṇyaṃ samanuprāpto mama loke mahīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:7611: 14,096.015d@004_1173 gāṃ tu yas tu daridrāya śrotriyāya prayacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:7613: 14,096.015d@004_1175 yat kiṃ cid duṣkṛtaṃ karma tasya pūrvakṛtaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:7614: 14,096.015d@004_1176 tat sarvaṃ tatkṣaṇād eva vinaśyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7617: 14,096.015d@004_1179 yāvanti caiva romāṇi tasyā gos tu narādhipa
GE07mbh_14_u:7619: 14,096.015d@004_1181 golokād avatīrṇas tu loke 'smin brāhmaṇo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:7621: 14,096.015d@004_1183 tilaṃ gāvaḥ suvarṇaṃ cāpy annaṃ kanyā vasuṃdharā
GE07mbh_14_u:7624: 14,096.015d@004_1186 tarpayed vidhivad rājan sa nidhiḥ pāralaukikaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7625: 14,096.015d@004_1187 āhitāgniṃ daridraṃ ca śrotriyaṃ ca jitendriyam
GE07mbh_14_u:7627: 14,096.015d@004_1189 āhitāgniḥ sadā pātram agnihotraś ca vedavit
GE07mbh_14_u:7628: 14,096.015d@004_1190 pātrāṇām api tat pātraṃ śūdrānnaṃ yasya nodare
GE07mbh_14_u:7629: 14,096.015d@004_1191 yac ca vedamayaṃ pātraṃ yac ca pātraṃ tapomayam
GE07mbh_14_u:7630: 14,096.015d@004_1192 asaṃkīrṇaṃ ca yat pātraṃ tat pātraṃ tārayiṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:7631: 14,096.015d@004_1193 nityaṃ svādhyāyaniratās tv aprakīrṇendriyāś ca ye
GE07mbh_14_u:7641: 14,096.015d@004_1203 brāhmaṇo yas tu madbhakto madyājī matparāyaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7642: 14,096.015d@004_1204 mayi saṃnyastakarmā ca sa vipras tārayed dhruvam
GE07mbh_14_u:7647: 14,096.015d@004_1208 avitṛptas tu dharmeṣu keśavaṃ punar abravīt
GE07mbh_14_u:7649: 14,096.015d@004_1210 na vidyate suraśreṣṭha mama tṛptir hi mādhava
GE07mbh_14_u:7651: 14,096.015d@004_1212 tat phalaṃ kathayasveha tava bhaktasya me 'cyuta
GE07mbh_14_u:7652: 14,096.015d@004_1213 yāni cānyāni dānāni tvayā noktāni kāni cit
GE07mbh_14_u:7653: 14,096.015d@004_1214 tāny ācakṣva suraśreṣṭha teṣāṃ cānukramāt phalam
GE07mbh_14_u:7660: 14,096.015d@004_1220 dhuraṃ dhārayate kṣipraṃ datto viprāya pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:7663: 14,096.015d@004_1223 yaś ca dadyād anaḍuhau dvau yuktau ca dhuraṃdharau
GE07mbh_14_u:7665: 14,096.015d@004_1225 tasya yat puṇyam ākhyātaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:7667: 14,096.015d@004_1227 tat puṇyaphalam āpnoti yāti lokān sa māmakān
GE07mbh_14_u:7668: 14,096.015d@004_1228 yāvanti caiva romāṇi tayor anaḍuhor nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:7671: 14,096.015d@004_1231 varṣāṇāṃ hi taṭākeṣu phalaṃ naiva payodhiṣu
GE07mbh_14_u:7672: 14,096.015d@004_1232 yas tu dadyād anaḍuhaṃ daridrāya dvijātaye
GE07mbh_14_u:7680: 14,096.015d@004_1240 dadyāt sadakṣiṇaṃ yas tu tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:7681: 14,096.015d@004_1241 devāḥ pitṛgaṇāś caiva agnayo ṛṣayas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:7683: 14,096.015d@004_1243 tena gacchec chriyā yukto brahmalokam anuttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:7690: 14,096.015d@004_1250 tat puṇyaṃ tam anuprāpya pitṛloke mahīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:7692: 14,096.015d@004_1252 yaḥ prayacchati viprāya tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:7694: 14,096.015d@004_1254 tat puṇyaphalam āpnoti yas tu vidyāṃ prayacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:7697: 14,096.015d@004_1257 caturyugāni vai triṃśat krīḍitvā tatra devavat
GE07mbh_14_u:7698: 14,096.015d@004_1258 iha mānuṣyake loke vipro bhavati vedavit
GE07mbh_14_u:7699: 14,096.015d@004_1259 viśrāmayati yo vipraṃ śrāntam adhvani karśitam
GE07mbh_14_u:7700: 14,096.015d@004_1260 vinaśyati tadā pāpaṃ tasya varṣakṛtaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:7701: 14,096.015d@004_1261 atha prakṣālayet pādau tasya toyena bhaktimān
GE07mbh_14_u:7703: 14,096.015d@004_1263 ghṛtena vātha tailena pādau tasya tu pūjayet
GE07mbh_14_u:7706: 14,096.015d@004_1266 tat puṇyaphalam āpnoti yas tv evaṃ vipram arcayet
GE07mbh_14_u:7707: 14,096.015d@004_1267 svāgatena ca yo vipraṃ pūjayed āsanena ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7708: 14,096.015d@004_1268 pratyutthānena vā rājan sa devānāṃ priyo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:7720: 14,096.015d@004_1280 iha rājā bhaved rājan nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:7728: 14,096.015d@004_1288 dadāti cepsitaṃ sarvaṃ manasā yad yad icchati
GE07mbh_14_u:7729: 14,096.015d@004_1289 yāvanti tasya patrāṇi puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7733: 14,096.015d@004_1293 sthāpayitvā tu madbhaktyā yo matpratikṛtiṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7734: 14,096.015d@004_1294 ālayaṃ vidhivat kṛtvā pūjākarma ca kārayet
GE07mbh_14_u:7735: 14,096.015d@004_1295 svayaṃ vā pūjayed bhaktyā tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:7738: 14,096.015d@004_1298 na jāne nirgamaṃ tasya mama lokād yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:7740: 14,096.015d@004_1300 prajvālayati yo dīpaṃ tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:7746: 14,096.015d@004_1306 catvare vā catuṣke vā rātrau vā yadi vā divā
GE07mbh_14_u:7749: 14,096.015d@004_1309 tasya devā naraśreṣṭha pitaraś cāpi harṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7751: 14,096.015d@004_1311 sa ca tena vimānena yāti devapuraṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7755: 14,096.015d@004_1315 catvare vā sabhāyāṃ vā vistīrṇe vā sabhāṅgaṇe
GE07mbh_14_u:7757: 14,096.015d@004_1317 tatrāgniṃ caturo māsāñ jvalayed yas tu bhaktimān
GE07mbh_14_u:7758: 14,096.015d@004_1318 samāpteṣu ca māseṣu pauṣyādiṣu tato dvijān
GE07mbh_14_u:7761: 14,096.015d@004_1321 evam agniṃ tu yaḥ kuryān nityam evārcayaṃs tu mām
GE07mbh_14_u:7762: 14,096.015d@004_1322 tasya puṇyaphalaṃ yad vai tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:7763: 14,096.015d@004_1323 tenāhaṃ śaṃkaraś caiva pitaro hy agnayas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:7764: 14,096.015d@004_1324 yāsyāmaḥ paramāṃ prītiṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:7766: 14,096.015d@004_1326 so 'smat prītikaraḥ śrīmān mama loke mahīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:7767: 14,096.015d@004_1327 mama lokāvatīrṇaś ca so 'smiṃl loke mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7769: 14,096.015d@004_1329 yaḥ karoti naraśreṣṭha bharaṇaṃ brāhmaṇasya tu
GE07mbh_14_u:7771: 14,096.015d@004_1331 tasya puṇyaphalaṃ yad vai tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:7777: 14,096.015d@004_1337 krīḍitvā māmake loke tatra devair abhiṣṭutaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7778: 14,096.015d@004_1338 mānuṣyam avatīrṇas tu vedavid brāhmaṇo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:7779: 14,096.015d@004_1339 karakaṃ kuṇḍikāṃ vāpi mahad vā jalabhājanam
GE07mbh_14_u:7780: 14,096.015d@004_1340 yaḥ prayacchati viprāya tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:7781: 14,096.015d@004_1341 brahmakūrcena yat pīte phalaṃ proktaṃ yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_14_u:7786: 14,096.015d@004_1346 pānīyaṃ yaḥ prayacched vai jīvānāṃ jīvanaṃ param
GE07mbh_14_u:7787: 14,096.015d@004_1347 grīṣmakeṣu ca māseṣu tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:7793: 14,096.015d@004_1353 krīḍitvā mānuṣe loke caturvedī dvijo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:7795: 14,096.015d@004_1355 subhago rūpavāñ śūraḥ paṇḍitaś ca bhaved dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7798: 14,096.015d@004_1358 upānahau ca chattraṃ ca yo dadāti narottamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7805: 14,096.015d@004_1365 kṣīraṃ dadhi ghṛtaṃ vāpi guḍaṃ madhurasaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:7806: 14,096.015d@004_1366 ye prayacchanti viprebhyaḥ parāṃ bhaktiṃ gatā narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7811: 14,096.015d@004_1371 tataḥ kālāvatīrṇāś ca jāyante tv iha mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7816: 14,096.015d@004_1376 ye prayacchanti viprebhyas teṣāṃ puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:7819: 14,096.015d@004_1379 tataś cāpi cyutaḥ kālād iha rājā bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_14_u:7820: 14,096.015d@004_1380 tasminn eva dine viprān bhojayitvā sadakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:7824: 14,096.015d@004_1384 tato 'vatīrṇāḥ kālena te cāsmin mānuṣe punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7826: 14,096.015d@004_1386 anantarāśī yaś cāpi vartate vratavat sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:7828: 14,096.015d@004_1388 sa vimānena divyena yāti śakrapuraṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7830: 14,096.015d@004_1390 krīḍitvā mānuṣe loke jāyate vedavid dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7831: 14,096.015d@004_1391 ekabhuktena yaś cāpi varṣam ekaṃ tu vartate
GE07mbh_14_u:7833: 14,096.015d@004_1393 sa vimānena divyena yāti śakrapuraṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7835: 14,096.015d@004_1395 iha mānuṣyake loke brāhmaṇo vedavid bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:7837: 14,096.015d@004_1397 vartate caikavarṣaṃ tu tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:7839: 14,096.015d@004_1399 yāti yānena divyena sa mahendrapuraṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7841: 14,096.015d@004_1401 tato dvādaśakoṭiṃ sa samāḥ samyak pramodate
GE07mbh_14_u:7843: 14,096.015d@004_1403 bhaved vai brāhmaṇo vidvān kṣamāvān vedapāragaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7844: 14,096.015d@004_1404 ṣaṣṭhakāle tu yo 'śnāti varṣam ekam akalmaṣaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7848: 14,096.015d@004_1408 sa yāti mama lokān vai divyanārīniṣevitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7849: 14,096.015d@004_1409 tatra sādhyair marudbhiś ca pūjyamāno yathāsukham
GE07mbh_14_u:7850: 14,096.015d@004_1410 paśyann eva sadā māṃ tu krīḍaty apsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7852: 14,096.015d@004_1412 samāpte tu vrate tasmiṃs tarpayec chrotriyān dvijān
GE07mbh_14_u:7854: 14,096.015d@004_1414 dyotayan prabhayā vyoma mama lokaṃ prapadyate
GE07mbh_14_u:7855: 14,096.015d@004_1415 sa tatra modate kāmaṃ kāmarūpī yathāsukham
GE07mbh_14_u:7857: 14,096.015d@004_1417 iha mānuṣyake loke pūjanīyo dvijo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:7858: 14,096.015d@004_1418 trayāṇām api vedānāṃ sāṅgānāṃ pārago bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:7859: 14,096.015d@004_1419 yaś ca māsopavāsaṃ vai kurute madgatātmanā
GE07mbh_14_u:7867: 14,096.015d@004_1427 tataḥ kālāvatīrṇaś ca so 'smiṃl loke dvijo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:7881: 14,096.015d@004_1441 sa vimānena divyena yāti lokān anāmayān
GE07mbh_14_u:7882: 14,096.015d@004_1442 svargāt svargaṃ mahātejā gatvā caiva yathāsukham
GE07mbh_14_u:7885: 14,096.015d@004_1445 so 'pi yānena divyena mama lokaṃ prapadyate
GE07mbh_14_u:7886: 14,096.015d@004_1446 tataḥ sarvaguṇopetaḥ paśyann api sa māṃ sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:7889: 14,096.015d@004_1449 karṣaṇaṃ sādhayan yas tu māṃ prasannaḥ śucivrataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7892: 14,096.015d@004_1452 mama lokaṃ samāsādya ṣaṭkoṭiṃ tu pramodate
GE07mbh_14_u:7893: 14,096.015d@004_1453 mama lokāvatīrṇaś ca so 'smiṃl loke nṛpo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:7896: 14,096.015d@004_1456 siddhair brahmarṣibhiś caiva devalokaiś ca pūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7898: 14,096.015d@004_1458 praviśet sa mahātejā māṃ vā śaṃkaram eva vā
GE07mbh_14_u:7901: 14,096.015d@004_1461 hanyante ye tu rājendra śakralokaṃ vrajanti te
GE07mbh_14_u:7905: 14,096.015d@004_1465 janmaprabhṛti yad dattaṃ sarvaṃ naśyati bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:7909: 14,096.015d@004_1469 tāṃs tān kāmān svargaloke ca bhuṅkte
GE07mbh_14_u:7910: 14,096.015d@004_1470 yad yad iṣṭatamaṃ dravyaṃ nyāyenopārjitaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_14_u:7911: 14,096.015d@004_1471 tat tad guṇavate deyaṃ tad evākṣayam icchatā
GE07mbh_14_u:7913: 14,096.015d@004_1473 adattvā kāñcanaṃ gāṃ ca daridro nāma jāyate
GE07mbh_14_u:7914: 14,096.015d@004_1474 dānaṃ yat tat phalaṃ naiti śrotriyāya na dīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:7915: 14,096.015d@004_1475 śrotriyā yatra nāśnanti na devās tatra bhuñjate
GE07mbh_14_u:7916: 14,096.015d@004_1476 śrotriyebhyaḥ paraṃ nāsti paramaṃ daivataṃ mahat
GE07mbh_14_u:7923: 14,096.015d@004_1481 na tu sarvasya bhūtasya pañcatvaṃ vāpi vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:7925: 14,096.015d@004_1483 teṣāṃ pañca mahāyajñān ye kurvanti dvijottamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7927: 14,096.015d@004_1485 na jāyate na mriyate puruṣaḥ śāśvataḥ sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:7928: 14,096.015d@004_1486 prāyeṇa maraṇaṃ nāma pāpinām eva pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:7929: 14,096.015d@004_1487 yeṣāṃ tu na gatiḥ puṇyā teṣāṃ maraṇam ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:7933: 14,096.015d@004_1490 pañca yajñāḥ kathaṃ deva kriyante 'tra dvijātibhiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7935: 14,096.015d@004_1491 teṣāṃ nāma ca deveśa vaktum arhasy aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7939: 14,096.015d@004_1495 nṛyajñaṃ pitṛyajñaṃ ca pañca yajñān pracakṣate
GE07mbh_14_u:7942: 14,096.015d@004_1498 pitṝn uddiśya yat karma pitṛyajñaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7943: 14,096.015d@004_1499 hutaṃ cāpy ahutaṃ caiva tathā prahutam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7945: 14,096.015d@004_1501 vaiśvadevādayo homā hutam ity ucyate budhaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7946: 14,096.015d@004_1502 ahutaṃ ca bhaved dattaṃ prahutaṃ brāhmaṇāśitam
GE07mbh_14_u:7949: 14,096.015d@004_1505 ke cit pañca mahāyajñān pākayajñān pracakṣate
GE07mbh_14_u:7952: 14,096.015d@004_1508 bubhukṣitān brāhmaṇāṃs tu yathāśakti na hāpayet
GE07mbh_14_u:7953: 14,096.015d@004_1509 ahany ahani ye tv etān akṛtvā bhuñjate svayam
GE07mbh_14_u:7954: 14,096.015d@004_1510 kevalaṃ malam aśnanti te narā na ca saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7955: 14,096.015d@004_1511 tasmāt snātvā dvijo vidvān kuryād etān dine dine
GE07mbh_14_u:7957: 14,096.015d@004_1512 ato 'nyathā tu bhuñjan vai prāyaścittīyate dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7960: 14,096.015d@004_1514 vaktum arhasi deveśa snānasya ca vidhiṃ mama
GE07mbh_14_u:7961: 14,096.015d@004_1515 śṛṇu pāṇḍava tat sarvaṃ pavitraṃ pāpanāśanam
GE07mbh_14_u:7962: 14,096.015d@004_1516 snātvā yena vidhānena mucyante kilbiṣād dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7963: 14,096.015d@004_1517 mṛdaṃ ca gomayaṃ caiva tilān darbhāṃs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7964: 14,096.015d@004_1518 puṣpāṇy api yathānyāyam ādāya tu jalaṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_14_u:7965: 14,096.015d@004_1519 nadyāṃ satyāṃ na ca snāyād anyatra dvijasattama
GE07mbh_14_u:7966: 14,096.015d@004_1520 sati prabhūte payasi nālpe snāyāt kadā cana
GE07mbh_14_u:7969: 14,096.015d@004_1523 bahiḥ prakṣālya pādau ca dvir ācamya prayatnataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7970: 14,096.015d@004_1524 pradakṣiṇaṃ samāvṛtya namaskuryāt tu taj jalam
GE07mbh_14_u:7971: 14,096.015d@004_1525 na ca prakṣālayet tīrtham adbhir vidvān kadā cana
GE07mbh_14_u:7972: 14,096.015d@004_1526 na ca pādena vā hanyād dhastenānyena taj jalam
GE07mbh_14_u:7974: 14,096.015d@004_1528 tasmāt tās tu na hantavyās tv adbhiḥ prakṣālayet sthalam
GE07mbh_14_u:7975: 14,096.015d@004_1529 kevalaṃ prathamaṃ majjen nāṅgāni vimṛjed budhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7976: 14,096.015d@004_1530 tat tu tīrthaṃ samāsādya kuryād ācamanaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7977: 14,096.015d@004_1531 gokarṇākṛtivat kṛtvā karaṃ triḥ prapibej jalam
GE07mbh_14_u:7978: 14,096.015d@004_1532 dvis tat parimṛjed vaktraṃ pādāv abhyukṣya cātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7979: 14,096.015d@004_1533 śīrṣaṇyāṃs tu tataḥ prāṇān sakṛd eva tu saṃspṛśet
GE07mbh_14_u:7980: 14,096.015d@004_1534 bāhū dvau ca tataḥ spṛṣṭvā hṛdayaṃ nābhim eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:7981: 14,096.015d@004_1535 pratyaṅgam udakaṃ spṛṣṭvā mūrdhānaṃ tu punaḥ spṛśet
GE07mbh_14_u:7982: 14,096.015d@004_1536 āpaḥ punāntv ity uktvā ca punar ācamanaṃ caret
GE07mbh_14_u:7983: 14,096.015d@004_1537 soṃkārā vyāhṛtīr vāpi sadasaspatim ity ṛcam
GE07mbh_14_u:7984: 14,096.015d@004_1538 ācamya mṛttikāḥ paścāt tridhā kṛtvā samālabhet
GE07mbh_14_u:7986: 14,096.015d@004_1540 ālabhya vāruṇaiḥ sūktair namaskṛtya jalaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7988: 14,096.015d@004_1542 majjed om ity udāhṛtya na ca prakṣobhayej jalam
GE07mbh_14_u:7989: 14,096.015d@004_1543 gomayaṃ ca tridhā kṛtvā jale pūrvaṃ samālabhet
GE07mbh_14_u:7990: 14,096.015d@004_1544 savyāhṛtiṃ sapraṇavāṃ gāyatrīṃ ca japet punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:7992: 14,096.015d@004_1546 āpo hi ṣṭheti tisṛbhir darbhapūtena vāriṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:7993: 14,096.015d@004_1547 tathā tarat samandībhiḥ siñcec catasṛbhiḥ kramāt
GE07mbh_14_u:7998: 14,096.015d@004_1552 savyāhṛtiṃ sapraṇavāṃ gāyatrīṃ vā tato japet
GE07mbh_14_u:7999: 14,096.015d@004_1553 ā śvāsamokṣāt praṇavaṃ japed vā mām anusmaran
GE07mbh_14_u:8000: 14,096.015d@004_1554 utplutya tīrtham āsādya dhaute śukle ca vāsasī
GE07mbh_14_u:8001: 14,096.015d@004_1555 śuddhe cācchādayet kakṣe na kuryāt paripāśake
GE07mbh_14_u:8002: 14,096.015d@004_1556 pāśe nibaddhakakṣyo yat kurute karma vaidikam
GE07mbh_14_u:8003: 14,096.015d@004_1557 rākṣasā dānavā daityās tad vilumpanti harṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8004: 14,096.015d@004_1558 tasmāt sarvaprayatnena kakṣyāṃ pāśe na dhārayet
GE07mbh_14_u:8005: 14,096.015d@004_1559 tataḥ prakṣālya pādau ca hastau caiva mṛdā śanaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8006: 14,096.015d@004_1560 ācamya punar ācāmet tataḥ sāvitriyā dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8007: 14,096.015d@004_1561 jale jalagataḥ śuddhaḥ sthala eva sthale sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8011: 14,096.015d@004_1565 sahasrakṛtvaḥ sāvitrīṃ śatakṛtvas tu vā japet
GE07mbh_14_u:8012: 14,096.015d@004_1566 samāpte tu jape tasmin sāvitryā cābhimantrya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:8020: 14,096.015d@004_1574 ūrdhvabāhus tato bhūtvā sūryam īkṣet samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8022: 14,096.015d@004_1576 ud u tyaṃ ca japen mantraṃ citraṃ taccakṣur ity api
GE07mbh_14_u:8023: 14,096.015d@004_1577 sāvitrīṃ ca yathāśakti japtvā sūktaṃ ca māmakam
GE07mbh_14_u:8024: 14,096.015d@004_1578 manmayāni ca sāmāni puruṣavratam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:8025: 14,096.015d@004_1579 tataś cālokayed arkaṃ haṃsaḥ śuciṣad ity ṛcā
GE07mbh_14_u:8027: 14,096.015d@004_1581 tatas tu tarpayed adbhiḥ brahmāṇaṃ māṃ ca śaṃkaram
GE07mbh_14_u:8028: 14,096.015d@004_1582 prajāpatiṃ ca devāṃś ca tathā devamunīn api
GE07mbh_14_u:8029: 14,096.015d@004_1583 sāṅgān api tathā vedān itihāsān kratūṃs tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:8030: 14,096.015d@004_1584 purāṇāni ca divyāni kulāny apsarasāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:8032: 14,096.015d@004_1586 bhūtagrāmāṃś ca bhūtāni saritaḥ sāgarāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:8034: 14,096.015d@004_1588 tarpayed upavītī tu pratyekaṃ tṛpyatām iti
GE07mbh_14_u:8035: 14,096.015d@004_1589 anvārabhya ca savyena pāṇinā dakṣiṇena tu
GE07mbh_14_u:8036: 14,096.015d@004_1590 nivītī tarpayet paścād ṛṣīn mantrakṛtas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:8038: 14,096.015d@004_1592 prācīnāvīty athaitāṃs tu tarpayed devatāḥ pitṝn
GE07mbh_14_u:8039: 14,096.015d@004_1593 tatas tu kavyavāḍ agniṃ somaṃ vaivasvataṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:8040: 14,096.015d@004_1594 tataś cāryamaṇaṃ cāpi agniṣv āttāṃs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:8041: 14,096.015d@004_1595 somapāṃś caiva darbhais tu satilair eva vāribhiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8042: 14,096.015d@004_1596 tṛpyadhvam iti paścāt tu svapitṝṃs tarpayet tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8045: 14,096.015d@004_1599 tathā pitṛṣvasṝś caiva mātṛṣvasṝs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:8046: 14,096.015d@004_1600 mātaraṃ cātmanaś caiva tathā mātāmahīm api
GE07mbh_14_u:8047: 14,096.015d@004_1601 mātur mātāmahīṃ caiva gurum ācāryam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:8052: 14,096.015d@004_1606 atarpayitvā tān pūrvaṃ snānavastraṃ na pīḍayet
GE07mbh_14_u:8053: 14,096.015d@004_1607 pīḍayec cet purā mohād devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:8054: 14,096.015d@004_1608 pitaras tu nirāśāś ca śaptvā yānti yathāgatam
GE07mbh_14_u:8055: 14,096.015d@004_1609 prakṣālya tu mṛdā pādāv ācamya prayataḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8056: 14,096.015d@004_1610 darbheṣu darbhapāṇiḥ san svādhyāyaṃ tu samārabhet
GE07mbh_14_u:8058: 14,096.015d@004_1612 yad adhīte svayaṃ śaktyā tat svādhyāyaṃ pracakṣate
GE07mbh_14_u:8059: 14,096.015d@004_1613 ṛcaṃ vātha yajur vāpi sāmagāthām athāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:8061: 14,096.015d@004_1615 utthāya ca namaskṛtvā diśo digdevatā api
GE07mbh_14_u:8062: 14,096.015d@004_1616 brahmāṇaṃ ca tataś cāgniṃ pṛthivīm oṣadhīs tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:8063: 14,096.015d@004_1617 vācaṃ vācaspatiṃ caiva māṃ caiva saritas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:8064: 14,096.015d@004_1618 namaskṛtvā tathādbhis tu praṇavādi ca pūjayet
GE07mbh_14_u:8065: 14,096.015d@004_1619 tato namo 'dbhya ity uktvā namaskuryāt tu taj jalam
GE07mbh_14_u:8066: 14,096.015d@004_1620 ghṛṇiḥ sūryas tathādityas tān praṇamya svamūrdhani
GE07mbh_14_u:8067: 14,096.015d@004_1621 tatas tv ālokayann arkaṃ praṇavena samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8069: 14,096.015d@004_1622 tato mām arcayet puṣpair matpriyair eva nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8074: 14,096.015d@004_1626 kumudaṃ karavīraṃ ca caṇakaṃ campakaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:8079: 14,096.015d@004_1631 tasmāt padmaṃ tathā rājan padmāt tu śatapatrakam
GE07mbh_14_u:8080: 14,096.015d@004_1632 tasmāt sahasrapatraṃ tu puṇḍarīkaṃ tataḥ param
GE07mbh_14_u:8082: 14,096.015d@004_1634 bakapuṣpaṃ tatas tasmāt sauvarṇaṃ tu tato 'dhikam
GE07mbh_14_u:8083: 14,096.015d@004_1635 sauvarṇāt tu prasūnāc ca matpriyaṃ nāsti pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:8084: 14,096.015d@004_1636 puṣpālābhe tulasyāstu patrair mām arcayed budhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8086: 14,096.015d@004_1638 śiphālābhe mṛdā tatra bhaktimān arcayed budhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8088: 14,096.015d@004_1640 kiṅkiṇī munipuṣpaṃ ca duttūraṃ pāṭalaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:8092: 14,096.015d@004_1644 kakubhāḥ kovidārāś ca vaibhītakam athāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:8094: 14,096.015d@004_1646 aṅkolaṃ girikarṇī ca nīlāny eva ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8098: 14,096.015d@004_1650 anyais tu śuklapatrais tu gandhavadbhir narādhipa
GE07mbh_14_u:8100: 14,096.015d@004_1651 avarjyais tair yathālābhaṃ madbhakto māṃ samarcayet
GE07mbh_14_u:8101: 14,096.015d@004_1652 kathaṃ tvam arcanīyo 'si mūrtayaḥ kīdṛśās tu te
GE07mbh_14_u:8102: 14,096.015d@004_1653 vaikhānasāḥ kathaṃ brūyuḥ kathaṃ vā pāñcarātrikāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8104: 14,096.015d@004_1654 śṛṇu pāṇḍava tat sarvam arcanākramam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8107: 14,096.015d@004_1657 vaidikair atha vā mantrair mama sūktena vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8108: 14,096.015d@004_1658 sthāpitaṃ māṃ tatas tasminn arcayitvā vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8109: 14,096.015d@004_1659 puruṣaṃ ca tataḥ satyam acyutaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:8110: 14,096.015d@004_1660 aniruddhaṃ ca māṃ prāhur vaikhānasavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8111: 14,096.015d@004_1661 anye tv evaṃ vijānanti māṃ rājan pāñcarātrikāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8112: 14,096.015d@004_1662 vāsudevaṃ ca rājendra saṃkarṣaṇam athāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:8114: 14,096.015d@004_1664 etāś cānyāś ca rājendra saṃjñābhedena mūrtayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8116: 14,096.015d@004_1665 viddhy anarthāntarā eva mām evaṃ cārcayed budhaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8117: 14,096.015d@004_1666 tvadbhaktāḥ kīdṛśā deva kāni teṣāṃ vratāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:8121: 14,096.015d@004_1669 mām eva śaraṇaṃ prāptās te madbhaktāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8125: 14,096.015d@004_1673 svasthas tu na divā svapyān madhumāṃsāni varjayet
GE07mbh_14_u:8126: 14,096.015d@004_1674 pradakṣiṇaṃ vrajed viprān gām aśvatthaṃ hutāśanam
GE07mbh_14_u:8127: 14,096.015d@004_1675 na dhāvet patite varṣe nāgrabhikṣāṃ ca lopayet
GE07mbh_14_u:8129: 14,096.015d@004_1677 grāsamuṣṭiṃ gave dadyād dhānyāmlaṃ caiva varjayet
GE07mbh_14_u:8131: 14,096.015d@004_1679 aniveditaṃ ca yad dravyaṃ tat prayatnena varjayet
GE07mbh_14_u:8134: 14,096.015d@004_1682 sāttvikā rājasāś cāpi tāmasāś cāpi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:8135: 14,096.015d@004_1683 mām arcayanti madbhaktās teṣām īdṛgvidhā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8136: 14,096.015d@004_1684 tāmasās timiraṃ yānti rājasā raja eva tat
GE07mbh_14_u:8137: 14,096.015d@004_1685 sāttvikāḥ sattvasaṃpannāḥ sattvam eva prayānti te
GE07mbh_14_u:8138: 14,096.015d@004_1686 ye siddhāḥ santi sāṃkhyena yogasattvabalena ca
GE07mbh_14_u:8141: 14,096.015d@004_1689 etasmin dehanagare rājasas tu sadā bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:8143: 14,096.015d@004_1691 caturvedavidaś cāpi dehe ṣaḍ vṛṣalāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8144: 14,096.015d@004_1692 kṣatriyāḥ sapta vijñeyā vaiśyās tv aṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8146: 14,096.015d@004_1694 kāmaḥ krodhaś ca lobhaś ca mohaś ca mada eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:8147: 14,096.015d@004_1695 mahāmohaś ca ity ete dehe ṣaḍ vṛṣalāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8148: 14,096.015d@004_1696 garvaḥ stambho hy ahaṃkāra īrṣyā ca droha eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:8149: 14,096.015d@004_1697 pāruṣyaṃ krūratā ceti saptaite kṣatriyāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8150: 14,096.015d@004_1698 tīkṣṇatā nikṛtir māyā śāṭhyaṃ ḍambho hy anārjavam
GE07mbh_14_u:8151: 14,096.015d@004_1699 paiśunyam anṛtaṃ caiva vaiśyās tv aṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8152: 14,096.015d@004_1700 tṛṣṇā bubhukṣā nidrā ca ālasyaṃ cāghṛṇādayā
GE07mbh_14_u:8153: 14,096.015d@004_1701 ādhiś cāpi vivādaś ca pramādo hīnasattvatā
GE07mbh_14_u:8154: 14,096.015d@004_1702 bhayaṃ viklabatā jāḍyaṃ pāpakaṃ manyur eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:8156: 14,096.015d@004_1704 āśaucaṃ malinatvaṃ ca śūdrā hy ete prakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8157: 14,096.015d@004_1705 yasminn ete na dṛśyante sa vai brāhmaṇa ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:8158: 14,096.015d@004_1706 yeṣu yeṣu hi bhāveṣu yatkālaṃ vartate dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8160: 14,096.015d@004_1708 prāṇān āyamya yatkālaṃ yena māṃ cāpi cintayet
GE07mbh_14_u:8161: 14,096.015d@004_1709 tatkāle vai dvijo jñeyaḥ śeṣakālo hy athetaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8162: 14,096.015d@004_1710 tasmāt tu sāttviko bhūtvā śuciḥ krodhavivarjitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8163: 14,096.015d@004_1711 mām arcayet tu satataṃ matpriyatvaṃ yad icchati
GE07mbh_14_u:8166: 14,096.015d@004_1714 manaś ca vācaṃ ca nigṛhya cañcalaṃ
GE07mbh_14_u:8169: 14,096.015d@004_1717 teṣāṃ śrāddheṣu tṛpyanti tena tṛptāḥ pitāmahāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8170: 14,096.015d@004_1718 dharmo jayati nādharmaḥ satyaṃ jayati nānṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:8171: 14,096.015d@004_1719 kṣamā jayati na krodhaḥ kṣamāvān brāhmaṇo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:8175: 14,096.015d@004_1722 yā caiṣā kapilā deva pūrvam utpāditā vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:8177: 14,096.015d@004_1724 sā kathaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo hi deyā kasmin dine 'pi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:8179: 14,096.015d@004_1726 kati vā kapilāḥ proktāḥ svayam eva svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_14_u:8180: 14,096.015d@004_1727 kair vā deyāś ca tā deva śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8182: 14,096.015d@004_1729 abravīt kapilāsaṃkhyāṃ tāsāṃ māhātmyam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:8183: 14,096.015d@004_1730 śṛṇu pāṇḍava tattvena pavitraṃ pāvanaṃ param
GE07mbh_14_u:8184: 14,096.015d@004_1731 yac chrutvā pāpakarmāpi naraḥ pāpaiḥ pramucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:8189: 14,096.015d@004_1736 bhuñjate kapilāṃ ye tu śūdrā lobhena mohitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8190: 14,096.015d@004_1737 patitāṃs tān vijānīyāc caṇḍālasadṛśā hi te
GE07mbh_14_u:8191: 14,096.015d@004_1738 na teṣāṃ brāhmaṇaḥ kaś cid gṛhe kuryāt pratigraham
GE07mbh_14_u:8193: 14,096.015d@004_1740 sarvakālaṃ hi te sarvair varjitāḥ pitṛdaivataiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8194: 14,096.015d@004_1741 te sadā hy apratigrāhyā hy asaṃbhāṣyāś ca pāpinaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8195: 14,096.015d@004_1742 pibanti kapilāṃ yāvat tāvat teṣāṃ pitāmahāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8197: 14,096.015d@004_1744 kapilāyā ghṛtaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhi takram athāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:8198: 14,096.015d@004_1745 ye śūdrā upabhuñjanti teṣāṃ gatim imāṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_14_u:8199: 14,096.015d@004_1746 kapilopajīvī śūdras tu mṛto gacchati rauravam
GE07mbh_14_u:8201: 14,096.015d@004_1748 rauravāc ca paribhraṣṭo viṣṭhāyāṃ jāyate krimiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8204: 14,096.015d@004_1751 brāhmaṇaś caiva yas teṣāṃ gṛhe kuryāt pratigraham
GE07mbh_14_u:8205: 14,096.015d@004_1752 tataḥ prabhṛti tasyāpi pitaraḥ syur amedhyapāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8206: 14,096.015d@004_1753 na tena sārdhaṃ saṃbhāṣen na cāpy ekāsanaṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_14_u:8207: 14,096.015d@004_1754 sa nityaṃ varjanīyo hi dūrāt tu brāhmaṇādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8208: 14,096.015d@004_1755 yas tena saha saṃbhāṣed ekaśayyāṃ vrajeta vā
GE07mbh_14_u:8209: 14,096.015d@004_1756 prājāpatyaṃ caret kṛcchraṃ sa ca tenaiva śudhyati
GE07mbh_14_u:8211: 14,096.015d@004_1758 prāyaścittaṃ bhavet tasya viprasyaitan na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8212: 14,096.015d@004_1759 brahmakūrcaṃ tu kurvīta cāndrāyaṇam athāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:8213: 14,096.015d@004_1760 mucyate kilbiṣāt tasmād etena brāhmaṇo hi saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8214: 14,096.015d@004_1761 kapilā hy agnihotrārthe yajñārthe ca svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_14_u:8215: 14,096.015d@004_1762 sarvatas teja uddhṛtya brahmaṇā nirmitā purā
GE07mbh_14_u:8216: 14,096.015d@004_1763 pavitraṃ ca pavitrāṇāṃ maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam
GE07mbh_14_u:8218: 14,096.015d@004_1765 tapasāṃ tapa evāgryaṃ vratānāṃ vratam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:8219: 14,096.015d@004_1766 dānānāṃ paramaṃ dānaṃ nidānaṃ hy etad akṣayam
GE07mbh_14_u:8220: 14,096.015d@004_1767 pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni puṇyāny āyatanāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:8226: 14,096.015d@004_1773 kṣīreṇa kapilāyās tu dadhnā vai saghṛtena vā
GE07mbh_14_u:8228: 14,096.015d@004_1775 kapilāyā ghṛtenāpi dadhnā kṣīreṇa vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8230: 14,096.015d@004_1777 pūjayanty atithīṃś caiva parāṃ bhaktim upāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8235: 14,096.015d@004_1782 brahmaṇā pūjyamānās tu modante kalpam akṣayam
GE07mbh_14_u:8236: 14,096.015d@004_1783 evaṃ hi kapilā rājan puṇyā mantrāmṛtāraṇiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8239: 14,096.015d@004_1786 brahmaṇo hi niyogena nivasanti dine dine
GE07mbh_14_u:8241: 14,096.015d@004_1788 cyutā āpas tu śīrṣeṇa prayato dhārayec chuciḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8244: 14,096.015d@004_1791 mūtreṇa kapilāyās tu yas tu prātar upaspṛśet

GE07mbh_14_u:8815: 14,096.015d@004_2347 bhuñjīta vidhivad vipro na cocchiṣṭaṃ pradāpayet
GE07mbh_14_u:8816: 14,096.015d@004_2348 sadā cātyāśanaṃ nādyān nātihīnaṃ ca karhi cit

GE07mbh_14_u:8818: 14,096.015d@004_2350 udakyām api caṇḍālaṃ śvānaṃ vā rurum eva vā
GE07mbh_14_u:8819: 14,096.015d@004_2351 bhuñjāno yadi vā paśyet tad annaṃ ca parityajet
GE07mbh_14_u:8820: 14,096.015d@004_2352 bhuñjāno hy atyajan mohād dvijaś cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret
GE07mbh_14_u:8822: 14,096.015d@004_2354 abhojyaṃ tad vijānīyād bhuktvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret
GE07mbh_14_u:8823: 14,096.015d@004_2355 utthāya ca punaḥ spṛṣṭaṃ pādaspṛṣṭaṃ ca laṅghitam
GE07mbh_14_u:8824: 14,096.015d@004_2356 annaṃ tad rākṣasaṃ vidyāt tasmāt tat parivarjayet
GE07mbh_14_u:8825: 14,096.015d@004_2357 rākṣasocchiṣṭabhug vipraḥ sapta pūrvān parān api
GE07mbh_14_u:8827: 14,096.015d@004_2359 tasminn ācamanaṃ kuryād yasmin pātre sa bhuktavān
GE07mbh_14_u:8828: 14,096.015d@004_2360 yady uttiṣṭhaty anācānto bhuktavān āsanāt tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8834: 14,096.015d@004_2364 pitaro vṛṣabhā jñeyā gāvo lokasya mātaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8835: 14,096.015d@004_2365 tāsāṃ tu pūjayā rājan pūjitāḥ pitṛmātaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8836: 14,096.015d@004_2366 sabhā prapā gṛhaṃ cāpi devatāyatanāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:8837: 14,096.015d@004_2367 śudhyanti śakṛdā yāsāṃ kiṃ pūtam adhikaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8838: 14,096.015d@004_2368 grāsamuṣṭiṃ paragave dadyāt saṃvatsaraṃ tu yaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8839: 14,096.015d@004_2369 akṛtvā svayam āhāraṃ vrataṃ tat sārvakālikam
GE07mbh_14_u:8840: 14,096.015d@004_2370 gāvo me mātaraḥ sarvāḥ pitaraś caiva govṛṣāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8842: 14,096.015d@004_2372 ity uktvānena mantreṇa sāvitryā vā samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8844: 14,096.015d@004_2374 yat kṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ tena jñānato 'jñānato 'pi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:8845: 14,096.015d@004_2375 tasya naśyati tat sarvaṃ duḥsvapnaṃ ca vinaśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:8847: 14,096.015d@004_2377 tilāñ śrāddhe praśaṃsanti dānam etad anuttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:8848: 14,096.015d@004_2378 tilān dadyāt tilān bhakṣyāt tilān prātar upaspṛśet
GE07mbh_14_u:8849: 14,096.015d@004_2379 tilaṃ tilam iti brūyāt tilāḥ pāpaharā hi te
GE07mbh_14_u:8850: 14,096.015d@004_2380 krītāḥ pratigṛhītā vā na vikreyā dvijātibhiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8851: 14,096.015d@004_2381 bhojanābhyañjanād dānād yo 'nyat tu kurute tilaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8852: 14,096.015d@004_2382 kṛmir bhūtvā śvaviṣṭhāyāṃ pitṛbhiḥ saha majjati
GE07mbh_14_u:8853: 14,096.015d@004_2383 tilān na pīḍayed vipro yantracakre svayaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:8854: 14,096.015d@004_2384 pīḍayan hi dvijo mohān narakaṃ yāti rauravam
GE07mbh_14_u:8860: 14,096.015d@004_2389 tasmān na pīḍayed ikṣūn yantracakre dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8861: 14,096.015d@004_2390 samuccayaṃ tu dharmāṇāṃ bhojyābhojyaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:8863: 14,096.015d@004_2391 śrutaṃ mayā tvatprasādād āpaddharmaṃ bravīhi me
GE07mbh_14_u:8867: 14,096.015d@004_2395 akṛtānnaṃ ca yat kiṃ cid gṛhṇīyād ātmavṛttaye
GE07mbh_14_u:8868: 14,096.015d@004_2396 āturo duḥkhito vāpi bhayārto vā bubhukṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8869: 14,096.015d@004_2397 bhuñjann avidhinā vipraḥ prāyaścittīyate na ca
GE07mbh_14_u:8870: 14,096.015d@004_2398 nimantritas tu yo vipro vidhivad dhavyakavyayoḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8871: 14,096.015d@004_2399 māṃsāny api ca bhuñjānaḥ prāyaścittīyate na ca
GE07mbh_14_u:8872: 14,096.015d@004_2400 aṣṭau tāny avrataghnāni āpo mūlaṃ ghṛtaṃ payaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8874: 14,096.015d@004_2402 aśakto vidhivat kartuṃ prāyaścittāni yo naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8876: 14,096.015d@004_2404 anṛtāv ṛtukāle vā divā rātrau tathāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:8878: 14,096.015d@004_2405 proṣitas tu striyaṃ gacchet prāyaścittīyate na ca
GE07mbh_14_u:8879: 14,096.015d@004_2406 praśasyāḥ kīdṛśā viprā nindyāś cāpi sureśvara
GE07mbh_14_u:8881: 14,096.015d@004_2407 aṣṭakāyāś ca kaḥ kālas tan me kathaya suvrata
GE07mbh_14_u:8882: 14,096.015d@004_2408 satyasandhaṃ dvijaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthānād vepati bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8883: 14,096.015d@004_2409 eṣa me maṇḍalaṃ bhittvā yāti brahma sanātanam
GE07mbh_14_u:8884: 14,096.015d@004_2410 kulīnaḥ karmakṛd vaidyas tathā cāpy ānṛśaṃsyavān
GE07mbh_14_u:8885: 14,096.015d@004_2411 hrīmān ṛjuḥ satyavādī pātraṃ sarva ime dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8886: 14,096.015d@004_2412 ete cāgrāsanasthās tu bhuñjānāḥ prathamaṃ dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8887: 14,096.015d@004_2413 tasyāṃ paṅktyāṃ ca ye cānye tān punanty eva darśanāt
GE07mbh_14_u:8889: 14,096.015d@004_2415 tān paṅktipāvanān viddhi pūjyāṃś caiva viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8890: 14,096.015d@004_2416 nindyāñ śṛṇu dvijān rājann api vā vedapāragān
GE07mbh_14_u:8893: 14,096.015d@004_2419 yatra kutra tu bhuñjānas taṃ vidyāt paṅktidūṣakam
GE07mbh_14_u:8895: 14,096.015d@004_2421 ahaṃ cāpi na jānāmi gatiṃ tasya narādhipa
GE07mbh_14_u:8897: 14,096.015d@004_2423 japato juhvato vāpi gatir ūrdhvā na vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:8898: 14,096.015d@004_2424 āhitāgniś ca yo vipraḥ śūdrānnān na nivartate
GE07mbh_14_u:8899: 14,096.015d@004_2425 pañca tasya praṇaśyanti ātmā brahma trayo 'gnayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8901: 14,096.015d@004_2427 bhūmāv annaṃ pradātavyaṃ śvasṛgālasamo hi saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8902: 14,096.015d@004_2428 pretabhūtaṃ tu yaḥ śūdraṃ brāhmaṇo jñānadurbalaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8904: 14,096.015d@004_2430 trirātre tu tataḥ pūrṇe nadīṃ gatvā samudragām
GE07mbh_14_u:8906: 14,096.015d@004_2432 anāthaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ pretaṃ ye vahanti dvijottamāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8907: 14,096.015d@004_2433 pade pade 'śvamedhasya phalaṃ te prāpnuvanti hi
GE07mbh_14_u:8908: 14,096.015d@004_2434 na teṣām aśubhaṃ kiṃ cit pāpaṃ vāśubhakarmaṇām
GE07mbh_14_u:8910: 14,096.015d@004_2436 śūdraveśmani vipreṇa kṣīraṃ vā yadi vā dadhi
GE07mbh_14_u:8911: 14,096.015d@004_2437 nirvṛtena na bhoktavyaṃ viddhi śūdrānnam eva tat
GE07mbh_14_u:8913: 14,096.015d@004_2439 yo vighnaṃ kurute martyas tato nānyo 'sti pāpakṛt
GE07mbh_14_u:8914: 14,096.015d@004_2440 sarve ca vedāḥ saha ṣaḍbhir aṅgaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8915: 14,096.015d@004_2441 sāṃkhyaṃ purāṇaṃ ca kule ca janma
GE07mbh_14_u:8933: 14,096.015d@004_2459 iha cāmutra caikasya nāmutraikasya no iha
GE07mbh_14_u:8945: 14,096.015d@004_2471 teṣām ayaṃ caiva paraś ca lokaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8946: 14,096.015d@004_2472 ye naiva vidyāṃ na tapo na dānaṃ
GE07mbh_14_u:8949: 14,096.015d@004_2475 teṣām ayaṃ caiva paraś ca nāsti
GE07mbh_14_u:8956: 14,096.015d@004_2480 agnicit kapilā satrī rājā bhikṣur mahodadhiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8957: 14,096.015d@004_2481 dṛṣṭamātrāḥ punanty ete tasmāt paśyeta tān sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:8958: 14,096.015d@004_2482 gaur ekasyaiva dātavyā na bahūnāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:8959: 14,096.015d@004_2483 sā gaur vikrayam āpannā dahaty āsaptamaṃ kulam
GE07mbh_14_u:8960: 14,096.015d@004_2484 bahūnāṃ na pradātavyā gaur vastraṃ śayanaṃ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8961: 14,096.015d@004_2485 tādṛgbhūtaṃ tu tad dānaṃ dātāraṃ nopatiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_14_u:8962: 14,096.015d@004_2486 ākramya brāhmaṇair bhuktam anāryāṇāṃ tu veśmani
GE07mbh_14_u:8963: 14,096.015d@004_2487 gobhiś ca puṇyaṃ tat teṣāṃ rājasūyād viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:8964: 14,096.015d@004_2488 mā dadātv iti yo brūyād gavyagnau brāhmaṇeṣu ca
GE07mbh_14_u:8966: 14,096.015d@004_2490 brāhmaṇasvaṃ tu devasvaṃ daridrasya ca yad dhanam
GE07mbh_14_u:8967: 14,096.015d@004_2491 guroś cāpi hṛtaṃ rājan svargastham api pātayet
GE07mbh_14_u:8970: 14,096.015d@004_2494 ā samudrāc ca yat pūrvād ā samudrāc ca paścimāt
GE07mbh_14_u:8976: 14,096.015d@004_2500 kurukṣetraṃ ca matsyāś ca pāñcālāḥ śūrasenayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8979: 14,096.015d@004_2503 svaṃ cāritraṃ tu gṛhṇīyuḥ pṛthivyāṃ sarvamānavāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8980: 14,096.015d@004_2504 himavadvindhyayor madhyaṃ yat prāg viśasanād api
GE07mbh_14_u:8981: 14,096.015d@004_2505 pratyag eva prayāgāt tu madhyadeśaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8982: 14,096.015d@004_2506 kṛṣṇasāras tu carati mṛgo yatra svabhāvataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8983: 14,096.015d@004_2507 sa jñeyo yajñiyo deśo mlecchadeśas tataḥ param
GE07mbh_14_u:8984: 14,096.015d@004_2508 etān vijñāya deśāṃs tu saṃśrayeyur dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8985: 14,096.015d@004_2509 śūdras tu yasmin kasmin vā nivased vṛttikarśitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8986: 14,096.015d@004_2510 ācāraprabhavo dharmo hy ahiṃsā satyam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:8987: 14,096.015d@004_2511 dānaṃ caiva yathāśakti niyamāś ca yamaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_14_u:8989: 14,096.015d@004_2513 kāryaḥ śarīrasaṃskāraḥ pāvanaḥ pretya ceha ca
GE07mbh_14_u:8992: 14,096.015d@004_2516 mahāyajñaiś ca yajñaiś ca brāhmīyaṃ kriyate tanuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:8993: 14,096.015d@004_2517 dharmārthau yatra na syātāṃ śuśrūṣā vāpi tadvidhā
GE07mbh_14_u:8994: 14,096.015d@004_2518 vidyā tasmin na vaptavyā śubhaṃ bījam ivoṣare
GE07mbh_14_u:8995: 14,096.015d@004_2519 laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ vāpi tathādhyātmikam eva vā
GE07mbh_14_u:8996: 14,096.015d@004_2520 yasmāj jñānam idaṃ prāptaṃ taṃ pūrvam abhivādayet
GE07mbh_14_u:8997: 14,096.015d@004_2521 savyena savyaṃ saṃgṛhya dakṣiṇena tu dakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:9000: 14,096.015d@004_2524 adhyāpayati caivainaṃ sa vipro gurur ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:9002: 14,096.015d@004_2526 sakalpān sarahasyāṃś ca sa copādhyāya ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:9003: 14,096.015d@004_2527 sāṅgāṃś ca vedān adhyāpya śikṣayitvā vratāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9007: 14,096.015d@004_2531 tasmāt teṣāṃ vaśe tiṣṭhet tacchuśrūṣāparo bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:9008: 14,096.015d@004_2532 avamānād dhi teṣāṃ tu narakaṃ syād asaṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9011: 14,096.015d@004_2535 śapatā yat kṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ śapyamānaṃ tu gacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:9013: 14,096.015d@004_2537 nāstikyaṃ vedanindāṃ ca devatānāṃ ca kutsanam
GE07mbh_14_u:9014: 14,096.015d@004_2538 dveṣaṃ ḍambhaṃ ca mānaṃ ca krodhaṃ taikṣṇyaṃ ca varjayet
GE07mbh_14_u:9018: 14,096.015d@004_2540 dharmaṃ puṇyatamaṃ deva pṛcchataḥ kathayasva me
GE07mbh_14_u:9019: 14,096.015d@004_2541 yad etad agnihotraṃ vai sṛṣṭaṃ varṇatrayasya tu
GE07mbh_14_u:9020: 14,096.015d@004_2542 mantravad yad dhutaṃ samyag vidhinā cāpy upāsitam
GE07mbh_14_u:9023: 14,096.015d@004_2544 kathaṃ tad brāhmaṇair deva hotavyaṃ kṣatriyaiḥ katham
GE07mbh_14_u:9024: 14,096.015d@004_2545 vaiśyair vā devadeveśa kathaṃ vā suhutaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:9025: 14,096.015d@004_2546 kasmin kāle 'tha vā kasya ādheyo 'gniḥ surottama
GE07mbh_14_u:9026: 14,096.015d@004_2547 āhitasya kathaṃ vāpi samyag ācaraṇaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:9027: 14,096.015d@004_2548 katy agnayaḥ kim ātmānaḥ sthānaṃ kiṃ kasya vā vibho
GE07mbh_14_u:9028: 14,096.015d@004_2549 katarasmin hute sthāne kiṃ vrajed āgnihotrikaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9030: 14,096.015d@004_2551 katham evātha hūyante prīyante ca surāḥ katham
GE07mbh_14_u:9031: 14,096.015d@004_2552 vidhivan mantravad bhaktyā pūjitās tv agnayaḥ katham
GE07mbh_14_u:9032: 14,096.015d@004_2553 kāṃ gatiṃ vadatāṃ śreṣṭha nayanti hy agnihotriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9034: 14,096.015d@004_2555 kim āhitāgneḥ kurvanti duścīrṇā vāpi keśava
GE07mbh_14_u:9035: 14,096.015d@004_2556 utsannāgnis tu pāpātmā kāṃ yoniṃ deva gacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:9036: 14,096.015d@004_2557 etat sarvaṃ samāsena bhaktyā hy upagatasya me
GE07mbh_14_u:9038: 14,096.015d@004_2558 vaktum arhasi sarvajña sarvāvāsa namo 'stu te
GE07mbh_14_u:9039: 14,096.015d@004_2559 śṛṇu rājan mahāpuṇyam idaṃ dharmāmṛtaṃ param
GE07mbh_14_u:9040: 14,096.015d@004_2560 yat tu tārayate yuktān brāhmaṇān agnihotriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9043: 14,096.015d@004_2563 yasmād agre sa bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ nirmito mayā
GE07mbh_14_u:9045: 14,096.015d@004_2565 yasmāt tu sarvakṛtyeṣu pūrvam asmai pradīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:9047: 14,096.015d@004_2567 yasmāc ca nayati hy agryāṃ gatiṃ viprān supūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9048: 14,096.015d@004_2568 tasmāc ca nayanād rājan vedeṣv agnīti kīrtyate
GE07mbh_14_u:9049: 14,096.015d@004_2569 yasmāc ca durhutaḥ so 'yam alaṃ bhakṣayituṃ kṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_14_u:9051: 14,096.015d@004_2571 sarvabhūtātmako rājan devānām eṣa vai mukham
GE07mbh_14_u:9052: 14,096.015d@004_2572 prathamaṃ manmukhāt sṛṣṭo lokārthe pacanaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9053: 14,096.015d@004_2573 sṛṣṭamātro jagat sarvam attum aicchat purā khalu
GE07mbh_14_u:9054: 14,096.015d@004_2574 tataḥ praśamitaḥ so 'gnir upāsyaiva mayā purā
GE07mbh_14_u:9056: 14,096.015d@004_2576 āhutiḥ sarvam ākhyātaṃ tasmin vasati so 'nalaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9058: 14,096.015d@004_2578 tasmin pañca mahāyajñā vartante yasya dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9063: 14,096.015d@004_2583 tasmin pañca mahāyajñā vaiśvadevaś ca vartate
GE07mbh_14_u:9064: 14,096.015d@004_2584 sthālīpāka ca gārhaṃ ca sarve hy asmin pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9065: 14,096.015d@004_2585 gṛhyakarmavaho yasmāt tasmād gṛhapatis tu saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9067: 14,096.015d@004_2587 āhur brahmavidaḥ ke cin matam etan mamāpi ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9070: 14,096.015d@004_2590 gṛhāṇāṃ hi patitvaṃ hi gṛhapatyam iti smṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:9072: 14,096.015d@004_2592 yajamānaṃ tu yasmāt tu dakṣiṇāṃ tu gatiṃ nayet
GE07mbh_14_u:9073: 14,096.015d@004_2593 dakṣiṇāgniṃ tam āhus taṃ dakṣiṇāyatanaṃ dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9076: 14,096.015d@004_2596 yas tv āvasathyaṃ juhuyān mūlāgniṃ vidhivad dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9077: 14,096.015d@004_2597 āvasathyaṃ tu ye cāgniṃ pacanāgniṃ pracakṣate
GE07mbh_14_u:9078: 14,096.015d@004_2598 teṣāṃ sa bhāgato vahniḥ sabhya ity abhidhīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:9079: 14,096.015d@004_2599 āvasathyas tu yo vahniḥ prathamaḥ sa prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9080: 14,096.015d@004_2600 brahmā ca gārhapatyo 'gnis tasmād eva tu so bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:9081: 14,096.015d@004_2601 dakṣiṇāgnis tv ayaṃ rudraḥ krodhātmā caṇḍa eva saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9082: 14,096.015d@004_2602 aham āhavanīyo 'gnir ā homād yasya vai mukhe
GE07mbh_14_u:9083: 14,096.015d@004_2603 sabhyo 'gniḥ pañcamo yas tu skanda eva narādhipa
GE07mbh_14_u:9086: 14,096.015d@004_2606 vṛtto hi gārhapatyo 'gnir yasmād vṛttā ca medinī
GE07mbh_14_u:9087: 14,096.015d@004_2607 ardhacandrākṛtiḥ khaṃ vai dakṣiṇāgnis tathā bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:9088: 14,096.015d@004_2608 caturaśraṃ tataḥ svargaṃ nirmalaṃ yan nirāmayam
GE07mbh_14_u:9090: 14,096.015d@004_2610 juhuyād gārhapatyaṃ yo bhuvaṃ jayati sa dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9091: 14,096.015d@004_2611 juhoti dakṣiṇāgniṃ yaḥ sa jayaty antarikṣakam
GE07mbh_14_u:9092: 14,096.015d@004_2612 pṛthivīm antarikṣaṃ ca divaṃ carṣigaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_14_u:9093: 14,096.015d@004_2613 jayaty āhavanīyaṃ yo juhuyād bhaktimān dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9094: 14,096.015d@004_2614 ābhimukhyena homas tu yasya yajñeṣu vartate
GE07mbh_14_u:9096: 14,096.015d@004_2616 ā homād yo 'gnihotreṣu yajñe vā yatra sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9097: 14,096.015d@004_2617 yasmād asmin pravartante tato hy āhavanīyatā
GE07mbh_14_u:9098: 14,096.015d@004_2618 yas tv āvasathyaṃ juhuyān mūlāgniṃ vidhivad dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9100: 14,096.015d@004_2620 yaś cāpy upāsate sabhyaṃ vidhivat prayatātmavān
GE07mbh_14_u:9101: 14,096.015d@004_2621 jayet sa vāṅmayaṃ sarvaṃ tathā tv ṛṣisabhām api
GE07mbh_14_u:9102: 14,096.015d@004_2622 agnīnām atha vāgnes tu yasya homaḥ pradīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:9103: 14,096.015d@004_2623 iṣṭo bhavati sarvāgner agnihotraṃ ca tad bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:9105: 14,096.015d@004_2625 ho ity eva viṣādo vai viṣādo duḥkham ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:9106: 14,096.015d@004_2626 duḥkhaṃ tāpatrayaṃ proktaṃ tāpaṃ hi narakaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9107: 14,096.015d@004_2627 tasmād vai trāyate duḥkhād yajamānaṃ huto 'nalaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9108: 14,096.015d@004_2628 tasmāt tu vidhivat proktam agnihotram iti śrutau
GE07mbh_14_u:9109: 14,096.015d@004_2629 tad agnihotraṃ sṛṣṭaṃ vai brahmaṇā lokakartṛṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:9110: 14,096.015d@004_2630 vedāś cāpy agnihotrārthaṃ jajñire svayam eva tu
GE07mbh_14_u:9116: 14,096.015d@004_2636 vasanto brāhmaṇaḥ prokto vedayoniḥ sa ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:9117: 14,096.015d@004_2637 agnyādheyaṃ tu yenātha vasante kriyate nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:9118: 14,096.015d@004_2638 tasya śrīr brahmavṛddhiś ca brāhmaṇasya vivardhate
GE07mbh_14_u:9119: 14,096.015d@004_2639 kṣatriyasyāgnir ādheyo grīṣme śreṣṭhaḥ sa vai nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:9120: 14,096.015d@004_2640 yenādhānaṃ tu vai grīṣme kriyate tasya vardhate
GE07mbh_14_u:9121: 14,096.015d@004_2641 śrīḥ prajāḥ paśavaś caiva vittaṃ tejo balaṃ yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9123: 14,096.015d@004_2643 śaradrātraṃ svayaṃ vaiśyo vaiśyayoniḥ sa ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:9124: 14,096.015d@004_2644 śarady ādhānam evaṃ vai kriyate yena pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:9125: 14,096.015d@004_2645 tasyāpi śrīḥ prajāyuś ca paśavo 'rthaś ca vardhate
GE07mbh_14_u:9126: 14,096.015d@004_2646 paśavaḥ sarva evaite tribhir vedair alaṃkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9127: 14,096.015d@004_2647 agnihotrāt pravartante yair idaṃ dhriyate jagat
GE07mbh_14_u:9128: 14,096.015d@004_2648 grāmyāraṇyāś ca paśavas tathā vṛkṣās tṛṇāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9129: 14,096.015d@004_2649 phalāny oṣadhayaś cāpi hy agnihotrakṛte hi tāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9130: 14,096.015d@004_2650 rasāḥ snehās tathā gandhā ratnāni maṇayas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:9133: 14,096.015d@004_2653 dharmaśāstraṃ ca tat sarvam agnihotrakṛte kṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:9134: 14,096.015d@004_2654 chandaḥ śikṣāś ca kalpāś ca tathā vyākaraṇaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:9135: 14,096.015d@004_2655 śāstraṃ jyotir niruktaṃ cāpy agnihotrakṛte kṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:9138: 14,096.015d@004_2658 yac caitasyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ hi kiṃ cid asti carācaram
GE07mbh_14_u:9139: 14,096.015d@004_2659 tat sarvam agnihotrasya kṛte sṛṣṭaṃ svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_14_u:9143: 14,096.015d@004_2663 kālasya vedanārthaṃ tu jyotirjñānaṃ kṛtaṃ purā
GE07mbh_14_u:9154: 14,096.015d@004_2674 vedyarthaṃ pṛthivī sṛṣṭā saṃbhārārthaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9155: 14,096.015d@004_2675 idhmārtham atha yūpārthaṃ brahmā cakre vanaspatim
GE07mbh_14_u:9157: 14,096.015d@004_2677 mantrāṇāṃ viniyogaṃ ca proṣitā śrāvaṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:9159: 14,096.015d@004_2679 udgātṝṃś caiva sāmnāṃ vai baliprasthānam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9163: 14,096.015d@004_2683 nāvabudhyanti ye viprā nindanti ca paśor vadham
GE07mbh_14_u:9164: 14,096.015d@004_2684 te yānti narakaṃ ghoraṃ rauravaṃ tamasāvṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:9167: 14,096.015d@004_2687 yūpās tu mantrasaṃskārair eṣāṃ vai paśavas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:9169: 14,096.015d@004_2689 yāvat kālaṃ hi yajvā vai svargaloke mahīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:9170: 14,096.015d@004_2690 tāvat kālaṃ pramodante paśavo hy adhvare hatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9171: 14,096.015d@004_2691 vṛkṣā yūpatvam icchanti paśutvaṃ paśavas tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:9173: 14,096.015d@004_2693 somatvaṃ ca latāḥ sarvā veditvaṃ vai vasuṃdharā
GE07mbh_14_u:9175: 14,096.015d@004_2695 tasmāt paśuvadhe hiṃsā nāsti yajñeṣu pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:9176: 14,096.015d@004_2696 ahiṃsā vaidikaṃ karma brahmakarmeti tat smṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:9177: 14,096.015d@004_2697 vedoktaṃ ye na kurvanti hiṃsābuddhyā kratuṃ dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9178: 14,096.015d@004_2698 sadyaḥ śūdratvam āyānti pretya caṇḍālatām api
GE07mbh_14_u:9179: 14,096.015d@004_2699 gāvo yajñārtham utpannā dakṣiṇārthaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9180: 14,096.015d@004_2700 suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ caiva pātrī kumbhārtham eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9181: 14,096.015d@004_2701 darbhāḥ saṃstaraṇārthaṃ tu rakṣasāṃ rakṣaṇāya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9182: 14,096.015d@004_2702 yajanārthaṃ dvijāḥ sṛṣṭās tārakā divi devatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9184: 14,096.015d@004_2704 śuśrūṣārthaṃ trayāṇāṃ tu śūdrāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_14_u:9185: 14,096.015d@004_2705 evam etaj jagat sarvam agnihotrakṛte kṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:9186: 14,096.015d@004_2706 nāvabudhyanti ye caitan narās tu tamasā vṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9187: 14,096.015d@004_2707 te yānti narakaṃ ghoraṃ rauravaṃ nāma viśrutam
GE07mbh_14_u:9188: 14,096.015d@004_2708 rauravād vipramuktās tu krimiyoniṃ vrajanti te
GE07mbh_14_u:9189: 14,096.015d@004_2709 yathoktam agnihotrāṇāṃ śuśrūṣanti ca ye dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9190: 14,096.015d@004_2710 tair dattaṃ suhutaṃ ceṣṭaṃ dattam adhyāpitaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:9191: 14,096.015d@004_2711 evam iṣṭaṃ ca pūrtaṃ ca yad vipraiḥ kriyate nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:9192: 14,096.015d@004_2712 tat sarvaṃ samyag āhṛtya cāditye sthāpayāmy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:9193: 14,096.015d@004_2713 mayā sthāpitam āditye lokasya sukṛtaṃ hi tat
GE07mbh_14_u:9194: 14,096.015d@004_2714 dhārayet tat sahasrāṃśuḥ sukṛtaṃ hy agnihotriṇām
GE07mbh_14_u:9195: 14,096.015d@004_2715 yāvat kālaṃ tu tiṣṭhanti loke cāpy agnihotriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9196: 14,096.015d@004_2716 tāvat teṣāṃ hi puṇyena dīpyante raviṇāmbare
GE07mbh_14_u:9197: 14,096.015d@004_2717 svarge svargaṃ gatānāṃ tu vīryād bhavati vīryavān
GE07mbh_14_u:9198: 14,096.015d@004_2718 tatra te hy upayuñjanti hy agnihotrasya yat phalam
GE07mbh_14_u:9200: 14,096.015d@004_2720 vṛthāgninā ca ye ke cid dahyante hy agnihotriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9201: 14,096.015d@004_2721 na te 'gnihotriṇāṃ lokaṃ manasāpi vrajanti vai
GE07mbh_14_u:9205: 14,096.015d@004_2725 hotavyaṃ vidhivad rājann ūrdhvam icchanti ye gatim
GE07mbh_14_u:9207: 14,096.015d@004_2727 na tyājyaṃ kṣaṇam apy etad gṛhītavyaṃ dvijātibhiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9208: 14,096.015d@004_2728 vṛddhatve 'py agnihotraṃ vai gṛhṇanti vidhivad dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9211: 14,096.015d@004_2731 dvikālam atithīṃś caiva pūjayanti ca bhaktitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9213: 14,096.015d@004_2733 mama loke pramodante dṛṣṭvā māṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:9216: 14,096.015d@004_2736 bālāhitāgnayo ye ca śūdrānnād viratāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:9224: 14,096.015d@004_2744 ity eṣā hy āhitāgnīnāṃ vibhūtiḥ pāṇḍunandana
GE07mbh_14_u:9225: 14,096.015d@004_2745 ye ca devaśrutiṃ ke cin nindamānā hy abuddhayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9226: 14,096.015d@004_2746 pramāṇaṃ na ca kurvanti te yānti hy akṣayaṃ tamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9227: 14,096.015d@004_2747 pramāṇam itihāsaṃ ca vedān kurvanti ye dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9234: 14,096.015d@004_2752 pāpino yena śudhyanti tat te vakṣyāmi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9235: 14,096.015d@004_2753 brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vāpi vaiśyo vā caritavrataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9236: 14,096.015d@004_2754 yathāvat kartukāmo yas tasyeyaṃ prathamā kriyā
GE07mbh_14_u:9237: 14,096.015d@004_2755 śodhayet tu śarīraṃ svaṃ pañcagavyena yantritaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9239: 14,096.015d@004_2757 śuddhavāsāḥ śucir bhūtvā mauñjīṃ badhnīta mekhalām
GE07mbh_14_u:9244: 14,096.015d@004_2762 āghārāv ājyabhāgau ca praṇavaṃ vyāhṛtīs tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:9245: 14,096.015d@004_2763 vāruṇaiś cāpi pañcaiva hutvā sarvān yathākramam
GE07mbh_14_u:9247: 14,096.015d@004_2765 viśvebhyaś caiva devebhyaḥ prajāpataya eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9249: 14,096.015d@004_2767 tataḥ samāpayed agniṃ śāntiṃ kṛtvātha pauṣṭikam
GE07mbh_14_u:9250: 14,096.015d@004_2768 praṇamyāgniṃ ca somaṃ ca bhasma dhṛtvā tathātmani
GE07mbh_14_u:9251: 14,096.015d@004_2769 nadīṃ gatvā viviktātmā somāya varuṇāya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9257: 14,096.015d@004_2775 nārāyaṇaṃ vā rudraṃ vā brahmāṇam atha vāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:9258: 14,096.015d@004_2776 vāruṇaṃ mantrasūktaṃ vā prāgbhojanam athāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:9259: 14,096.015d@004_2777 vīraghnam ṛṣabhaṃ vāpi tathā cāpy aghamarṣaṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:9260: 14,096.015d@004_2778 gāyatrīṃ mama vā devīṃ sāvitrīṃ vā japet tataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9261: 14,096.015d@004_2779 tataś cāṣṭādaśaṃ vāpi sahasram atha vāparam
GE07mbh_14_u:9262: 14,096.015d@004_2780 tato madhyāhnakāle vai pāyasaṃ yāvakaṃ hi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:9264: 14,096.015d@004_2782 pātraṃ tu susamādāya sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ tu vā
GE07mbh_14_u:9265: 14,096.015d@004_2783 tāmraṃ vā mṛnmayaṃ vāpi audumbaram athāpi vā
GE07mbh_14_u:9266: 14,096.015d@004_2784 vṛkṣāṇāṃ yājñiyānāṃ tu parṇair ārdrair akutsitaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9267: 14,096.015d@004_2785 puṭakena tu guptena cared bhaikṣaṃ samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9268: 14,096.015d@004_2786 brāhmaṇānāṃ gṛhāṇāṃ tu saptānāṃ nāparaṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_14_u:9270: 14,096.015d@004_2788 na hasec ca na vīkṣec ca nābhibhāṣeta vā striyam
GE07mbh_14_u:9271: 14,096.015d@004_2789 dṛṣṭvā mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ ca caṇḍālaṃ vā rajasvalām
GE07mbh_14_u:9272: 14,096.015d@004_2790 patitaṃ ca tathā śvānam ādityam avalokayet
GE07mbh_14_u:9273: 14,096.015d@004_2791 yo hi pādukam āruhya sarvadā pracared dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9275: 14,096.015d@004_2793 tatas tv āvasathaṃ prāpto bhikṣāṃ nikṣipya bhūtale
GE07mbh_14_u:9276: 14,096.015d@004_2794 prakṣālya pādāv ā jānvor hastāv ākūrparaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9277: 14,096.015d@004_2795 ācamya vāriṇā tena vahniṃ viprāṃś ca pūjayet
GE07mbh_14_u:9278: 14,096.015d@004_2796 pañca saptātha vā kuryād bhāgān bhaikṣasya tasya vai
GE07mbh_14_u:9280: 14,096.015d@004_2798 brahmaṇe cāgnaye caiva somāya varuṇāya ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9281: 14,096.015d@004_2799 viśvebhyaś caiva devebhyo dadyād annaṃ yathākramam
GE07mbh_14_u:9284: 14,096.015d@004_2802 aṅgulībhis tribhiḥ piṇḍaṃ prāśnīyāt prāṅmukhaḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9285: 14,096.015d@004_2803 yathā ca vardhate somo hrasate ca yathā punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9286: 14,096.015d@004_2804 tathā piṇḍāś ca vardhante hasante ca dine dine
GE07mbh_14_u:9287: 14,096.015d@004_2805 trikālaṃ snānam asyoktaṃ dvikālam atha vā sakṛt
GE07mbh_14_u:9288: 14,096.015d@004_2806 brahmacārī sadā vāpi na ca vastraṃ prapīḍayet
GE07mbh_14_u:9289: 14,096.015d@004_2807 sthāne na divasaṃ tiṣṭhed rātrau vīrāsanaṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_14_u:9290: 14,096.015d@004_2808 bhavet sthaṇḍilaśāyī vāpy atha vā vṛkṣamūlikaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9291: 14,096.015d@004_2809 valkalaṃ yadi vā kṣaumaṃ śāṇaṃ kārpāsakaṃ tu vā
GE07mbh_14_u:9294: 14,096.015d@004_2812 brāhmaṇān bhojayed bhaktyā dadyāc caiva ca dakṣiṇām
GE07mbh_14_u:9295: 14,096.015d@004_2813 cāndrāyaṇena cīrṇena yat kṛtaṃ tena duṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:9296: 14,096.015d@004_2814 tat sarvaṃ tatkṣaṇād eva bhasmībhavati kāṣṭhavat
GE07mbh_14_u:9299: 14,096.015d@004_2817 evam anyāni pāpāni pātakīyāni yāni ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9301: 14,096.015d@004_2819 anirdaśāyā goḥ kṣīram auṣṭram āvikam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9305: 14,096.015d@004_2823 ākāśasthaṃ tu hastastham āsanasthaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9308: 14,096.015d@004_2826 parivettus tathā cānnaṃ parivittānnam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9309: 14,096.015d@004_2827 kuṇḍānnaṃ golakānnaṃ ca devalānnaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9311: 14,096.015d@004_2829 surāsavaṃ viṣaṃ sarpir lākṣā lavaṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9312: 14,096.015d@004_2830 tailaṃ cāpi ca vikrīṇan dvijaś cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret
GE07mbh_14_u:9313: 14,096.015d@004_2831 ekoddiṣṭaṃ tu yo bhuṅkte dinamadhyagato 'pi yaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9314: 14,096.015d@004_2832 bhinnabhāṇḍe tu yo bhuṅkte dvijaś cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret
GE07mbh_14_u:9315: 14,096.015d@004_2833 yo bhuṅkte 'nupanītena yo bhuṅkte ca striyā saha
GE07mbh_14_u:9316: 14,096.015d@004_2834 yo bhuṅkte kanyayā sārdhaṃ dvijaś cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret
GE07mbh_14_u:9317: 14,096.015d@004_2835 ucchiṣṭaṃ sthāpayed vipro yo mohād bhojanāntare
GE07mbh_14_u:9318: 14,096.015d@004_2836 dadyād vā yadi saṃmohād dvijaś cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret
GE07mbh_14_u:9320: 14,096.015d@004_2838 chattrākaṃ laghunaṃ caiva bhuktvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret
GE07mbh_14_u:9322: 14,096.015d@004_2840 vipakvaṃ ca tathā māṃsaṃ bhuktvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret
GE07mbh_14_u:9323: 14,096.015d@004_2841 udakyayā śunā vāpi caṇḍālair vā dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9324: 14,096.015d@004_2842 dṛṣṭam annaṃ tu bhuñjāno dvijaś cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret
GE07mbh_14_u:9325: 14,096.015d@004_2843 etat purā viśuddhyartham ṛṣibhiś caritaṃ vratam
