GE07mbh_14_u:9617: 14,096.015d@004_3117 yāvad ṛkṣāṇi tiṣṭhanti gagane śaśinā saha
GE07mbh_14_u:9618: 14,096.015d@004_3118 tāvat kālaṃ sa rājendra somaloke mahīyate
GE07mbh_14_u:9619: 14,096.015d@004_3119 tataś cāpi cyutaḥ kālād iha loke yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:9622: 14,096.015d@004_3121 bhagavaṃs tava gāyatrī budhyate tu kathaṃ nṛbhiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9623: 14,096.015d@004_3122 kiṃ vā tasyāḥ phalaṃ deva mamācakṣva sureśvara
GE07mbh_14_u:9626: 14,096.015d@004_3124 ayane śravaṇe caiva vyatīpāte tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9628: 14,096.015d@004_3126 japtvā tu mama gāyatrīm atha vāṣṭākṣaraṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:9630: 14,096.015d@004_3127 ārjitaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ tasya nāśayen nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9632: 14,096.015d@004_3129 etat kathaya deveśa paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_14_u:9635: 14,096.015d@004_3131 aśvattho na sthito yatra nāhaṃ tatra pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9636: 14,096.015d@004_3132 yatrāhaṃ saṃsthito rājann aśvatthaś cāpi tatra vai
GE07mbh_14_u:9637: 14,096.015d@004_3133 yas tv enam arcayed bhaktyā sa māṃ sākṣāt samarcati
GE07mbh_14_u:9638: 14,096.015d@004_3134 yas tv enaṃ praharet kopān mām eva praharet tu saḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9639: 14,096.015d@004_3135 tasmāt pradakṣiṇaṃ kuryān na chindyād enam anvaham
GE07mbh_14_u:9640: 14,096.015d@004_3136 vratasya pāraṇaṃ tīrtham ārjavaṃ tīrtham ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:9643: 14,096.015d@004_3139 narāṇāṃ poṣaṇaṃ tīrthaṃ gārhasthyaṃ tīrtham ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:9644: 14,096.015d@004_3140 ātitheyaṃ paraṃ tīrtham atithis tīrtham ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:9645: 14,096.015d@004_3141 brahmacaryaṃ paraṃ tīrthaṃ tretāgnis tīrtham ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:9646: 14,096.015d@004_3142 mūlaṃ dharmaṃ tu vijñāya manas tatrāvadhāryatām
GE07mbh_14_u:9647: 14,096.015d@004_3143 gaccha tīrthāni kaunteya dharmo dharmeṇa vardhate
GE07mbh_14_u:9648: 14,096.015d@004_3144 dvividhaṃ tīrtham ity āhuḥ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:9652: 14,096.015d@004_3148 gurutīrthaṃ paraṃ jñānam atas tīrthaṃ na vidyate
GE07mbh_14_u:9654: 14,096.015d@004_3150 kṣamā tu paramaṃ tīrthaṃ sarvatīrtheṣu pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:9655: 14,096.015d@004_3151 kṣamāvatām ayaṃ lokaḥ paraś caiva kṣamāvatām
GE07mbh_14_u:9657: 14,096.015d@004_3153 ākṛṣṭas tarjito vāpi kṣamāvāṃs tīrtham ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:9658: 14,096.015d@004_3154 kṣamā damaḥ kṣamā dānaṃ kṣamā yajñaḥ kṣamā tapaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9660: 14,096.015d@004_3156 kṣamā dayā kṣamā yajñaḥ kṣamayaitad dhṛtaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_14_u:9661: 14,096.015d@004_3157 kṣamāvān prāpnuyāt svargaṃ kṣamāvān prāpnuyād yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9662: 14,096.015d@004_3158 kṣamāvān prāpnuyān mokṣaṃ tasmāt sā tīrtham ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:9665: 14,096.015d@004_3161 ātmā tu yajñaḥ satataṃ manyate vai
GE07mbh_14_u:9669: 14,096.015d@004_3165 jñānāmbunā snāti ca yo hi nityaṃ
GE07mbh_14_u:9674: 14,096.015d@004_3168 tvadbhaktasya suraśreṣṭha mama tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:9679: 14,096.015d@004_3173 pradakṣiṇaṃ ca triḥ kuryāt punar aṣṭākṣareṇa tu
GE07mbh_14_u:9680: 14,096.015d@004_3174 tena tuṣṭo naraśreṣṭha tat pāpaṃ kṣapayāmy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:9681: 14,096.015d@004_3175 yatra kṛṣṭāṃ varāhasya mṛttikāṃ śirasā vahan
GE07mbh_14_u:9685: 14,096.015d@004_3179 salilena tu yaḥ snāyāt sakṛd eva ravigrahe
GE07mbh_14_u:9686: 14,096.015d@004_3180 tasya yat saṃcitaṃ pāpaṃ tatkṣaṇād eva naśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:9688: 14,096.015d@004_3182 gomūtreṇāpi yaḥ snāyād rohiṇyā mama vā dine
GE07mbh_14_u:9690: 14,096.015d@004_3184 namasyed yas tu madbhaktyā śiṃśumāraṃ prajāpatim
GE07mbh_14_u:9693: 14,096.015d@004_3187 śiro dharmo hanur brahmā pucchāv uttaradakṣiṇau
GE07mbh_14_u:9694: 14,096.015d@004_3188 hṛdayaṃ tu bhaved viṣṇur hastau syātāṃ tathāśvinau
GE07mbh_14_u:9695: 14,096.015d@004_3189 agnir madhyaṃ bhaved rājaṃl liṅgaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_14_u:9697: 14,096.015d@004_3191 tataḥ paścād bhaved indras tataḥ paścāt prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9698: 14,096.015d@004_3192 abhayaṃ ca tataḥ paścāt sa eva dhruvasaṃjñitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9700: 14,096.015d@004_3194 pibet tu pañcagavyaṃ yaḥ paurṇamāsyām upoṣya tu
GE07mbh_14_u:9701: 14,096.015d@004_3195 tasya naśyati tat sarvaṃ yat pāpaṃ pūrvasaṃcitam
GE07mbh_14_u:9702: 14,096.015d@004_3196 tathaiva brahmakūrcaṃ tu samantraṃ tu pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_14_u:9703: 14,096.015d@004_3197 māsi māsi pibed yas tu tasya pāpaṃ praṇaśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:9704: 14,096.015d@004_3198 pāpaṃ ca brahmakūrcaṃ ca śṛṇu mantraṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:9705: 14,096.015d@004_3199 pālāśaṃ padmapatraṃ vā tāmraṃ vātha hiraṇmayam
GE07mbh_14_u:9706: 14,096.015d@004_3200 sādayitvā tu gṛhṇīyāt tat tu pātram udāhṛtam
GE07mbh_14_u:9708: 14,096.015d@004_3202 āpyāyasveti ca kṣīraṃ dadhikrāvṇeti vai dadhi
GE07mbh_14_u:9709: 14,096.015d@004_3203 tejo 'si śukram ity ājyaṃ devasyeti kuśodakam
GE07mbh_14_u:9710: 14,096.015d@004_3204 āpo hi ṣṭheti saṃgṛhya yavacūrṇaṃ yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_14_u:9711: 14,096.015d@004_3205 brahmaṇe ca yathā hutvā samiddhe ca hutāśane
GE07mbh_14_u:9713: 14,096.015d@004_3207 uddhṛtya praṇavenaiva pibet tu praṇavena tu
GE07mbh_14_u:9715: 14,096.015d@004_3209 bhadraṃ na iti yaḥ pādaṃ paṭhed ṛksaṃhitāṃ yathā
GE07mbh_14_u:9717: 14,096.015d@004_3211 mama sūktaṃ japed yas tu nityaṃ madgatamānasaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9719: 14,096.015d@004_3212 na pāpena tu lipyeta padmapatram ivāmbhasā
GE07mbh_14_u:9722: 14,096.015d@004_3214 yat karma saphalaṃ neti kathayasva mamācyuta
GE07mbh_14_u:9723: 14,096.015d@004_3215 śṛṇu pāṇḍava tat sarvaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ yathākramam
GE07mbh_14_u:9724: 14,096.015d@004_3216 saphalaṃ niṣphalaṃ caiva teṣāṃ karma bravīmi te
GE07mbh_14_u:9728: 14,096.015d@004_3220 sarvāṇy etāni vai mithyā yadi bhāvo na nirmalaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9729: 14,096.015d@004_3221 agnihotraṃ vṛthā rājan vṛthā vedās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9730: 14,096.015d@004_3222 śīlena devās tuṣyanti śrutayas tatra kāraṇam
GE07mbh_14_u:9732: 14,096.015d@004_3224 tam agryaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ manye śeṣāḥ śūdrā iti smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9734: 14,096.015d@004_3226 upavāsaratān dāntāṃs tān devā brāhmaṇān viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9735: 14,096.015d@004_3227 na jātiḥ pūjyate rājan guṇāḥ kalyāṇakāraṇāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9736: 14,096.015d@004_3228 caṇḍālam api vṛttasthaṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9739: 14,096.015d@004_3231 pañcasv eteṣu śauceṣu hṛdi śaucaṃ viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_14_u:9740: 14,096.015d@004_3232 hṛdayasya tu śaucena svargaṃ gacchanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9743: 14,096.015d@004_3235 yasya vedaśrutir naṣṭā karṣakaś cāpi yo dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9744: 14,096.015d@004_3236 vikarmasevī kaunteya sa vai vṛṣala ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:9745: 14,096.015d@004_3237 vṛṣo hi dharmo vijñeyas tasya yaḥ kurute layam
GE07mbh_14_u:9746: 14,096.015d@004_3238 vṛṣalaṃ taṃ vidur devā nikṛṣṭaṃ śvapacād api
GE07mbh_14_u:9747: 14,096.015d@004_3239 stutibhir brahmapūtābhir yaḥ śūdraṃ stauti mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9748: 14,096.015d@004_3240 na ca māṃ stauti pāpātmā sa mām ākrośayed bhṛśam
GE07mbh_14_u:9749: 14,096.015d@004_3241 śvadṛtau tu yathā kṣīraṃ brahma vai vṛṣale tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:9750: 14,096.015d@004_3242 duṣṭatām eti tat sarvaṃ śunā līḍhaṃ havir yathā
GE07mbh_14_u:9752: 14,096.015d@004_3244 dharmaśāstraṃ purāṇaṃ ca vidyā hy etāś caturdaśa
GE07mbh_14_u:9753: 14,096.015d@004_3245 yāny uktāni mayā samyag vidyāsthānāni bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:9755: 14,096.015d@004_3247 tasmāt tāni na śūdrasya spraṣṭavyāni yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:9756: 14,096.015d@004_3248 sarvaṃ tac chūdrasaṃspṛṣṭam apavitraṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9758: 14,096.015d@004_3250 śvā ca śūdraḥ śvapākaś cety apavitrāṇi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:9760: 14,096.015d@004_3252 pañcaite syur amedhyāś ca spraṣṭavyā na kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_14_u:9761: 14,096.015d@004_3253 spṛṣṭvaitān aṣṭa vai vipraḥ sacelo jalam āviśet
GE07mbh_14_u:9765: 14,096.015d@004_3257 avamatya patanty eva raurave narake narāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9766: 14,096.015d@004_3258 mama bhaktasya bhakteṣu prītir abhyadhikā nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:9769: 14,096.015d@004_3261 urdhvām eva gatiṃ viddhi kiṃ punar jñānināṃ nṛṇām
GE07mbh_14_u:9770: 14,096.015d@004_3262 patraṃ vāpy atha vā puṣpaṃ phalaṃ vā jalam eva vā
GE07mbh_14_u:9771: 14,096.015d@004_3263 dadāti mama śūdro 'pi śirasā dhārayāmi tat
GE07mbh_14_u:9772: 14,096.015d@004_3264 viprān evārcayed bhaktyā śūdraḥ prāyeṇa matpriyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9773: 14,096.015d@004_3265 teṣāṃ tenaiva rūpeṇa pūjāṃ gṛhṇāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_14_u:9775: 14,096.015d@004_3267 mām arcayanti te viprā matsāyujyaṃ vrajanti te
GE07mbh_14_u:9778: 14,096.015d@004_3270 āsām anyatamāṃ mūrtiṃ yo madbhaktyā samarcati
GE07mbh_14_u:9780: 14,096.015d@004_3272 mṛdā ca maṇiratnaiś ca tāmreṇa rajatena vā
GE07mbh_14_u:9781: 14,096.015d@004_3273 kṛtvā pratikṛtiṃ kuryād arcanāṃ kāñcanena vā
GE07mbh_14_u:9784: 14,096.015d@004_3276 vaiśyo vā dhanakāmas tu śūdraḥ puṇyaphalapriyaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9785: 14,096.015d@004_3277 sarvakāmāḥ striyo vāpi sarvān kāmān avāpnuyuḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9789: 14,096.015d@004_3279 udvegas tava kasmāt tu tan me brūhi sureśvara
GE07mbh_14_u:9792: 14,096.015d@004_3282 nanv ahaṃ śaṃkaraś cāpi gāvo viprās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9793: 14,096.015d@004_3283 aśvattho mama rūpāṇi satyam etad yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:9794: 14,096.015d@004_3284 etat trayaṃ hi madbhakto nāvamanyeta karhi cit
GE07mbh_14_u:9795: 14,096.015d@004_3285 avamānitam etat tu dahaty āsaptamaṃ kulam
GE07mbh_14_u:9796: 14,096.015d@004_3286 aśvattho brāhmaṇā gāvo manmayās tārayanti ha
GE07mbh_14_u:9798: 14,096.015d@004_3287 tasmād etat prayatnena trayaṃ pūjaya pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:9801: 14,096.015d@004_3289 brahma vā naśyati kathaṃ vaktuṃ deva tvam arhasi
GE07mbh_14_u:9802: 14,096.015d@004_3290 kūpasnānaṃ tu yo vipraḥ kuryād dvādaśavārṣikam
GE07mbh_14_u:9803: 14,096.015d@004_3291 sa tenaiva śarīreṇa śūdratvaṃ yāty asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_14_u:9805: 14,096.015d@004_3293 sa śūdratvaṃ vrajed vipro vedānāṃ pārago 'pi san
GE07mbh_14_u:9806: 14,096.015d@004_3294 pattane nagare vāpi yo dvādaśasamā vaset
GE07mbh_14_u:9807: 14,096.015d@004_3295 sa śūdratvaṃ vased vipro nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:9808: 14,096.015d@004_3296 utpādayati yaḥ putraṃ śūdrāyāṃ kāmato dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9809: 14,096.015d@004_3297 tasya kāyagataṃ brahma sadya eva vinaśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:9810: 14,096.015d@004_3298 madyapī strīmukhaṃ mohād āsvādayati yo naraḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9811: 14,096.015d@004_3299 tasya kāyagataṃ brahma sadya eva vinaśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:9812: 14,096.015d@004_3300 yaḥ somalatikāṃ vipraḥ kevalaṃ bhakṣayed vṛthā
GE07mbh_14_u:9813: 14,096.015d@004_3301 tasya kāyagataṃ brahma sadya eva vinaśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:9814: 14,096.015d@004_3302 maithunaṃ kurute yas tu jihvāyāṃ brāhmaṇo nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:9815: 14,096.015d@004_3303 tasya kāyagataṃ brahma sadya eva vinaśyati
GE07mbh_14_u:9817: 14,096.015d@004_3305 vināśayanti ye tat tu tāñ śocāmi yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:9819: 14,096.015d@004_3307 jātibhraṃśakaraṃ karma na kuryād īdṛśaṃ dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9824: 14,096.015d@004_3310 śrūyatām āhitāgnes tu tathā bhūtasya saṃskriyā
GE07mbh_14_u:9826: 14,096.015d@004_3312 trīṇi ṣaṣṭiśatāny āhur asthīny asya narādhipa
GE07mbh_14_u:9828: 14,096.015d@004_3314 aśītyardhaṃ śirasi ca grīvāyāṃ daśa eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9829: 14,096.015d@004_3315 bāhvoś cāpi śataṃ dadyād aṅgulīṣu punar daśa
GE07mbh_14_u:9830: 14,096.015d@004_3316 urasi triṃśataṃ dadyāj jaṭhare cāpi viṃśatim
GE07mbh_14_u:9831: 14,096.015d@004_3317 vṛṣaṇe dvādaśārdhaṃ tu śiśne cāṣṭārdham eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9832: 14,096.015d@004_3318 dadyāt tu śatam ūrvos tu ṣaṣṭhyardhaṃ jānujaṅghayoḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9833: 14,096.015d@004_3319 daśa dadyāc caraṇayor eṣā pretasya niṣkṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9837: 14,096.015d@004_3321 bhaktānāṃ tāraṇārthaṃ vai vaktum arhasi dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9839: 14,096.015d@004_3323 satyasya vacanaṃ tīrtham ahiṃsā tīrtham ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:9840: 14,096.015d@004_3324 tapas tīrthaṃ dayā tīrthaṃ śīlaṃ tīrthaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_14_u:9842: 14,096.015d@004_3326 saṃtuṣṭo brāhmaṇas tīrthaṃ jñānaṃ vā tīrtham ucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:9844: 14,096.015d@004_3328 yatayas tīrtham ity eva vidvāṃsas tīrtham ucyate

GE07mbh_14_u:9846: 14,096.015d@004_3330 trailokye 'smin nirudvigno na bibhemi kutaś cana
GE07mbh_14_u:9847: 14,096.015d@004_3331 na divā yadi vā rātrāv udvegaḥ śūdralaṅghanāt
GE07mbh_14_u:9848: 14,096.015d@004_3332 na bhayaṃ devadaityebhyo rakṣobhyaś caiva me nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:9849: 14,096.015d@004_3333 śūdravaktrāc cyutaṃ brahma bhayaṃ tu mama suvrata
GE07mbh_14_u:9850: 14,096.015d@004_3334 tasmāt sapraṇavaṃ śūdro mannāmāpi na kīrtayet
GE07mbh_14_u:9851: 14,096.015d@004_3335 praṇavaṃ hi paraṃ brahma nityaṃ brahmavido viduḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9853: 14,096.015d@004_3337 tena gacchanti te svargaṃ cintayanto hi māṃ sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:9856: 14,096.015d@004_3340 rāgo dveṣaś ca mohaś ca pāruṣyaṃ ca nṛśaṃsatā
GE07mbh_14_u:9860: 14,096.015d@004_3344 abuddhitā ca nāstikyaṃ bhayam ālasyam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9861: 14,096.015d@004_3345 aśaucaṃ cākṛtajñatvaṃ ḍambhatā stambha eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9862: 14,096.015d@004_3346 nikṛtiś cāpy avijñānaṃ jātake śūdram āviśet
GE07mbh_14_u:9863: 14,096.015d@004_3347 dṛṣṭvā pitāmahaḥ śūdram abhibhūtaṃ tu tāmasaiḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9866: 14,096.015d@004_3350 patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ toyaṃ yo me bhaktyā prayacchati
GE07mbh_14_u:9867: 14,096.015d@004_3351 tad ahaṃ bhaktyupahṛtaṃ mūrdhnā gṛhṇāmi śūdrataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9868: 14,096.015d@004_3352 antyajo vāpi yaḥ kaś cit sarvapāpasamanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9869: 14,096.015d@004_3353 yadi māṃ satataṃ dhyāyet sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate
GE07mbh_14_u:9871: 14,096.015d@004_3355 mayi bhaktiṃ na kurvanti caṇḍālasadṛśā hi te
GE07mbh_14_u:9872: 14,096.015d@004_3356 vṛthā dattaṃ vṛthā japtaṃ vṛthā ceṣṭaṃ vṛthā hutam
GE07mbh_14_u:9873: 14,096.015d@004_3357 vṛthātithyaṃ ca tat tasya yo na bhakto mama dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9874: 14,096.015d@004_3358 yat kṛtaṃ ca hutaṃ cāpi yad iṣṭaṃ dattam eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9875: 14,096.015d@004_3359 abhaktimat kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ rākṣasā eva bhuñjate
GE07mbh_14_u:9878: 14,096.015d@004_3362 ānṛśaṃsyam ahiṃsā ca dayā satyam athārjavam
GE07mbh_14_u:9879: 14,096.015d@004_3363 adrohaś caiva bhūtānāṃ madbhaktānāṃ vrataṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_14_u:9880: 14,096.015d@004_3364 nama ity eva yo brūyān madbhaktaḥ śraddhayānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9882: 14,096.015d@004_3366 kiṃ punar ye yajante māṃ yājakā vidhipūrvakam
GE07mbh_14_u:9883: 14,096.015d@004_3367 madbhaktā madgataprāṇāḥ kathayantaś ca māṃ sadā
GE07mbh_14_u:9885: 14,096.015d@004_3369 nāsau padam avāpnoti madbhaktair yad avāpyate
GE07mbh_14_u:9886: 14,096.015d@004_3370 mām eva tasmād rājendra dhyāhi nityam atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9887: 14,096.015d@004_3371 avāpsyasi tataḥ siddhiṃ drakṣyase paramaṃ padam
GE07mbh_14_u:9889: 14,096.015d@004_3373 na śūdrā bhagavadbhaktā viprā bhāgavatāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9891: 14,096.015d@004_3375 acchidraḥ pañcakālajñaḥ sa vai bhāgavataḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9892: 14,096.015d@004_3376 ṛgvedenaiva māṃ hotā yajuṣādhvaryur eva ca
GE07mbh_14_u:9895: 14,096.015d@004_3379 stuvanti satataṃ ye māṃ te 'pi bhāgavatāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9896: 14,096.015d@004_3380 vedādhīnāḥ sadā yajñā yajñādhīnās tu devatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9897: 14,096.015d@004_3381 devatā brāhmaṇādhīnās tasmād viprās tu devatāḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9899: 14,096.015d@004_3383 rudraṃ samāśritā devā rudro brāhmaṇam āśritaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9900: 14,096.015d@004_3384 brahmā mām āśrito rājan nāhaṃ kaṃ cid upāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9901: 14,096.015d@004_3385 mamāśrayo na kaś cit tu sarveṣām āśrayo hy aham
GE07mbh_14_u:9902: 14,096.015d@004_3386 evam etan mayā proktaṃ rahasyam idam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:9903: 14,096.015d@004_3387 dharmapriyasya te rājan nityam evaṃ samācara
GE07mbh_14_u:9904: 14,096.015d@004_3388 idaṃ pavitram ākhyānaṃ puṇyaṃ vedena saṃmitam
GE07mbh_14_u:9905: 14,096.015d@004_3389 yaḥ paṭhen māmakaṃ dharmam ahany ahani pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_14_u:9906: 14,096.015d@004_3390 dharmo vivardhate tasya buddhiś cāpi prasīdati
GE07mbh_14_u:9907: 14,096.015d@004_3391 pāpakṣayam upaity eva kalyāṇaṃ ca vivardhate
GE07mbh_14_u:9908: 14,096.015d@004_3392 etat puṇyaṃ pavitraṃ ca pāpanāśanam uttamam
GE07mbh_14_u:9909: 14,096.015d@004_3393 śrotavyaṃ śraddhayā yuktaiḥ śrotriyaiś ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9910: 14,096.015d@004_3394 śrāvayed yas tv idaṃ bhaktyā prayato 'tha śṛṇoti vā
GE07mbh_14_u:9911: 14,096.015d@004_3395 sa gacchen mama sāyujyaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_14_u:9912: 14,096.015d@004_3396 yaś cedaṃ śrāvayec chrāddhe madbhakto matparāyaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9915: 14,096.015d@004_3398 śrutvā bhāgavatān dharmān sākṣād viṣṇor jagadguroḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9917: 14,096.015d@004_3400 ṛṣayaḥ pāṇḍavāś caiva praṇemus taṃ janārdanam
GE07mbh_14_u:9918: 14,096.015d@004_3401 pūjayām āsa govindaṃ dharmaputraḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_14_u:9920: 14,096.015d@004_3403 bhūtā yakṣā grahāś caiva guhyakā bhujagās tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:9924: 14,096.015d@004_3407 śrutvā tu paramaṃ puṇyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ dharmaśāsanam
GE07mbh_14_u:9925: 14,096.015d@004_3408 vimuktapāpāḥ pūtās te saṃvṛttās tatkṣaṇena tu
GE07mbh_14_u:9926: 14,096.015d@004_3409 praṇamya śirasā viṣṇuṃ pratinandya ca tāṃ kathām
GE07mbh_14_u:9927: 14,096.015d@004_3410 draṣṭāro dvārakāyāṃ vai vayaṃ sarve jagadgurum

GE07mbh_14_u:9931: 14,096.015d@004_3414 sasmāra dārukaṃ rājan sa ca sātyakinā saha

GE07mbh_14_u:9937: 14,096.015d@004_3420 dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca gāndhārīṃ viduraṃ draupadīṃ tathā
GE07mbh_14_u:9938: 14,096.015d@004_3421 kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ vyāsam ṛṣīn anyāṃś ca mantriṇaḥ

GE07mbh_14_u:9952: 14,096.015d@004_3435 pṛṣṭhato 'nuyayuḥ kṛṣṇaṃ mā śabda iti harṣitāḥ
